story:
We have all been in a situation where you are with a group of friends or family, and at the last minute you are trying to go to a concert, game, or the big event only to have your plans change.  You need an extra ticket?!  Where do you turn?!  You know people are there selling tickets.  How do you find them? How do you know what to pay? And vice versa. Currently your options are to wander around a parking lot, risk getting ripped off, eating the ticket, or just not going at all.  

We have all experienced this first-hand multiple times, and we as a group of friends are developing a solution.  After dealing with this yet again last season, we are more determined than ever to find an answer for everyone. Over the last few months, we have studied and learned how to become a development team --  taking a napkin idea, to becoming a real viable option. 

Led by the entrepreneurial spirit of Levi Benson, who took the risk to live a dream, he and his closest fans are now asking for your support.  

Who are we: The project is Get The HookUp.  


What are we doing: building software -- an application that will be used on smart phones.  


What is our unique positioning: to deploy an app that will create a marketplace for people to be able to find each other... hook up, to buy and sell what they have and what they need, all done in real time and on location. 


IndieGoGo funds will allow us to develop the demo system, and bring us closer to the marketplace. Thank you for your help!

 

Unique Perks 

GTHU decal -- you collect them, and we got one that is a "must have." Not for everyone, just the "player." 

GTHU beverage neoprene Coozie -- for cold drinks!

If you could walk the streets with a limited GTHU T-shirt, you would be golden!

GTHU Hoodie -- You want to have it -- Limited Quantity! -- keep warm this season with this lightweight hoodie, available in S, M, L, XL -- pullover with pocket. This pledge gets you the GTHU Orange hoodie.

GTHU Hoodie -- You want to have it -- Limited Quantity! -- keep warm this season with this lightweight hoodie, available in S, M, L, XL -- pullover with pocket. This pledge gets you the GTHU "Camo" hoodie.

GTHU Limited Deluxe Jersey -- for the fan in you! This steel mesh polyester jersey will be available in a limited quantity, and is perfect for your next party or tailgate. Customized with your name and favorite number.

story:
Pawda™ is a small GPS device that attaches to your pet's collar. It makes it easy to use your smartphone to find your pet when he or she gets lost on a furry adventure. It is simple to use, and can make sure your pets get home safely.

Never Put Up A Lost Pet Poster Again!

Nobody wants to lose their pet. But you don't want to keep them locked up inside forever. Animals need to be outdoors. The problem is they sometimes stray far from home, and it can be nerve-wracking to not know if your pet is OK. That's why we are creating Pawda™, so that you can know where your pet is at all times – and get a notification if they wander off!

Once Pawda™ is attached to your pet's collar, it syncs up with an app on your smartphone. Then, if your pet wanders outside of your designated safety zone your phone not only notifies you, but it also tells you exactly where they are. It is waterproof, so you can even locate your dog if he or she has decided to go for a swim. 

Pawda™ uses satellite services in Australia, Europe, and North America to identify exactly where your pet is, anywhere in the world. It then syncs up with the map device on your phone or tablet to help you find them. You can even monitor their movements in real time.

We plan to start producing Pawda™ in Jan/Feb 2014. We are allowing 500 advance orders to help fund the initial production of the product.

That said, we are willing to accept any amount of support as it will help us protect our furry friends!

Under The Hood

Pawda™ will be built with high quality components that have been fully tested by our engineers. It uses a GRPS quad-band module, which will be updated to a 3G module on future iterations.

The tracking device will be the smallest on the market, so it can attach to the pet's collar without bother or discomfort. The accelerator/gyroscope combo is designed to maximize battery life between charging times. The design is focused on providing maximum reliability in a minimum amount of space.

The App

Easy To Use

We have made the app very simple to use. It is available as a free download from all the major app stores once people have purchased the tracking device. After you have activated the Sim via the Pawda™ website or the mobile app you simply attach the device to your pet's collar, open the app and it will be working immediately.

We give you several different ways to interact with the map so you can always find exactly where you pet is at a moment's notice.

Peace of Mind

The best part of Pawda™ is that it is constantly working in the background. Once you have set the virtual fence around your home for your pet, you don't have to do anything else. It will automatically let you know when your pet has strayed too far away.

It will also automatically alert you when the battery is low, and lets you know how far your pet walks in a day so you can see if he or she is getting enough exercise. You can also check in on your pet and find out if they are resting or running around. It's like being able to watch them all day, even if you are away.

How to Attach Pawda™

It could not be easier to attach the device: Your pet’s color simply feeds through the two slots on the underside of your Pawda™. You are then good to go!

The Pawda™ Story

The Pawda™ story started back in October 2010 when Sydney Businessman Ryan Murphy met with App Developers Ross Lambert and Elias Poulos. Ryan wanted to share his concept to develop an app that would track pets when they strayed from their home.

Ross and Elias were very impressed with the idea and went about designing the app and looking at all the wonderful features that the app could offer. When they asked Ryan if he had considered the actual GPS device that attaches to the pet, he replied “there are a few of these on the market just buy some one of these and design the app to run in conjunction with the GPS unit.”

Many months followed as research and testing took place of various GPS tracking units. The challenge was to find a unit which had a substantial battery life, was lightweight, ‘cool’ in appearance and despite its size and weight had sufficient power to transmit in most terrains and conditions..

All the units we found and tested had a battery life of six or seven hours, which was considered by the team to be unacceptable. If you were to attach a fully charged unit on your pet before leaving for work in the morning it would be flat by the time you got home, and what good is that. The other challenge we had was that of the units we found all of them could only track one pet. Today it is not uncommon amongst pet owners to have two or more pets in the one household, and that this had not been taken into account with the current models.

Aesthetically we couldn't find anything that was pleasing and appropriate, so it was decided that it was necessary to design our own GPS tracker that had all the features we considered were necessary to make Pawda™ into a household name and provide peace of mind to thousands or even millions of pet owners across the world.

We then set about to design and then engineer this GPS tracking unit which ticked all the boxes we had identified as essential. 

Pawda™ Prototypes:

The very first prototype was completed in September 2011 it was shaped like a watch and came with a docking station for charging as you can see in the images below.

Although we were very proud of our first prototype (after all it was the culmination of 12 months work) we were concerned about the aesthetics of the design and whether or not the design was ‘cool’ enough.

We then embarked on some extensive market research and ran a number of research sessions with a variety individuals, couples and families who were representative of the future demographic of Pawda™ users.

The overwhelming results of our market research was that the product was an exceptional idea and they all wanted one or more (which was music to our ears of course) however, in response to whether or not Pawda™ was aesthetically pleasing, was it trendy and cool the answer was a big no!

So armed with our Market research report and all the suggestions made by the respondees, we set about to clear the slate and totally redesign Pawda™.

In June 2012 we produced prototype number 2 - a whole new look and feel for Pawda™.

Prototype Version 2 included a plate that connected on the underside of the dog’s collar and the Pawda™ was secured into place using the two clips on either side of the unit.


The black button on the top Pawda™ is a ‘walk’ button which disarms the Pawda™ when you take your pet for a walk. This is because the Pawda™ starts to send a signal every three minutes once the virtual perimeter has been breached.

After using our market research result to formulate the Pawda™ version 2 we decided we needed to go back to these same respondents and see if they felt we had delivered a wonderful new device which would deliver ‘peace of mind to pet lovers all over the world’. Most importantly was the device cool and of course, would they buy one?

Again the results were overwhelming in that they loved Pawda™ and this time they loved the look and feel as well! Finally we had created what the market was asking for.

There was however, some strong feedback regarding the clips and the bottom plate which despite being very practical we decided to see if we could dispense with these creating a simpler sleeker design.

Prototype Version 3 – May 2013

Since then we have been refining Pawda™ to make the device as small as possible and at the same time maintaining its long battery life and superior transmission capabilities.

The latest prototype is around 30% smaller and lighter. It also uses more advanced mapping features and has a longer battery life. We are still testing even smaller and lighter set-ups to see how effectively they sync up with major GPS satellite systems.

The final version (below) is stunning it is small and light whilst maintaining quality satellite contact and a serious battery life of up to seven days.. All data is sent as secure packets, and we have optimised the app to work with all major smartphone operating systems.

Final Prototype ready for production September 2013


Pawda™ Development

Developing Pawda™ was not just about the technical specs. It was also about figuring out how it would be used in the real world. This meant studying how cats and dogs interact when they are outside. Pawda™ would not be useful if your cat could take it off and leave it in a tree! We also had to make sure that the device would not be bothersome to your pets. During our studies, we found that the most important elements were to:

  • Make the device secure so it would not come off during normal activity.
  • Have it be light enough so that the pet would not notice it and try to remove it themselves.

We also realised that we had to find the right price point for the market. Here is how we addressed these issues.

Secure Attachment

First we developed clips that would attach Pawda™ to their collar and not come off. We tested them in real-time environments and adjusted the specs of the clips until they kept the device secure even during the most active pet play.

Then in the second prototype we moved away from the clips as we were improving the overall design, shape, weight and dimensions. In our latest design the collar simply threads through two slots on the underside of the device.

Weight

The heaviest part of any device of this type is the battery, which is why we designed all of our components to use the least amount of energy possible. This means that the device eventually became light enough so that the pets do not notice it is on their collar at all. Much of this was accomplished by finding components that could be bundled as modules.

Pawda™ weighs just 48 grams, which for even the smallest dogs is virtually unnoticeable on their collar.

Price

Finding the right price point was the most challenging part of this process. We did surveys of potential customers and believe we have found the right price point, however are willing to hear feedback from the Indiegogo community.

Pawda™ will have a recommended retail price of $198 AUS.

Product Plan

The final prototype is now complete and so to are the Apple and Android apps. We are almost ready to launch the website and our back-end web-server (this is like the engine room of the Pawda™.


We have agreements in place with a high-quality manufacturing facility in China. We are currently seeking agreements with potential distributors.

Geography and Languages

Pawda™ will work globally which includes Oceania, Asia, Middle East, Africa, North America, South America, Europe and the United Kingdom. The app will be available in all of the major languages in those areas including Mandarin, Spanish, English, Hindi, Arabic, Portuguese, Bengali, Russian, Japanese and Javanese.

FAQ

What is the battery life?

Up to seven days

After I purchase Pawda™ are there any ongoing costs?

The purchase price of Pawda™ is currently set at $198AUD and this includes the first three months subscription for the SMS card included in your Pawda™. After the first three months there is an ongoing subscription fee of $9.90 for the sim to connect to the GPRS Mobile Phone Network.

Are there additional charges or fees?

No.

How accurate is the GPS system?

It can locate your pet within three metres feet of its current location.

How does Pawda™ talk to my phone?

It uses SMS technology.

Do you offer international shipping?

Yes. We can ship your Pawda™ anywhere in the world

Can I take Pawda™ with me on vacation?

Yes. Pawda™ is designed to be mobile. You can take it with you anywhere in world.

How do I link Pawda™ up with my smartphone?

To activate Pawda™, simply register on the Pawda™ website and enter your sim number which is included with your Pawda™ when it arrives.

Is there a warranty with Pawda™?

Of course Pawda™ comes with a full 12 month warranty. Apart from normal wear and tear we will replace or repair your Pawda™ should it be faulty within the first twelve months.


Pawda™ Marketing

We are experienced internet marketers and will take this product to the market using targeted email marketing, social media marketing, distribution through pet shops and vets, as well as traditional channels including press and television infomercials.

Pawda™ Special rewards for loyal supporters

These are some of the special rewards for Indiegogo Pledges (see the Pledge Section on the right of page).


Risks and challenges 

Let's face it there are always risks and challenges in any business project. Real success in business always comes when you learn how to mitigate your risks and manage your challenges. The more experience we have in anything the more capable we are at dealing with risk. At Digital Solutions Group we have a combined 50 years in business and marketing and we are quietly confident that we are well prepared for a successful launch of Pawda™.

story:
Overview

NuType: Revolutionizing the Laptop Typing Experience

✅ Mac layout wireless mechanical keyboard

✅ Mac & Windows supported

✅ Pair up to 3 devices at the same time

✅ Super portable

✅ 20 different RGB backlits

 

World's First wireless mechanical keyboard specifically designed for your MacBook and other mobile devices

Before, excellent typing experience can only appear on the desk using the traditional keyboards. But when we work on a laptop outdoors, we may feel discomfort with its keyboard. And this discomfort is especially noticeable on the latest MacBooks. 

We want to make the mechanical keyboard much smaller and can also use on your mobile devices. This is the origin of NuType.

“Typing on the Nuphy NuType keyboard is a dream“ - KnowTechie

“We swear our productivity has improved because of the tactile and aural feedback, and the keyboard’s ability to pair with up to three different devices via Bluetooth, makes this a solid gift choice for someone whose workflow jumps from device to device.” - Design Milk

“Maintaining the slim construction the keyboard uses Kaihua Choc low profile mechanical switches which are 42 percent smaller than standard switches and provide an enjoyable tactile feel with a limited audible sound for use in all situations.” - HYPEBEAST

“NuPhy designed its mechanical keyboard to physically reside above the built-in keyboard of a MacBook, MacBook Air, and MacBook Pro. It “locks” into place using notches on the bottom that fit between and around the laptop’s keys.” - DigitalTrends

“底面のスタンドは、MacBookなどの標準的な英字配列のキーボードの隙間に収まるように設計されており、キーボードの上に載せても下のキーが押されないようになっているんです。ナイスアイデア。 ” - Gizimodo

First look of the NuType by BlackGeek - Andrea Bentivegna

 Press Kit

++

42% shorter than the standard mechanical switches

The Kaihua Choc low profile mechanical switches used by NuType are 42% smaller than the standard mechanical keyboard switches. It guarantees that NuType implements the excellent experience in such a small volume.

 

Perfectly match your MacBook and Surface series

Nutype integrates with the laptop through a slot at the bottom giving a solid connection, exactly adapting to the MacBook series and Surface series.

 

Keep using your Touch Bar, Touch ID or function Keys

NuType is designed to give you a great typing experience, but at the same time you can continue to use everything you are familiar with, such as Force Touch Trackpad, Touch ID, Touch Bar or function keys.

 

All for improving your efficiency

For more key combinations, please see the manual.

Different people have different demands for their own keyboards. So we designed some key combinations to meet different needs. For example, you can press 'FN' + '~' to substitute the use of 'ESC' button. And 'FN' + 'OPT' + 'L' can convert numeric keys into function keys.

 

Sync up to 3 devices

NuType can pair with up to 3 different devices via Bluetooth, allowing you to switch between devices effortlessly, including Android phones and Windows PCs.

 

An elegant case, also a foldable stand for your mobile devices

We designed a SmartCase especially for NuType, which not only protects your keyboard but works as a stand to hold your mobile devices, helping you work on NuType anywhere at any time.

 

Over 20 Types Of RGB Backlits

Full RGB lighting with different backlight modes offers a new level of customization for your MacBook, reflecting your personality.

 

Minimal Design

 

Proof of working prototype

 

Specifications

  • Number of Keys: 64 (Mechanical Switch)
  • Switch Type: Kaihua Choc Low Profile Mechanical Switch
  • Material: Aluminum, Plastic
  • Led Color: RGB
  •  Connection Type: USB Type-C
  •  Mode: Wired Mode, Bluetooth Mode
  •  Indicator Lights: 4
  • Battery: 1600mAh
  • Size: 277.5 x 94.6 x 16.8 mm
  • Weight: 350g
  • In the Box: 1 x NuType F1, 1 x SmartCase, 1 x USB-C to USB-C Cable (0.13m), 1 x USB-C to USB-A Cable (2m)

 

Built-in Keyboard Compatibility 

Other devices that aren't shown below, such as iPhone, iPad, Android phones and desktops can also connect the NuType with bluetooth or wired mode.

  • Apple: MacBook(2015-2019), MacBook Air(Early 2015-2019), MacBook Pro (Late 2012-2019)
  • Microsoft: Surface Laptop 1/2/3, Surface Pro 4/5/6/7, Surface Book 1/2
  • Thinkpad: X1, X390, E490, L490/590, E495/595, T470/480s, 13/14s
  • Lenovo: IdeaPad 720/730, Y9000K, Y7000/P, S145, S940 
  • HP: Spectre Folio, Spectre X360, ENVY X360, ZBOOK 15, ZBOOK 15v
  • Dell: XPS 13.3, XPS 15.6
  • Razer: Blade 15, Blade 17
  • Alienware: New Alienware M15, New Alienware M17

 

Rewards

NuType will be available in 2 colors and 3 switch options. You will get to select your color and switch option via a survey sent out after the campaign ends.

 

Everything is ready for production

 

About Us

Nu + _Problem_.

  • New problems occur all the time.
  • Sometimes, we have to bear the problems forever.
  • To solve the problems, sometimes we make things more complicated.

Nu + _Method_.

  • We want to provide a new method that solves a problem in a simple and elegant way.
  • We spent a lot of time thinking, discussing and experimenting to figure out the best method.
  • These are the reasons why we produce new products slower than other companies and why we can make a difference.

This is NuPhy.

 

Thank you for supporting NuType F1! The World's first mechanical keyboard specifically designed for your MacBook and other mobile devices!
story_txt:
Overview
NuType: Revolutionizing the Laptop Typing Experience
✅ Mac layout wireless mechanical keyboard
✅ Mac & Windows supported
✅ Pair up to 3 devices at the same time
✅ Super portable
✅ 20 different RGB backlits
 
World's First wireless mechanical keyboard specifically designed for your MacBook and other mobile devices
Before, excellent typing experience can only appear on the desk using the traditional keyboards. But when we work on a laptop outdoors, we may feel discomfort with its keyboard. And this discomfort is especially noticeable on the latest MacBooks. We want to make the mechanical keyboard much smaller and can also use on your mobile devices. This is the origin of NuType.“Typing on the Nuphy NuType keyboard is a dream“ - KnowTechie“We swear our productivity has improved because of the tactile and aural feedback, and the keyboard’s ability to pair with up to three different devices via Bluetooth, makes this a solid gift choice for someone whose workflow jumps from device to device.” - Design Milk“Maintaining the slim construction the keyboard uses Kaihua Choc low profile mechanical switches which are 42 percent smaller than standard switches and provide an enjoyable tactile feel with a limited audible sound for use in all situations.” - HYPEBEAST“NuPhy designed its mechanical keyboard to physically reside above the built-in keyboard of a MacBook, MacBook Air, and MacBook Pro. It “locks” into place using notches on the bottom that fit between and around the laptop’s keys.” - DigitalTrends“底面のスタンドは、MacBookなどの標準的な英字配列のキーボードの隙間に収まるように設計されており、キーボードの上に載せても下のキーが押されないようになっているんです。ナイスアイデア。 ” - GizimodoFirst look of the NuType by BlackGeek - Andrea Bentivegna Press Kit++42% shorter than the standard mechanical switchesThe Kaihua Choc low profile mechanical switches used by NuType are 42% smaller than the standard mechanical keyboard switches. story:
Get your BOSS Personal Planner - Live Now

Quick Summary

My name is Roland Marlow, I have been lucky enough to work for myself and run my own businesses for the past 6 years. However, one of the biggest frustrations and crippling problems I’ve faced is procrastination and lack of time. Like many others, I HATE that horrible feeling from wasting time and then not accomplishing my goals. And I am very guilty of it. It just killed my motivation.

I decided I would change that. I wanted a solution, a simple one though. Something that didn’t require a huge time or money investment but would payoff tenfold, or even more. 

So I created my own personal planner. A tool to set clear goals and a plan to achieve them.

And over the years I have tweaked and fine-tuned it a lot. Improving things that helped and scrapping things that just wasted time. This is the ultimate productivity tool to help you be more successful.

That is how the BOSS Personal Planner was started.

Does this ring a bell?

If you’ve struggled to be productive, to stop procrastinating, if you’ve tried every tool imaginable, if you’ve used every planner, if you’ve tried all the apps, tools, and coaches and you still haven’t reached the level of productivity you want, then you’re about to read the letter you’ve been waiting for all your life.

Here’s why…

I bet you’ve struggled to be productive at some point

It’s easy to procrastinate. Breaking poor and unproductive habits can be hard. You’ve probably heard of many methods and tips to be more productive but I have found, like most successful people I know, the easiest way is to physically write down a plan.

Imagine this...

Imagine you accomplish a goal that you never thought you would. It seemed like just a dream before. 

Enjoying that amazing feeling of accomplishment as you cross it off your list. 

You did it…

What if this could be normal for you? Constantly accomplishing your goals and achieving what you never thought you would.

Do you want the best year of your life?

How many people complete their New Year's resolutions? Not many. But it’s something that is done every year because people want to better their lives.

What if you had a tool to change the results. What if you not only accomplished your New Years resolution but what if you made the next year your best one ever.

More than just a personal planner

The BOSS Personal Planner isn’t just a regular planner printed in a notebook. It is a complete productivity system. Every piece was strategically thought out and considered.

From page 1 right until the end, each page serves a purpose. Our unique planning system will walk you through each step, from your long-term life goals all the way down to the daily plan and goals.

It works to solve procrastination and build a plan. It boosts productivity. It clarifies your goals. It builds you an easy-to-follow roadmap.

It's the roadmap to your success

If you want to be successful you need a plan. Unless you win the lottery or something crazy, you’re not just going to stumble onto success. 

Plan. Execute. Succeed.

Without a proper system, you may struggle to create a good plan. 

The BOSS Personal Planner makes it easy. If it’s easy, you’ll do it. That’s the point.

Stop trying to use or create overly complicated plans and formulas. Keep it simple. Once you get started building your plan in the BOSS Personal Planner, you’ll feel your goals getting closer.

And when you accomplish those goals sooner than you ever imagined, the feeling will be priceless.

Lots of space for creativity and ideas

A great planning system is important but everyone is different, and every day is different… that is why it is important to have blank space for you. 

You can take notes… sketch… or add your own section.

For your creativity.

Many planners lack this simple feature but we made sure to add extra space so you can do this. We didn’t want you to need an additional notebook.

The personal planner for winners… is that you?

If you're like me, you want to be successful...

...You want to improve yourself...

...You want to be a winner!

The feeling of victory is like no other. And it doesn't have to be against anyone else or another team. It can be a self victory. A victory of accomplishing your goals, or a big professional milestone, or making a life change you've always wanted.

We all have different purposes in life and different goals but we share the desire to succeed and improve. That's the goal of the BOSS Personal Planner. To help you win at life or business and achieve any and all of your goals.

Because you are a winner!

    Why it’s the best

    Everything about the BOSS Personal Planner is about becoming a winner. Being as successful as possible. Being the best. 

    • An accountability system to end procrastination
    • Clarify your goals with a simple goal planning system
    • Reduce stress by managing your time and tasks
    • Improve self-doubt when you cross off every goal
    • Save time and money with only organization tool you’ll ever need
    • Drastically boost your productivity
    • Easy self-improvement with a simple habit tracker
    • You’ll accomplish tasks faster giving you more free time 
    • Declutter and stay organized with 1 notebook for everything

    16,000% ROI

    Sounds insane, right? Well, when you break it down, it’s not that crazy.

    What do you value your time at? I don’t mean what you earn per hour because many of us are paid far less than we are worth. I mean, what do you value your time at? $25 per hour? $35? $50? More?

    Just think about it, if you value your time at $30 per hour and using the BOSS Personal Planner saves you 2 hours per day, which it should save you even more, over 30 days per month it will help you save 60 hours and potentially earn an extra $1,800…

    All that for about $11 per month. That calculates out to about 16,000% ROI. That is the value of the BOSS Personal Planner.

    No risk to you, just try it

    Try the BOSS Personal Planner, use it, and if you don’t like it, then just send it back and I’ll give you all your money back. You have 60 days, not 7 or 14 or even 30...but 60 days. No questions asked. I’m taking a risk by doing this. You could use the planner for 59 days, ask for a refund and rip me off, but I’m going to trust that you’re not going to do that to me. 

    Why? Because I know you’re going to love the BOSS Personal Planner.

    About the Funding

    The money is going to go towards the initial order and adding new styles. Between personal funding and what I have already raised, I have enough for the initial order. I’m offering huge prelaunch discounts. I don’t plan to offer these kinds of discounts again in the future. 

    Initially, there were only going to be 2 designs, the lion “Work Smarter” graphic on the hardcover spiral and the black PU leather version. Because of the demand, I worked with the manufacturer to include more designs. So in addition to the 2 initial styles, there will be a “Lady Boss” hardcover spiral version, a solid color hardcover spiral, and a cloth version of the PU leather style. 

    With enough additional funding, I am hoping to add more.

    *Colors may vary slightly when printed

    The Impact

    Every pledge helps grow the BOSS Personal Planner. 

    This planner design has exponentially improved my productivity and that means it can help you too.

    I’ve already had a successful Kickstarter and built a huge following of excited fans. It’s a great product that I’m thrilled to share with others.

    The fans have spoken and want to see more cover designs and colors, so that is what we are doing. The additional funds raised will app add more styles.

    It’s happening. Thanks to everyone's support, we’re moving forward with production. So thank you to everyone who has contributed. 

    Risks & Challenges

    Right now there is very little risk. I have the funding for the initial order and I’m in the process or placing it now. The reason for the InDemand campaign is to further grow the business. I want to add more planners designs to fit more people. I’ve done lots of research from customers and potential customers and I want to give you what you want.

    The biggest risk or challenge at this point is getting things manufactured and cleared by customs. So far, sample orders have gone smoothly, both with manufacturing and customs. Thats not to say we might not hit speedbumps in the future, that can happen but I've worked hard so far to prevent anything from causing delays.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Some people just can't contribute at this time and I understand, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

    If you can’t make a financial pledge, can you help spread the word out and make some noise about the campaign?

    You can help by sharing via the Indiegogo share tools!

    And that's all there is to it. I appreciate every effort.

    Okay, you have all the details, don’t hesitate, get your BOSS Personal Planner now.

    P.S. The time is now. You’re not going to become more productive if you sit there and do nothing. Your chance to make all your dreams come true has arrived. Will you go for it? Will you take action? DO IT NOW, PICK A PERK ABOVE.

story:
We've updated our Indiegogo page!
Check it out here.

 

 

 

---------------------------------------------

 

The Morning Sidekick Journal works by:

  1. TRACKING your progress to celebrate what goes right and readjust what needs work
  2. Helping you TAKE ACTION with science-based content in bite-sized chunks (3 minutes) each day
  3. HOLDING YOURSELF ACCOUNTABLE in staying consistent with it!

Use the Morning Sidekick Journal to keep you consistent in mapping out your day, every day.


It's designed to be portable so you can take it on the go. 

You can write out the first 5 things you want to do each morning. Then, get laser-focused with your biggest task of the day.

Our journal & team have been featured in: Medical Daily, Inc Magazine, Business Insider, Snapchat Discover, Fast Company, BRIT+CO, Observer, Bustle, & more.

 

From Sweet on Snapchat Discover: "The Morning Sidekick Journal helps perma-snoozers finally tackle their early-riser dreams. Now, all you need is a couple extra minutes in the a.m. to change your habits for good."

 

Get a sneak peak of the journal

We made a PDF of the intro pages and ~10% of the daily content that the full journal has. You can check it out here.

 

Note: The old model with beige covers are sold out.

We now have a new & improved upgraded cover that's a beautiful Sunrise Red color as requested by our backers :) This is what you'll be receiving:

 

Ordering Multiple Journals?

The bad news.

Indiegogo's Marketplace platform only allows placing an order for one journal at a time. If you wanted to place an order for two, they will charge you twice for shipping.

The not so bad news.

As a temporary fix, if you order two or more journals, send us an email at team@habitnest.com (bonus points if you include your PayPal email address) and we'll refund you your shipping for any extra orders.

 

Why should you do this?

Because you can GIFT your second journal to a friend and conquer this challenge together. We've seen that accountability source make users up to 7x more likely to succeed.

 

What will YOU fill your mornings with?

 

THE PROVEN BENEFITS

 

TESTIMONIALS

'

WHAT'S INSIDE

  • Identify your WHY.
  • Learn WHAT you're getting.
  • Strategize HOW you're going to conquer it.
  • Progress through GAMIFIED PHASES bit by bit until you reach your goal.

 

TRACKING PAGE

The greatest Olympic athletes track their progress daily. We’ve implemented a simple, comprehensive tracking system to hold you accountable and allow you to see your progress.

The end result: INCREDIBLE CONSISTENCY.


Every night, you’ll track:

  1. Expected sleep/wake up time (to set clear daily goals)
  2. The specific actions you want to take immediately after waking up
  3. Your most important task of the day, every day.

Then every day, you’ll track:

  1. Actual sleep/wake up times (to hold yourself accountable!)
  2. The positive benefits you felt that day from conquering your mornings (to create a positive feedback loop)
  3. Writing out the magical moments your life gained that day
  4. How you can improve your next day by 1% (to create a compounding growth effect)

 

CRYSTAL CLEAR PURPOSE

We have a whole section dedicated to "Understanding Your Why" right in the beginning of the journal for you to unlock your true inner potential.

 

PROGRESS IN STAGES

 

 

NEW CONTENT DAILY

Next to each daily tracking page is daily content that will show you a new actionable strategy you can apply to winning your mornings. These range from tips such as:

  1. The secret of what time you should go to bed (page 27)
  2. How to hold yourself accountable with automated nightly “go to sleep!” texts (page 31)
  3. What Tim Cook and Richard Branson do specifically to jumpstart their mornings (pages 46 and 141)
  4. How to immediately fill yourself with energy 15 seconds of waking up (page 71)
  5. An affirmation that will make you feel absolutely unstoppable & full of energy on a physiological level (page 105)
  6. The exact actions you should take the second you realize you’re having an “off day” (page 177)
  7. Each of these is broken down to be extremely actionable, ridiculously simple to implement, and has been individually proven to be useful with hundreds of people.

Meet your silver bullet for productivity.

 

 

FAQ's

Q: How many days long is the journal?
A: 66 days. This is based on new behavioral research in the European Journal of Social Psychology on how long it takes to successfully build a new habit.

Q: Where do you ship to?
A: All over the world!

Q: Where can I get more habit info & resources?

A: We continually write impeccable quality articles about habits & productivity over at our blog, https://habitnest.com

Shipping Details

Ships from Los Angeles in 1 business day. Takes 5-7 days to arrive domestically and 10-19 days internationally (due to customs clearance).

Refund & Return Policy

We stand by our product so much that we offer a 50-year return policy.

I'll interject here to say that: If you use it, it WILL make a big difference in your life. I myself (Mikey Ahdoot, a co-author) used to wake up at 11am and sleep at 3:30am for 5 years straight - I know the struggle of this first hand more than a lot of people. 

And tweaking this habit can actually be easy and VERY doable in actually a few days - it's all about having the right strategy, which unfortunately is incredibly scattered until we compiled it all into this journal. I implore you to try using this journal for even 3 days straight - you'll see a major difference, I guarantee it.
story_txt:
We've updated our Indiegogo page!Check it out here.
   --------------------------------------------- The Morning Sidekick Journal works by:

TRACKING your progress to celebrate what goes right and readjust what needs work
Helping you TAKE ACTION with science-based content in bite-sized chunks (3 minutes) each day

HOLDING YOURSELF ACCOUNTABLE in staying consistent with it!
Use the Morning Sidekick Journal to keep you consistent in mapping out your day, every day.It's designed to be portable so you can take it on the go. You can write out the first 5 things you want to do each morning. Then, get laser-focused with your biggest task of the day.Our journal & team have been featured in: Medical Daily, Inc Magazine, Business Insider, Snapchat Discover, Fast Company, BRIT+CO, Observer, Bustle, & more. From Sweet on Snapchat Discover: "The Morning Sidekick Journal helps perma-snoozers finally tackle their early-riser dreams. Now, all you need is a couple extra minutes in the a.m. to change your habits for good." Get a sneak peak of the journalWe made a PDF of the intro pages and ~10% of the daily content that the full journal has. You can check it out here. Note: The old model with beige covers are sold out.We now have a new & improved upgraded cover that's a beautiful Sunrise Red color as requested by our backers :) This is what you'll be receiving: Ordering Multiple Journals?The bad news.Indiegogo's Marketplace platform only allows placing an order for one journal at a time. If you wanted to place an order for two, they will charge you twice for shipping.The not so bad news.As a temporary fix, if you order two or more journals, send us an email at team@habitnest.com (bonus points if you include your PayPal email address) and we'll refund you your shipping for any extra orders. Why should you do this?Because you can GIFT your second journal to a friend and conquer this challenge together. We've seen that accountability source make users up to 7x more likely to succeed. What will YOU fill your mornings with? THE PROVEN BENEFITS TESTIMONIALS'WHAT'S INSIDE
Identify your WHY.
Learn WHAT you're getting.
Strategize HOW you're going to conquer it.
Progress through GAMIFIED PHASES bit by bit until you reach your goal.
 TRACKING PAGEThe greatest Olympic athletes track their progress daily. We’ve implemented a simple, comprehensive tracking system to hold you accountable and allow you to see your progress.The end result: INCREDIBLE CONSISTENCY.Every night, you’ll track:
Expected sleep/wake up time (to set clear daily goals)
The specific actions you want to take immediately after waking up
Your most important task of the day, every day.
Then every day, you’ll track:
Actual sleep/wake up times (to hold yourself accountable!)
The positive benefits you felt that day from conquering your mornings (to create a positive feedback loop)
Writing out the magical moments your life gained that day
How you can improve your next day by 1% (to create a compounding growth effect)
 CRYSTAL CLEAR PURPOSEWe have a whole section dedicated to "Understanding Your Why" right in the beginning of the journal for you to unlock your true inner potential. PROGRESS IN STAGES  NEW CONTENT DAILYNext to each daily tracking page is daily content that will show you a new actionable strategy you can apply to winning your mornings. These range from tips such as:
The secret of what time you should go to bed (page 27)
How to hold yourself accountable with automated nightly “go to sleep!” texts (page 31)
What Tim Cook and Richard Branson do specifically to jumpstart their mornings (pages 46 and 141)
How to immediately fill yourself with energy 15 seconds of waking up (page 71)
An affirmation that will make you feel absolutely unstoppable & full of energy on a physiological level (page 105)
The exact actions you should take the second you realize you’re having an “off day” (page 177)
Each of these is broken down to be extremely actionable, ridiculously simple to implement, and has been individually proven to be useful with hundreds of people.
Meet your silver bullet for productivity.  FAQ'sQ: How many days long is the journal?A: 66 days. This is based on new behavioral research in the European Journal of Social Psychology on how long it takes to successfully build a new habit.Q: Where do you ship to?A: All over the world!Q: Where can I get more habit info & resources?A: We continually write impeccable quality articles about habits & productivity over at our blog, https://habitnest.comShipping DetailsShips from Los Angeles in 1 business day. Takes 5-7 days to arrive domestically and 10-19 days internationally (due to customs clearance).Refund & Return PolicyWe stand by our product so much that we offer a 50-year return policy.I'll interject here to say that: If you use it, it WILL make a big difference in your life. I myself (Mikey Ahdoot, a co-author) used to wake up at 11am and sleep at 3:30am for 5 years straight - I know the struggle of this first hand more than a lot of people. And tweaking this habit can actually be easy and VERY doable in actually a few days - it's all about having the right strategy, which unfortunately is incredibly scattered until we compiled it all into this journal. I implore you to try using this journal for even 3 days straight - you'll see a major difference, I guarantee it.

story:
Pode consultar a Campanha em português, clique aqui 

You share, you win!


WinShareZ is the first app that creates a win-win situation between Brands and Consumers:

1 - As a Consumer, we are tired of receiving indiscriminate advertising. We trust so much more on recommendations from our friends.

2 - The Brands spend a lot of money on traditional advertising.


Why not combine the best of both worlds?


With WinShareZ you finally get the payment you deserve. By recommending your favorite brands on your social network, you'll win money to spend as you like!






      With the WinShareZ smartphone app you have access to:

  • Your post ads history
  • Ongoing and completed campaigns
  • Your balance
  • Settings
  • And you only need a smartphone with Internet and a Facebook account.





- How it works:

It's easy - you see the "Post Ad" option and you're free to share it.

When you share the Brand Add on your social network, we validate the payment in your app's balance. 


Our Strenghs

1. Your reward

When you accumulate a minimum balance, you can request to lift it up through a gift card, mastercard or paypal account and use it as you wish!

2. The trusted advertising

You will continue doing word-of-mouth with your friends, but now you can win with it.

3. Self-expression

It empowers your identity! You share what you love!

- If you have a Brand and want to advertise it, here's how it works:

After we launch the platform, you only need to register your store and print the personalized QRcode. Then, you can start enjoying your client's advertising.

Your employees can inform your customers to share the “Post Ad” by giving them the QRcode.

You still maintain complete control over your image. Our web platform helps you keep track and supervise the brand advertising shared by your clients.


Our Strenghs

1. The best advertising always come from the clients

Brands have always tried to turn the loyalty and satisfaction of their customeres into "media". Now they can do it in a much easier way.

2. No investment costs

The brand only pays for the customer recommendation after he shares it. There are no previous costs.

Also, is free to use WinShareZ web platform.

3. The range

Nowadays, if you have a brand you want to advertise, the web is your best option. Trust your message to your customers, and they will spread it all across the web.

*The source of number of friends.


- The payment

The payment for your customer per Post Ad has a minimum value of $1.

If he gets shares and likes, he can receive + $1. 

This extra $1 for shares and likes helps to increase the impact of your add.

This way, 1 Post Ad published by your custumer can reach a minimum of 504 friends = $0,004 by friend.

- New customers

The brands can acquire new customers just through recommendations from their current customers.

- Confidence

A brand that allows the client to advertise its image, is a brand that inspires confidence and gives value to the customer.

- Brand positioning

WinShareZ increase the brands differentiation factor.

Image by Philipp Henzler

WinShareZ was designed for thinking of you.

So what better way to launch our platform than to make you all our ambassadors?

We have been working very hard for the last few months, and WinShareZ is finally a fully functional prototype. Now we need your help to guarantee its launch.

We’re at the starting line, ready and dying to begin. Now it's all up to you!


Join our project and spread the word.

Support WinShareZ, tell your friends and family, and together we can go very far and turn this platform into a reality.


But why should you help us? It’s simple:

- You can be the first to use and benefit from it.

- If you advertise, you automatically win.

- Be part of our history; we can only do it if we do it together.

Help us reach our goal. Spread the word and win with it!


Note: You have to share using your personal URL link. 



Stretch Goals

Help us reach our goals. Spread the word and win with it! 

We are launching our Landing Page.

story:
Simple, intuitive and useful. UnykApp is a mobile application that joins customers and companies needs. This app allows the interaction between customers and companies.

Companies can provide the best service by informing in real time all their offers, promotions and news while customers can find in last minute companies communication.

UnykApp was built into two sections:









Customers can download the App and then connect their favorite companies.

The company can share information or present the customer with unique products or experiences.










Companies can interact directly with their customers.

The companies can choose a precise geolocation to communicate with a specific customer or a group of customers.

















Everyone has a friend or a family member that owns or works in a company, please share with them our vision, opportunity and goal.We can help them!

We have a subscription for their company that will help them to inscrease the business profitability.







Recently we have completed our first Private Program. It was necessary to develop, produce cloud infrastructure and test all functionalities and features of UnykApp.

To provide a platform with a high quality performance we are constantly making tests to guarantee that all application is working as projected!

We ensure a quality app for customers and companies interaction.







UnykApp is an initiative based on the vision of a team that invests in innovative and differentiating solutions, with a thorough knowledge in the technological component and experience in mobility solutions.

We believe in our project.



We are a team focused on business and future projects. We are based in Portugal but we want to make a difference in the world.

People become a team when they believe that together one idea becomes real!





We believe that customers and companies deserve a better interaction.

So, we have created UnykApp.

UnykApp offers you Time. We need time... And You? Time to shop, to eat, to have fun, to relax and most important time to live and appreciate what we love most. With UnykApp, customers and companies can have time.

Companies can communicate the lastest news, deals and promotions while customers can have access to all information.

story:
Hi my name is SHAY and this in short is my story:

Key chains always bothered  me: They are noisy, clumsy and messy.

So I have decided to do something about it and there result is: 

FAN-KEY - a "Swiss-Army" style - key organizer.

Or as i love to call it: #1 Key Organizer In The World.

This is why you want to have it:
You can add between 1 to 50 keys, including keys with plastic head (car keys, etc).
Its made of strong, light weight "aircraft" 6061 aluminum.
It has high level jewelry design.
Its has been hand polished - anodized color coating.
Its easy to setup .

Please read MORE below.

Product Features

FAN-KEY is a unique solution for holding most kinds of keys together. 
No more key jingle or mess in your pocket, FAN-KEY is smooth and quiet. 
FAN-KEY comes with standard screws that can be adjusted or replaced to support more keys! 


FAN-KEY is very easy to setup - no special tools are necessary. 
You can easily add / remove keys from it any time you like.

Unique frame design that lets you add most kind of keys. For example, keys with a rubber head, or car keys.
Small / special keys can be adjusted in different holes to create optimal layouts and smooth operation.
Add USB / Screw Driver / Scissors / bottle opener or any other devices you may need in your daily life.

Material

Strong Light-Weight and Durable - FAN-KEY is made from 100% polished 6061 aluminum alloy. 
Weight is just 1.058 Oz (30 gram). 
Anodized in different beautiful colors to hold against scratches. 
Unique milling cutting technology - FAN-KEY is processed using a CNC machine for accurate, clean, polished finishing



Use  as smartphone holder


Photos from our design office, warehouse and factory.

  
Photos of product.

  


What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise funds which will be used toward mass production of FAN-KEY in china. The idea is to lower costs of production while keeping same quality.

Any contribution will be gladly accepted.


The Impact

Each contributor will get a copy of FAN-KEY - we already have FAN-KEY in stock so each contribution will be fulfilled .

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can can't contribute, please spread the word to your friends, 

thank you!

story:
BALLISTIC BACKPACK INSERT

  • NIJ Level 3a Protection

Ballistic Underwear

Ballistic Under-Shirt

1. Low Cost : We have designed our first backpack insert for under $100

Dont Break Your Bank

2. Mobility: Take your backpack insert wherever you go quickly and easily.

3. Anti-Microbial: Destroy or suppress the growth of harmful micro-organisms such as bacteria, viruses, or fungi. Also helps eliminate odor.

  • Our products have been coated to create antimicrobial barriers everywhere to continually protect vital surfaces and fabrics from the growth of bacteria, mold and fungi.
  • A microbe is a microscopic organism, such as bacteria, fungi or mold. Microbes are so small that there are more on a person’s hand then there are people in the world. The word microbe is often more convenient to use than the word microorganism, and it pretty much means the same thing. In many situations, though, microbe refers to just the harmful microorganisms that cause disease.

4. Low Profile and Lightweight Design : Carbon Nano Tubes allow us to use less product in turn making it very flexible, light weight and thin.

  • Our backpack insert is good for any backpack you may have. It is very flexible and lightweight making it very versatile to the user.

5. Versatility : Whether your going to school,work or traveling the world, don't leave home without your Armour.

 
 

 

Perk #2 T-Shirt

Perk #3 Folding Water Bottle

Perk # 5 Picture frame with Carbon Nano Tubes 

 

The challenges we face are unlike any other business. Our products have passed independent testing with flying colors.  However, U.S. Government regulations require that all products be N.I.J. certified. The cost is approximately $15,000 USD for each product tested.  Once we have NIJ certification we can then proceed to full scale production allowing sales to Military, Police and law abiding citizens. We also need a e-commerce website built that will be able to handle orders and fulfillment.

story:
A fine writing tool can really empower your creativity, helping you to realise your goals and aspirations. X-01 is the rollerball that will transform your writing experience and inspire you to create.

Achieving your creative focus starts by removing all distractions. For this reason, the X-01 does away with bulky caps and clips, in favour of a minimalist, unibody design with an elegant twist mechanism that was custom designed specifically by us for this project. Precision-machined from titanium, brass or aluminium, not only is it exceptionally durable, but its all-metal construction also gives it a distinctively solid feel in hand. All these elements, coupled with a smooth-writing rollerball refill, create a unique writing instrument that channels your creativity.

Being a small independent design studio, we need your help to make this project a reality. With the engineering and prototyping phases already completed, you’ll be helping us launch our first production run of the X-01 pen.

 

  • Timeless minimalist design. Clean lines. Unibody writing instrument. No distracting clip or cap.
  • Elegant twist mechanism. Custom-made retraction mechanism.
  • Built to last. Precision-machined from solid titanium, aluminium or brass.
  • Capless rollerball. Writes much smoother than a ballpoint as it uses water-based ink instead of oil-based ink. Doesn't require a cap (1 year cap off time for the refill).

 Choose one of four options (sets of pens are also available):

You'll be able to choose your aluminium pen colour when we send you the backer survey after the Indiegogo pre-order campaign ends. This is where you'll also tell us your delivery address and other important details.

A 100% metal construction, precision-machined from titanium, brass or aluminium, means the X-01 is extremely tough compared to your average pen. This is an expensive and complex process, but it yields a writing instrument with good weight and balance that feels distinctively solid in your hand.

Even the internal mechanism is made from solid metal and completely custom-made for this project, so it won't let you down, even after many years of use.  

 

The X-01 pen uses a short rollerball refill produced by Schmidt (model P8126) which is widely available from both Amazon and independent stationery retailers, as well as our own website www.namisu.com after the project is completed).

These refills are compatible with your X-01:

  • Schmidt P8126 (included) - Fine 
  • Schmidt P8127 (not included) - Medium
  • Schmidt P8120 (not included) - Broad 
  • Most Parker-style refills.

A rollerball is different from a ballpoint. A rollerball uses water-based ink and needs very little pressure to write for a much smoother, less tiring writing experience. By contrast, a ballpoint uses thick oil-based ink that requires significant pressure to write with, but dries faster.

Aluminium - 27g with refill. Feels light in your hand. Great for everyday writing and long writing sessions.

Titanium - 41g with refill. Slightly noticeable weight but pleasant, solid feel in your hand. Great for everyday writing and long writing sessions.

Brass - 74g with refill. Feels quite heavy. Suitable for light note taking, signatures. 

 

  • Titanium - Lightly brushed machined finish.
  • Brass - Lightly brushed machined finish, which is left uncoated and so will develop a patina over time.
  • Aluminium - Comet Grey or Satin Black anodised coating for high scratch resistance.

Titanium and Brass (Above) 

 

X-01 Aluminium (Satin Black & Comet Grey)

 

The brass material is particularly interesting because it forms a patina that is individual to each user. Over time it will become darker and richer with age as can be seen in the photos below:

Brass darkens and forms a patina over time

 

 

To keep your X-01 safe with style, we've designed premium quality leather sleeves made from natural vegetable tan leather. Add the following amount to your pledge to obtain a sleeve:

  • 1 x leather sleeve -  Add extra £10 to your pledge
  • 2 x leather sleeves - Add extra £18 to your pledge
  • 3 x leather sleeves - Add extra £27 to your pledge

You will choose your sleeve colour after the Indiegogo pre-order campaign is complete. We will send you a survey where you can tell us which colour you want.

You can also add extra sleeves to your pledge after the project is over.

 

The X-01 was designed by Adrien Cols and Maria Millan. Namisu is a design studio based near Edinburgh, United Kingdom.

We have successfully completed three writing instrument projects on Kickstarter with over 3000 backers collectively.

We have completed three large writing instrument projects over the past 2 years on Kickstarter and we will use this experience to successfully deliver your X-01 rollerball. 

Throughout this time, we have developed strong manufacturing relationships with experienced manufacturers which is crucial to delivering a high quality product on time. We are using the same manufacturing techniques as our previous 3 projects and have developed a production prototype. The X-01 is ready to go into production.

We know that there can always be some unexpected delays during production but we have planned for this and extended our production schedule accordingly. Raw materials like bar stock can arrive late during busy periods of the year; machines can break down and require servicing. These are minor delays that can be absorbed easily into our production schedule, and which do not affect the feasibility of the project. 

Another common challenge is fulfilling a project that exceeds its project funding goal significantly. To solve this potential issue we are working with large manufacturers that can produce our pens in any quantity realistically possible on Kickstarter. We do not anticipate any extension of the delivery date unless the project exceeds 3000 backers, at which point we would need to revise the manufacturing completion target date.

We are also working with a professional logistics and fulfilment company which will handle all shipping and packing operations to avoid any delays during the shipping phase of the project.

X-01 is the rollerball that will transform your writing experience and inspire you to create.Achieving your creative focus starts by removing all distractions. For this reason, the X-01 does away with bulky caps and clips, in favour of a minimalist, unibody design with an elegant twist mechanism that was custom designed specifically by us for this project. Precision-machined from titanium, brass or aluminium, not only is it exceptionally durable, but its all-metal construction also gives it a distinctively solid feel in hand. All these elements, coupled with a smooth-writing rollerball refill, create a unique writing instrument that channels your creativity.Being a small independent design studio, we need your help to make this project a reality. With the engineering and prototyping phases already completed, you’ll be helping us launch our first production run of the X-01 pen. 

Timeless minimalist design. Clean lines. Unibody writing instrument. No distracting clip or cap.

Elegant twist mechanism. Custom-made retraction mechanism.

Built to last. Precision-machined from solid titanium, aluminium or brass.

Capless rollerball. Writes much smoother than a ballpoint as it uses water-based ink instead of oil-based ink. Doesn't require a cap (1 year cap off time for the refill).
 Choose one of four options (sets of pens are also available):You'll be able to choose your aluminium pen colour when we send you the backer survey after the Indiegogo pre-order campaign ends. This is where you'll also tell us your delivery address and other important details.A 100% metal construction, precision-machined from titanium, brass or aluminium, means the X-01 is extremely tough compared to your average pen. This is an expensive and complex process, but it yields a writing instrument with good weight and balance that feels distinctively solid in your hand.Even the internal mechanism is made from solid metal and completely custom-made for this project, so it won't let you down, even after many years of use.   The X-01 pen uses a short rollerball refill produced by Schmidt (model P8126) which is widely available from both Amazon and independent stationery retailers, as well as our own website www.namisu.com after the project is completed).These refills are compatible with your X-01:
Schmidt P8126 (included) - Fine 
Schmidt P8127 (not included) - Medium
Schmidt P8120 (not included) - Broad 
Most Parker-style refills.
A rollerball is different from a ballpoint. A rollerball uses water-based ink and needs very little pressure to write for a much smoother, less tiring writing experience. By contrast, a ballpoint uses thick oil-based ink that requires significant pressure to write with, but dries faster.Aluminium - 27g with refill. Feels light in your hand. Great for everyday writing and long writing sessions.Titanium - 41g with refill. Slightly noticeable weight but pleasant, solid feel in your hand. Great for everyday writing and long writing sessions.Brass - 74g with refill. Feels quite heavy. Suitable for light note taking, signatures.  
Titanium - Lightly brushed machined finish.
Brass - Lightly brushed machined finish, which is left uncoated and so will develop a patina over time.
Aluminium - Comet Grey or Satin Black anodised coating for high scratch resistance.
Titanium and Brass (Above)  X-01 Aluminium (Satin Black & Comet Grey) The brass material is particularly interesting because it forms a patina that is individual to each user. Over time it will become darker and richer with age as can be seen in the photos below:Brass darkens and forms a patina over time  To keep your X-01 safe with style, we've designed premium quality leather sleeves made from natural vegetable tan leather. Add the following amount to your pledge to obtain a sleeve:
1 x leather sleeve -  Add extra £10 to your pledge
2 x leather sleeves - Add extra £18 to your pledge
3 x leather sleeves - Add extra £27 to your pledge
You will choose your sleeve colour after the Indiegogo pre-order campaign is complete. We will send you a survey where you can tell us which colour you want.You can also add extra sleeves to your pledge after the project is over. The X-01 was designed by Adrien Cols and Maria Millan. Namisu is a design studio based near Edinburgh, United Kingdom.We have successfully completed three writing instrument projects on Kickstarter with over 3000 backers collectively.We have completed three large writing instrument projects over the past 2 years on Kickstarter and we will use this experience to successfully deliver your X-01 rollerball. Throughout this time, we have developed strong manufacturing relationships with experienced manufacturers which is crucial to delivering a high quality product on time. We are using the same manufacturing techniques as our previous 3 projects and have developed a production prototype. The X-01 is ready to go into production.We know that there can always be some unexpected delays during production but we have planned for this and extended our production schedule accordingly. Raw materials like bar stock can arrive late during busy periods of the year; machines can break down and require servicing. These are minor delays that can be absorbed easily into our production schedule, and which do not affect the feasibility of the project. Another common challenge is fulfilling a project that exceeds its project funding goal significantly. To solve this potential issue we are working with large manufacturers that can produce our pens in any quantity realistically possible on Kickstarter. We do not anticipate any extension of the delivery date unless the project exceeds 3000 backers, at which point we would need to revise the manufacturing completion target date.We are also working with a professional logistics and fulfilment company which will handle all shipping and packing operations to avoid any delays during the shipping phase of the project.

story:
**$500 has been reached and Chuba shaved his head. At 1000 Jordan McMichael and Cody Lawton will be shaving their head.**

We are raising money for The V Foundation for Cancer Research. Many of us have been affected by cancer in one way or another and we all want to fight back against it. Please join us in raising money for this great cause.

Serving as the heartbeat of The V Foundation for Cancer Research, formed by ESPN and Jim Valvano in 1993, his words throughout the ESPY speech inspire millions to get involved. After being diagnosed with cancer at the young age of 46, Jim dreamed of finding cures for cancer. Passionate and committed, he wanted to see his fight through to victory. As a former coach, he began to recruit his team of family and friends to lead The Foundation in his quest to eradicate the disease.

As a cancer patient, Jim recognized the need to invest in young physicians and scientists to help establish their careers—after all, someone had invested in him early in his career! Addressing the need to help early-career cancer investigators develop into promising research talents was the first goal of The Foundation. The V Scholar concept was developed in 1994 to address that need. Today, this highly respected award is eagerly sought by young physicians and scientists at the nation’s leading cancer centers.

As with any patient, Jim discovered first-hand how slowly science progresses from the lab to the patient’s bedside. He wanted faster solutions, more progress and better answers. In 2001, eight years after his death, The V Foundation announced its Translational Research Grants, designed to accelerate laboratory findings with the goal of benefiting patients more quickly.

Although Jim lost his battle with cancer less than two months after delivering the ESPY speech, his dream to find cures lives on through research grants bestowed in his name. The V Foundation has awarded more than $130 million to more than 120 facilities nationwide and proudly awards 100% of direct cash donations to cancer research and related programs. Due to generous donors, The Foundation has an endowment that covers administrative expenses.

The V Foundation has a strong presence in the scientific community, and it is guided by an elite, all-volunteer Scientific Advisory Committee, that recommends the research projects funded. The Committee is comprised of top physicians and research scientists from prominent universities and cancer centers throughout the country. Working with this team of talented professionals, we are proud to carry out Jim’s vision for the future.

Jim’s dream of finding cures for cancer is shared by millions. Although we have not yet achieved this goal, every day we get a little bit closer and continue to honor his inspiring words, “Don’t Give Up . . . Don’t Ever Give Up!” ®

We ask you to join us. Make a donation. Get involved.

story:
Short Summary

If your like me and been a user of the great blogging platform posterous you won't be happy about the news that they have just been purchased by twitter as a 'talent acquistion'. Have a read of their announcement, it doesnt fill you with much hope about the future of posterous.

Twitter has recently acquired the very popular tweetdeck and is pretty much killing it off. Yahoo did similar things when they purchased they hugely popular delicious and flickr just watched them both die due to their neglect.

From the acquistion announcement:

Posterous engineers, product managers and others will join our teams working on several key initiatives that will make Twitter even better

OK, so all the great posterous devs will now be working on twitter stuff. Basically posterous is now in maintenance mode.

We'll give users ample notice if we make any changes to the service

Great. That's a nice way of saying when twitter is sick of maintaining posterous they'll shut it down you'll give me an email

For users who would like to back up their content or move to another service

Thats me - I don't indend to keep my blog and websites on a dieing platform. Octopress is one awesome blog platform and p.ostero.us will bring this awesomeness to the posterous exodus.

What We Need & What You Get

To get p.ostero.us up and running asap we need

Wants in it for you

  • $10 gets you an early beta access account 
  • $100 gets you an alpha access account - meaning access a month or more before beta users
  • $1,000 gets you an alpha account, first choice of sub-domains and your name & link on our home page
  • $10,000 gets an alpha account + your name & link in the footer for ALL blogs we host
    • if we get to where er want to go thats ganna be a hell of alot of links to your site

The Impact

Posterous users need a new home to migrate to now, p.ostero.us is ganna make that happen.  We will be based on the awesome hackers blogging platform Octopress - which is not that user freindly to setup - we'll take care of all that side to make this amazing blogging platform available to everyone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word to any posterous loving people you know

Thanks!!!

Justin Kelly

story:
Unlike any other app, Veem can back-up your voicemails directly from your voicemail carrier. This is due to a patented telephony algorithm that combines two exciting technologies:

  • Voice Recognition and
  • Voip (Voice over the internet protocol) 





2. The carrier systems actually DELETE our voicemails periodically from their servers without ever notifying us.

                                             

These two problems alone made our team look deeper into the world of voicemail technology and as a result, we discovered an alternative and simple way to ensure the voices we treasure most are kept alive for years to come.

The story behind Veem is a whirlwind adventure that took our team all over the country, from Austin to Vegas and everywhere in between. The entire journey can be followed on our blog from conception to the upcoming launch and completion.  After spending the summer of 2013 de-bugging and testing our algorithm, we finally got the results were searching for: our proof of concept!  The screenshot below shows us listening to some Veems on the left, as we download them straight from the carriers' server on the right! 




You’ll be Veem'ing your voicemails with no ads for: 




Your financial support will be put towards the employment of engineers and developers needed to make the Veem Technology perfect and scalable, as well as for coding the app using the latest iOS 8 features.  

The more funds we raise the bigger our technology team will be and the faster we can deliver the Veem app in 2015!

story:
WATCH OUR PROMO VIDEO HERE!

 

WHO ARE WE & WHAT ARE WE UP TO?


Diamond Fortress Technologies, Inc is a software company based in Birmingham, AL and we are proud to introduce to the world our awesome new software module called innerID®.   Basically, innerID® is a software module developed for mobile devices that allows you to scan, match and authenticate your fingerprint using nothing but the the device's existing camera. So what does this mean?!  

THINK ABOUT IT THIS WAY...

What would YOUR world look like if you NEVER had to remember a user name and password again? What if every purchase you made on your mobile devices was completely secured and facilitated by your fingerprint?  What if the only way your mobile phone or tablet could be accessed was by a quick scan of your finger?  What if doors were opened, cars were started, and you clocked in at work with NOTHING but your fingerprint?  innerID® gives us endless possibilities to expand security, freedom, and convenience in our rapidly growing mobile world.

WE NEED YOU!

We are grateful that you would consider helping us fund a few of our projects. Right now we are developing two mobile apps utilizing innerID®:   

Device Unlock App

Using innerID®  we plan to develop our WALlock app that will give you the ability to unlock your phone or tablet with the quick scan of the finger.  That means no more 4-digit pins, no more more patterns with your finger...just the camera taking a picture.

Currently for Android-based devices only, but we will keep you updated.

 

Mobile Wallet App

Using innerID®  we plan to develop our WALit app that stores all of your existing usernames and passwords, credit card information, driver's license, gift cards, tickets, and any other sensitive information.  With the quick scan of your finger, you can login to any website, instantaneously complete the checkout process at a retailer's mobile site, access tickets you've purchased, and much more!

 

Both projects will be designed for consumers and should be available in app stores by the end of the summer. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

Our technology utilizes the devices existing camera to capture a picture of your fingerprint. Upon enrollment, the initial image of your print is converted to a template, which is stored in a secure database and the original image is destroyed.  When you go to unlock, check out, sign in or authorize, the camera will scan your fingerprint and compare the second template with the first. Using a set of complex algorithms and high tech engineering, the fingerprints are captured, converted and matched - all in the blink of an eye.  Not only is this one of the most secure authentication methods on the planet, it takes a lot less time and brain power to remember and type in a password!

TOUCHLESS FINGERPRINT BIOMETRICS... SIMPLY BETTER

For years, some of the biggest companies in the world have been aggressively trying to put biometrics on mobile devices because we all know that usernames and passwords have become too difficult and cumbersome to keep track of.  Additionally, when a website or device verifies your username and password, all it is saying is "we verify that the user knows the username and password."  It does not, however, know that it is the right user!

But what if a website, bank or your device did more than verify that you know the correct credentials, what if it recognized you?  Fingerprint biometrics is clearly the answer to move the world from 'authentication' to 'recognition,' and our apps are clearly the answer to utilizing one of the world's most secure and convenient recognition methods NOW!

Like we said earlier, some of the biggest companies in the world are hard at work trying to introduce this technology to the mobile world.  Even bulky peripherals have been invented to attach to your device.  Here are the two main problems: 

1. Everyone is trying to incorporate biometrics on mobile devices using touch-based sensors.  Touch-based sensors get dirty, they wear out, they don't work half the time, and they are expensive to manufacture and integrate into new devices, meaning phones and tablets have to be redesigned to simply fit in the sensors!

2. Even if phone and tablet manufacturers manage to spend the money, redesign the devices, and manufacture millions of sensors, we STILL won't be able to use this technology until they are introduced on (the most expensive) mobile phones and tablets sometime in the future!

HOWEVER, our biometrics software works on your phone and your tablet TODAY! Not only is your phone or tablet able to utilize these apps today, they will even work with some phones and tablets manufactured 2-3 years ago!  A full list of tested devices will be provided soon. 

DOES IT REALLY WORK?

Yes!  We just completed our first round of testing in an uncontrolled environment, and the testing results were nothing short of amazing.  For a closer look at our results, click here.

Our system delivers unparalleled matching performance, far exceeding current industry leading biometric matching systems and federal standards set forth by NIST and used by organizations such as the FBI.

OUR FINAL THOUGHTS

Again, thanks for checking us out!  We ask that you consider supporting us because we feel that we are on the precipice of something HUGE, and we want you to come along for the ride.  We are the little guys -  minnows in the shark tank - but we are about to make a big splash.  The WALit and WALlock apps are just the start, but an IMPORTANT start because the apps will be created for the most important group of people...the end-users...YOU!  We want to put some hard work into making your experience with our technology nothing short of awesome.  And when we pull it off, we are confident that word will get around.

Sure, we have visions of stardom and showcasing our tech across the world.  But really, we are just ready to bring the world the solution it has been waiting for - to eradicate our lives of ever-changing, cumbersome, questionably-secure usernames and passwords!  

We are sick of it, you are sick of it, so let's not wait any longer. Let's bring the only apps featuring fingerprint biometrics using NO additional hardware to the world together!

OUR COMPANY

We have managed to assemble a team of rockstar developers, tech guys and business guys!  Please visit our website here for a list of our executive team.

We are also proud members of the FIDO Alliance, an organization founded by some big-time players dedicated to changing online and mobile authentication methods.

GIVE PASSWORDS THE FINGER™!

By supporting us, you are supporting our Give Passwords the Finger™ campaign!  We are currently designing some pretty cool stuff to give to our supporters like t-shirts, decals, virtual skins etc.  We will provide some mock ups when they are ready on one of our websites.  Check back soon!

FAQs

What does "WAL" mean?

"WAL" stands for the three main fingerprint patterns - Whorl, Arch, and Loop.

Could someone take a picture of my finger and use that to access my device or financial information?

No, our software knows the difference between capturing multi-planal (3D) objects and 2D images.

I don't know if I feel comfortable with my fingerprint stored somewhere... What happens to my fingerprint?

The original image of the fingerprint is destroyed!

 

Stay tuned for more FAQ as we get them!
