story:
Who are we?

We are Solaborate — an end-to-end encrypted communication and collaboration company. We believe that simplifying communication tools and service represents our greatest opportunity to improve people's lives. With the unbelievable support of a community of 900+ people from 60 countries all over the world, and shipping 100% of HELLO 1 Communication devices to all our backers last year, we're incredibly excited to present to you three HELLO 2 products:    

1. HELLO 2  
2. HELLO Touch TV + Whiteboarding  
3. HELLO Creator Edition

 

HELLO 2 - The World's Most Powerful Communication Device 

With significantly improved hardware and software, the second generation HELLO 2 transforms any TV into the world’s most powerful communication device for video conferencing, digital whiteboarding, wireless screen sharing, Alexa and Google Voice Assistant, TV streaming, gaming, live broadcasting, camera feed with motion and voice detection + infrared night vision, and more.

The HELLO Solaborate Messenger platform has been in the making for more than 6 years. With tight integration across our devices and mobile/PC platforms, we aim to make collaboration seamless. HELLO Messenger can be easily accessed via your Android, iOS, Web and Desktop Clients. HELLO 2 will also support the best video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Meet, Zoom, Cisco WebEx, Facebook Messenger, WeChat, BlueJeans, Polycom RealPresence, Fuze, Unify, and more.

HELLO Touch - Real time Video Conferencing & Whiteboarding

Powered by HELLO 2, the 55-inch and 65-inch HELLO Touch are the smartest and most affordable 4K Touch TV with 10 multi-touch points for real-time collaboration, digital whiteboarding, video conferencing, wireless sharing, and more.

The primary function of HELLO Touch is to serve as a digital whiteboard with tight video and audio ingratiation so that your virtual teams in other physical locations can collaborate in real-time from any device without limitations.

 
 

The possibilities of HELLO Touch and Whiteboarding are virtually endless. 

 

HELLO Creator Edition

This version of HELLO is designed and built specifically with the developer community in mind and we cannot wait to see what developers from all over the world will build on top of our platform.

HELLO Creator Edition comes in a transparent casing, letting you see the inner workings of the device, which reflects our open source ideology in a physical aspect. Developers can build any hardware gadget extensions or software applications on top of our open platform.

The Making of HELLO 2 

Having learned a lot from the HELLO 1 experience and your feedback, making HELLO 2 in a sense was much easier. However we’ve spent much more work on ensuring that our passion for beautiful hardware and software is translated into a reliable and manufacturable device. Hardware and software quality testing, reliability testing and manufacturing setup have been our go to words all along this project and we feel proud and ready to share our work and love with you.

 

HELLO 2 for your Home

Secure, sleek and feature-packed, HELLO 2 brings a whole range of new possibilities to life and is the ultimate all-in-one communication device for your home and office. It comes with built-in speakers, infrared night vision, Zigbee for home automation, NFC, hardware-based privacy buttons and 152-degree FOV coverage with automatic tilting.

Video & Audio Calls

 

Crystal Clear Audio and Video Calls  

HELLO 2 aims to make your life easier via communications. Need to make unlimited one on one or group audio and video calls for free whenever you need to stay in touch with your family and friends? With HELLO, they’re just a call away! HELLO 2 offers a crystal clear unlimited audio and video calls for free anytime you need to stay in touch with your loved ones.

 

We love our phones, but sometimes, after a long busy day, they are a drag. That is why we integrated the magic of Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant into the HELLO 2 - to always answer your questions and commands.  Listen to your favorite playlists, make audio and video calls, send and receive messages, get weather and forecast information, find out sports scores, order food, and more — in real time!

Alexa and Google Assistant

Interact with your favorite voice assistant productively and let it integrate with your routine to help you get things done! Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant are able to learn from your behavior and be there for you whenever you need them to.

Alexa Voice Assistant

 

Google Assistant

 

Wireless Screencasting and Screen Sharing

With HELLO 2 it's super easy to share and cast any content in real time from your phone or laptop while you are near the TV or away from it. Share an experience, a picture or a funny video with everyone in the room with the wireless screencasting feature of HELLO 2.

Wireless Screencasting

 

Wireless Screen Sharing

 

Camera Feed With Motion Detection and Night Vision 

Easily check on your home, kids, or pets – when out and away. And if any unusual activities may occur — when uninvited friends come by or even Santa dropping by — motion-activated notifications will pop on your phone, offering you an excellent and secure connection with your home, when needed.
 

The Camera Feed of HELLO 2 is packed with motion detection as well as infrared night vision features which offer you full power and let you know whenever something moves in front of your HELLO at home so you will be alerted at all times and take the necessary measures, even when it’s dark.

Seamless Home Automation

HELLO 2 has full integration and support with Alexa and Google Assistant for full home automation compatibility. Create your personal area network for home automation with Zigbee which can be easily installed in your home with no need for additional cables.

Create your personal area network for home automation with Zigbee which can be easily installed in your home with no need for additional cables.

Gaming & TV Streaming

Switch to your favorite TV Mode - be it Gaming or TV Streaming, whenever you feel like playing video games or watching movies with your family and friends.
 

HELLO Gaming

We all know the best bonding memories with your family and friends happen when you play games and have fun in each other’s company. HELLO brings that fun back to the big screen in your living room. Just switch to Gaming Mode and play any Android game you want whenever you need a refreshing short break.


HELLO TV Streaming

 

The TV Streaming mode will allow you to only see streaming apps on your Home Screen. Watch TV through any Android app you have installed on your HELLO to follow your favorite series or movies using Netflix, Youtube, HBO NOW, KODI or other TV streaming providers.   No need for extra cables or boxes. All you have to do is find time to catch up with the latest episodes, sit back, and enjoy.

 

Built-in Hack-Proof Video and Audio Controls for Ultimate Privacy

 
We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right and that’s why we engineered HELLO 2 with two built-in hack-proof privacy controls and end-to-end encryption for everyone’s protection and peace of mind. Unless hackers come to your office or home in person, there is no way for them to access the audio and video of your HELLO 2 when you’ve deactivated them with the privacy buttons. When you activate them, the microphone and camera lines are physically cut from the system (going into the SoC). Therefore no software can control them.
 
 

HELLO 2 for your Office

Video & Audio Calls

 

Crystal Clear Audio and Video Calls  

Tired of having to spend the first 10-15 minutes of every online meeting trying to properly establish the call or making sure you hear each-other? HELLO completely eliminates this problem by offering you crystal clear unlimited audio and video conference calls for free, anytime you need to have an online meeting with your remote teams, clients, or even potential customers.  

HELLO 2 is equipped with powerful hardware, with a 4K HDR sensor, an array of 4 beamforming microphones for noise cancellation, makes sure to pick up sounds and your expressions from a distance 8m+, even in the most challenging environments. To start an instant video or audio call, use our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or any other app of your choice.

 
 

Collaboration Mode 

Collaboration Mode allows you to link your Google or Office 365 Calendars and start meetings directly from your HELLO, with just one click. Whether the meeting was scheduled in Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom or other communication apps, HELLO will open them and your meeting will be ready to start.
 

HELLO Rooms Controller

Never second guess a room’s schedule. HELLO Rooms Controller app is designed to start a meeting with one click. It supports both HELLO video app and third-party video apps. Its has built in integration with Google and Office 365 calendar so that scheduling and meeting is super simple. It also has SIP Phone dial-in and out including interoperability between SIP clients. You do not own a Touch TV ? No Problem, HELLO Rooms Controller will allow you to cast your touch input to any TV.  

 

Install any Android Apps 

HELLO 2 comes with numerous pre-installed apps such as Skype, Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, WeChat, Amazon Chime, Google Hangouts Meet, GoToMeeting, BlueJeans, WebEx and more.   
 

HELLO 2 Integration with Microsoft Teams 

 
Besides pre-installed apps, you’ll be able to install any apps of YOUR choice. Grab the freedom to personalize your HELLO and bring all your favorite apps in one place.

 

Dual Screen Support 

The new dual-screen feature allows you to connect HELLO 2 with two TVs at the same time so that you can use two different features on two separate TVs.
 
 

Easy Setup and Control

HELLO 2 is lightweight, compact, and easy to set up. Simply unbox it, plug in the power adapter and connect the HELLO device to any TV via an HDMI cable. Download the HELLO Solaborate Messenger app to scan your unique QR code and you’re good to go within two minutes!

To assure you have the best possible experience, you have the option to control the device through its hardware air mouse remote control that comes with it inside the box, or through the remote app for both Android and iOS. Just pick your favorite!

Automatic Tilting

To ensure full-view for professional-quality video HELLO 2 offers automatic tilting. Adjust the tilting remotely through our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or by simply touching the ring around the HELLO 2 camera.
 
 

Automatic Tilting - View from the HELLO 2 

 
                                    

Crafted from 6000 Series Aluminium & High-Quality plastics/silicone, HELLO 2 offers reliable durability combined with elegance to best fit any home or office.

With HELLO Creator Edition we're showing the inner workings of HELLO 2, both physical and software so we can feed our engineering spirit and build what we love together. Transparent. Open. Beautiful.

Check out all Hardware APIs

  • Programmable 4K Camera
  • 4 Far Field Beamforming Microphones
  • Automatic Camera Tilt & Digital Zoom
  • Voice Recognition And Controls
  • LED Camera Ring
  • Programmable Speakers
  • Programmable Touch
  • Connectivity with Bluetooth, Zigbee, NFC, WiFi and Ethernet
  • Neural Processing Engine
  • Face Recognition using 4K Camera
  • Image Recognition and Object Detection
  • Home Automation

Near Field Communication (NFC)

NFC will allow you to easily jump into a whiteboarding session or video conferencing room, and share content or files of your choice through the HELLO 2 by simply bringing your phone close to the device.  
 
When you join any office meeting room that uses HELLO 2, you can be set up and ready to go with a personalized experience in a matter of seconds!
 

Product Timeline

 

SHIPPING HAS STARTED! 

We are proud to say that we have started shipping all the order that were placed on Kickstarter and IndieGoGo. All new orders coming through IndieGoGo, will be shipped within 7  to 14 days from the moment the order is placed.

Stay Tuned with US

Thank you so much for your continuous support! To keep up with the latest updates on HELLO, follow us on our social media channels:

Meet HELLO Team

The hard work and dedication of our HELLO Team has been truly unbelievable these past few years and creating the next-generation of HELLO and 4 other innovative HELLO products, has been our greatest achievement!    
 
These top-of-the-line HELLO products have not only helped us increase productivity internally white building HELLO products and apps, but have helped an immense amount of people and teams all over the world increase their efficiency and improve their work-life balance as well.  
 
But we couldn’t be here without you so we cannot thank you enough for all your help and constant support!

HELLO 2 will also support the best video conferencing platforms such as Microsoft Teams, Skype for Business, Google Hangouts Meet, Zoom, Cisco WebEx, Facebook Messenger, WeChat, BlueJeans, Polycom RealPresence, Fuze, Unify, and more.

 



HELLO Touch - Real time Video Conferencing & Whiteboarding

Powered by HELLO 2, the 55-inch and 65-inch HELLO Touch are the smartest and most affordable 4K Touch TV with 10 multi-touch points for real-time collaboration, digital whiteboarding, video conferencing, wireless sharing, and more.
The primary function of HELLO Touch is to serve as a digital whiteboard with tight video and audio ingratiation so that your virtual teams in other physical locations can collaborate in real-time from any device without limitations.


 
 


The possibilities of HELLO Touch and Whiteboarding are virtually endless. 

 
HELLO Creator Edition

This version of HELLO is designed and built specifically with the developer community in mind and we cannot wait to see what developers from all over the world will build on top of our platform.

HELLO Creator Edition comes in a transparent casing, letting you see the inner workings of the device, which reflects our open source ideology in a physical aspect. Developers can build any hardware gadget extensions or software applications on top of our open platform.



The Making of HELLO 2 


Having learned a lot from the HELLO 1 experience and your feedback, making HELLO 2 in a sense was much easier. However we’ve spent much more work on ensuring that our passion for beautiful hardware and software is translated into a reliable and manufacturable device. Hardware and software quality testing, reliability testing and manufacturing setup have been our go to words all along this project and we feel proud and ready to share our work and love with you.

 
 
HELLO 2 for your Home
Secure, sleek and feature-packed, HELLO 2 brings a whole range of new possibilities to life and is the ultimate all-in-one communication device for your home and office. It comes with built-in speakers, infrared night vision, Zigbee for home automation, NFC, hardware-based privacy buttons and 152-degree FOV coverage with automatic tilting.



Video & Audio Calls


 
Crystal Clear Audio and Video Calls  


HELLO 2 aims to make your life easier via communications. Need to make unlimited one on one or group audio and video calls for free whenever you need to stay in touch with your family and friends? With HELLO, they’re just a call away! HELLO 2 offers a crystal clear unlimited audio and video calls for free anytime you need to stay in touch with your loved ones.


 
We love our phones, but sometimes, after a long busy day, they are a drag. That is why we integrated the magic of Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant into the HELLO 2 - to always answer your questions and commands.  Listen to your favorite playlists, make audio and video calls, send and receive messages, get weather and forecast information, find out sports scores, order food, and more — in real time!

Alexa and Google Assistant
Interact with your favorite voice assistant productively and let it integrate with your routine to help you get things done! Alexa Voice Assistant and Google Assistant are able to learn from your behavior and be there for you whenever you need them to.
Alexa Voice Assistant


 
Google Assistant



 
Wireless Screencasting and Screen Sharing
With HELLO 2 it's super easy to share and cast any content in real time from your phone or laptop while you are near the TV or away from it. Share an experience, a picture or a funny video with everyone in the room with the wireless screencasting feature of HELLO 2.
Wireless Screencasting


 Wireless Screen Sharing


 
Camera Feed With Motion Detection and Night Vision 
Easily check on your home, kids, or pets – when out and away. And if any unusual activities may occur — when uninvited friends come by or even Santa dropping by — motion-activated notifications will pop on your phone, offering you an excellent and secure connection with your home, when needed.
 

The Camera Feed of HELLO 2 is packed with motion detection as well as infrared night vision features which offer you full power and let you know whenever something moves in front of your HELLO at home so you will be alerted at all times and take the necessary measures, even when it’s dark.



Seamless Home Automation
HELLO 2 has full integration and support with Alexa and Google Assistant for full home automation compatibility. Create your personal area network for home automation with Zigbee which can be easily installed in your home with no need for additional cables.


Create your personal area network for home automation with Zigbee which can be easily installed in your home with no need for additional cables.

Gaming & TV Streaming
Switch to your favorite TV Mode - be it Gaming or TV Streaming, whenever you feel like playing video games or watching movies with your family and friends.
 

HELLO Gaming

We all know the best bonding memories with your family and friends happen when you play games and have fun in each other’s company. HELLO brings that fun back to the big screen in your living room. Just switch to Gaming Mode and play any Android game you want whenever you need a refreshing short break.
HELLO TV Streaming



 
The TV Streaming mode will allow you to only see streaming apps on your Home Screen. Watch TV through any Android app you have installed on your HELLO to follow your favorite series or movies using Netflix, Youtube, HBO NOW, KODI or other TV streaming providers.   No need for extra cables or boxes. All you have to do is find time to catch up with the latest episodes, sit back, and enjoy.
 


Built-in Hack-Proof Video and Audio Controls for Ultimate Privacy

 We believe that privacy is a fundamental human right and that’s why we engineered HELLO 2 with two built-in hack-proof privacy controls and end-to-end encryption for everyone’s protection and peace of mind. Unless hackers come to your office or home in person, there is no way for them to access the audio and video of your HELLO 2 when you’ve deactivated them with the privacy buttons. When you activate them, the microphone and camera lines are physically cut from the system (going into the SoC). Therefore no software can control them.
 
 

HELLO 2 for your Office
Video & Audio Calls

 
Crystal Clear Audio and Video Calls  


Tired of having to spend the first 10-15 minutes of every online meeting trying to properly establish the call or making sure you hear each-other? HELLO completely eliminates this problem by offering you crystal clear unlimited audio and video conference calls for free, anytime you need to have an online meeting with your remote teams, clients, or even potential customers.  
HELLO 2 is equipped with powerful hardware, with a 4K HDR sensor, an array of 4 beamforming microphones for noise cancellation, makes sure to pick up sounds and your expressions from a distance 8m+, even in the most challenging environments. To start an instant video or audio call, use our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or any other app of your choice.

 

 
Collaboration Mode 




Collaboration Mode allows you to link your Google or Office 365 Calendars and start meetings directly from your HELLO, with just one click. Whether the meeting was scheduled in Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom or other communication apps, HELLO will open them and your meeting will be ready to start.
 
HELLO Rooms Controller

Never second guess a room’s schedule. HELLO Rooms Controller app is designed to start a meeting with one click. It supports both HELLO video app and third-party video apps. Its has built in integration with Google and Office 365 calendar so that scheduling and meeting is super simple. It also has SIP Phone dial-in and out including interoperability between SIP clients. You do not own a Touch TV ? No Problem, HELLO Rooms Controller will allow you to cast your touch input to any TV.  
 
Install any Android Apps 

HELLO 2 comes with numerous pre-installed apps such as Skype, Skype for Business, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, WeChat, Amazon Chime, Google Hangouts Meet, GoToMeeting, BlueJeans, WebEx and more.   
 
HELLO 2 Integration with Microsoft Teams 

 
Besides pre-installed apps, you’ll be able to install any apps of YOUR choice. Grab the freedom to personalize your HELLO and bring all your favorite apps in one place.

 
Dual Screen Support 
The new dual-screen feature allows you to connect HELLO 2 with two TVs at the same time so that you can use two different features on two separate TVs.
 


 Easy Setup and Control


HELLO 2 is lightweight, compact, and easy to set up. Simply unbox it, plug in the power adapter and connect the HELLO device to any TV via an HDMI cable. Download the HELLO Solaborate Messenger app to scan your unique QR code and you’re good to go within two minutes!

To assure you have the best possible experience, you have the option to control the device through its hardware air mouse remote control that comes with it inside the box, or through the remote app for both Android and iOS. Just pick your favorite!
Automatic Tilting

To ensure full-view for professional-quality video HELLO 2 offers automatic tilting. Adjust the tilting remotely through our HELLO Solaborate Messenger app or by simply touching the ring around the HELLO 2 camera.
 

 
Automatic Tilting - View from the HELLO 2 

 


 
                                     
 
Crafted from 6000 Series Aluminium & High-Quality plastics/silicone, HELLO 2 offers reliable durability combined with elegance to best fit any home or office.


Open and Programmable 
With HELLO Creator Edition we're showing the inner workings of HELLO 2, both physical and software so we can feed our engineering spirit and build what we love together. Transparent. Open. Beautiful.
Check out all Hardware APIs

Programmable 4K Camera
4 Far Field Beamforming Microphones
Automatic Camera Tilt & Digital Zoom
Voice Recognition And Controls
LED Camera Ring
Programmable Speakers
Programmable Touch
Connectivity with Bluetooth, Zigbee, NFC, WiFi and Ethernet
Neural Processing Engine
Face Recognition using 4K Camera
Image Recognition and Object Detection
Home Automation

 
Check out all Software APIs

Programmable Audio
Programmable Video
Programmable Messaging and Chat
Programmable Live Streaming
Programmable Screen Sharing
Programmable Virtual Video Meeting 
Whiteboarding and Collaboration
Voice Assistant and Skills
Live Chat Support for Companies

Near Field Communication (NFC)
NFC will allow you to easily jump into a whiteboarding session or video conferencing room, and share content or files of your choice through the HELLO 2 by simply bringing your phone close to the device.  
 


When you join any office meeting room that uses HELLO 2, you can be set up and ready to go with a personalized experience in a matter of seconds!
 
Product Timeline

 
SHIPPING HAS STARTED! 
We are proud to say that we have started shipping all the order that were placed on Kickstarter and IndieGoGo. All new orders coming through IndieGoGo, will be shipped within 7  to 14 days from the moment the order is placed.


Stay Tuned with US

Thank you so much for your continuous support! To keep up with the latest updates on HELLO, follow us on our social media channels:
 
 
 
Meet HELLO Team

The hard work and dedication of our HELLO Team has been truly unbelievable these past few years and creating the next-generation of HELLO and 4 other innovative HELLO products, has been our greatest achievement!    

 
These top-of-the-line HELLO products have not only helped us increase productivity internally white building HELLO products and apps, but have helped an immense amount of people and teams all over the world increase their efficiency and improve their work-life balance as well.  
 
But we couldn’t be here without you so we cannot thank you enough for all your help and constant support!

story:
We created the Veego Stand to solve a common problem - 'the Laptop Hunch'. Designed to be the perfect laptop companion for all laptop users, who, like us, work, play and create on the go. Our first crowdfunding campaign on Kickstarter was a great success, helping us successfully launch the Veego Stand.

 

 

 

Bad posture cause problems. There is a growing number of people suffering from ‘laptop hunch’, a term that is familiar to an increasing number of people. The medical diagnosis for computer back is posterior cervical dorsal syndrome. Dr. Vic Weatherall describes the condition:

A very common postural syndrome in modern society involves excessive rearward curving of your lower, middle, and upper back; forward drawn head; rounded shoulders; and excessive forward curving of your upper neck...It is a natural result of prolonged sitting work, especially with computers.

 

 

A Lifted Screen

What’s the solution? Use a laptop stand.  

BUT…  

The Problem with most Laptop Stands  

  • They’re bulky - making them hard to carry around with you on the go, you might not have a lot of space to set up a laptop stand. 
  • They require an external keyboard and mouse - when you include the stand, that's 3 additional items you have to bring along with your laptop. That’s extra weight and extra space in your bag. And extra things to remember.
  • They’re inconvenient - most take too much time to set up and pack up, making you less likely to use one. 
  • They stand out (in an awkward way) - at a coffee shop, you don't want to be "that" guy that sets up an entire workstation. 

 

 

Increases Productivity - Studies have shown that a tilted keyboard helps to improve the accuracy of typing. The Veego Stand raises your keyboard without adding extra strain to your wrists and hands.

Better for your Back - Lifts your laptop screen 2 inches to relieve neck and shoulder strain. Does 2 inches really make a difference? Yes, studies have shown for every inch you can sit straighter, you take 10 pounds of weight off your spine.

 

 

Easy to Set Up - It's as easy to use as your laptop, taking less than 2 seconds to set up.

 

Easy to Pack Away - Simply close your laptop, collapse the Veego Stand, click it in place, and slip it into your bag.

 

Attachable, Removable Infinite times! - The Veego Stand attaches to your laptop with an innovative micro-suction pad, which allows you to attach and re-attach it without losing its stickiness. It also leaves no residue or marks when removed. 

 

 

Exceptionally Portable - The Veego Stand is only 3.9 mm thin (less than 5/32"), the equivalent of 2 nickels stacked. At 83 grams light (2.9 oz), it weighs as much as a small box of paper clips. And because it stays attached to your laptop, it's super easy to take with you everywhere your laptop goes.

 

Keeps Laptop Cool - Elevating the laptop allows for better airflow and ventilation, keeping your laptop cooler and extending the battery life.

 

Extremely Strong and Durable - The Veego Stand is made from a top quality German patented aluminium and polymer core material usually used for buildings. Leading European test lab RWTÜV testing has shown that the hinge application is unimpaired even after 80,000 bends. If you were to open your Veego Stand 10 times a day, it would last you 21 years.  

 

Compatible with a Wide Range of Laptops - Supports laptops from 11” to 18". 

Doesn't Scratch - The Veego Stand's base is aluminium and doesn't scratch the surfaces it's on. 

** Option to add Cork Lining to the Base ** - For those who want some extra grip for their Veego Stand, you'll have the option to add a thin layer of cork to the base. This will be sent to you as a separate piece and you can add it to your Veego Stand whenever you want. The cork gives the Veego Stand extra friction against your work surface. 

 

Size and Weight

Length (folded): 11.0 cm / 4.3 in
Width: 24.0 cm / 9.4 in
Thickness (without cork): 3.9 mm / 0.15 in (equivalent to 2 nickels stacked)
Thickness (with cork): 4.9mm / 0.19 in
Expanded Height : 5.4 cm / 2.1 in
Weight: 83 grams / 2.9 oz (equivalent to a small box of paper clips)

Composite Panel: This patented German material is plastic (polymer core) on the inside and aluminium on the outsides. This makes the material very strong but extremely light. 

Hinges: For the hinges, the aluminium layers are cut off leaving the plastic, allowing for Veego Stand to bend. Leading European test lab RWTÜV testing has shown that the hinge application is unimpaired even after 80,000 bends. If you were to open your Veego Stand 10 times a day, it would last you 21 years.

Microsuction Pads: This innovative material is covered in microscopic suction cups to create thousands of partial vacuums between the pad and the laptop. The microsuction pads deliver a strong, glue-like hold, without the permanence or residue of glue. The microsuction pads can be cleaned and made sticky again by using tape to remove any debris or dust collected on the pad. 

3D Printed ABS Plastic: The two black slots on the sides of the Veego Stand are 3D printed with ABS plastic, a material known for its impact resistance and toughness. 

Cork Liner: A thin adhesive natural cork liner can be added to the base of the Veego Stand for more grip.

 

 

Media/Press Kit available at: www.veego.com/media-kit

 

 

 

 

 

Will the Veego Stand work on any laptop? 

The Veego Stand is designed to be used on laptops with screen sizes between 11" and 18". 

Will the Veego Stand scratch the table it's on?

No. The base is aluminium and doesn't scratch the surfaces it's on. You will also have the option to add a thin cork liner to the base, to reduce sliding and add extra protection against scratching. 

Does the microsuction pad lose its stickiness? 

No, the microsuction pad is designed to be reusable. Over time debris will collect on the microsuction pad and make it less sticky. If you notice that it's not as sticky as before, simply clean it with tape. You can also clean it by wiping it with a wet cloth.

Does it come in different colours? 

There are no plans for colours for the current version of the Veego Stand. We might explore that option if there is enough demand in the version.

 

 

ABOUT THE DESIGN  |  A NOTE FROM THE CREATOR

As a frequently travelling engineer, my laptop was the only computer I owned. When I noticed pain in my neck and shoulders from “Laptop Hunch,” I created a temporary laptop stand out of a notebook and my phone. Embarrassingly, not only was it too flimsy, it also broke my phone.

I was disappointed that everything on the market was bulky or required that I bring along an extra keyboard and mouse. So I set out to make a laptop stand that I could carry around with me as easily as I carry my laptop. I wanted something strong and supportive, yet with a minimalist aesthetic that wouldn’t cause me to feel self-conscious about using in public.

In the last few months, after moving from Singapore to Vancouver, I have been working hard on the Veego Stand, pursuing my long-time dream of inventing. After putting together a team to work with me, investing hundreds of hours into the design, going through 7 prototypes, and gathering feedback from dozens of people, the Veego Stand is finally ready.

 

Kelvin Sim

Creator of the Veego Stand

story:
"I love this planner, it's like five planners I am currently using in one."  

This is the best thing I've heard about the January PDF version of the planner. 

 

Are you totally obsessed with planners but feel like you never find the perfect one? 

Or, you’re not really into planners but would you like to help a self-funded entrepreneur bring out an amazing productivity product into the world?

...or all of the above?

I'm an NYC artist and creative entrepreneur and I envision a world in which every individual is free to design a life of personal success. That starts with being clear on our goals & tracking them. 

My mission:

To inspire, encourage & motivate individuals, to pave their own way to success by navigating modern-day life and creating success on their own terms.  

The Product: A planner.

I created my own planner because as a busy, commuting, NYC woman, I didn't want to carry a big, bulky planner anymore. Especially a spiral-bound planner that would get stuck on my sweaters and cling to my purse pockets or get my keys mixed into them. 

If I have one word to describe how I feel about writing things down in a planner, it would be: Grateful! 

Why? Because if it wasn't for writing things down and constantly looking at them, I wouldn't be where I am today. 

My planners won't just have lines across a page, it will have inspirational quotes, a space to write what your leading affirmation for the month is, and very importantly, a place to write down your Quarterly and Monthly Goals. 

Tracking our goals is key to making things happen! Words have power and writing those down, even more. 

_________________________________

There is no need to overwhelm yourself with trying to map out the whole year if it doesn't work for you. If it does, awesome, and that's not to say there isn't a space to write your yearly goals in the first Quarter Planner of the 2020 Modern Woman Planner. 

 

What I am creating: 

Quarterly 2020 Modern Woman Planner.

It's a physical 6 X 9  saddle-stitched book. 

52 pages printed in black & white. 

16pt C2S with a full color printed cover. 

That means I will create four versions: 

Jan-March

April-June

July-September

October-December

I've hired an experienced planner designer to help me carry out this project and make sure the printing is carried out correctly. 

We have focused on the first quarter planner and will print out 50 copies of those the prototype. 

 

The Idea: 

An easy to carry 6 X 9 stitched quarterly planner. 

I wanted to create a planner for a long time but before I ventured into creating a "book," I embarked on creating a version that people could download from my website. 

What the other planners are lacking that my planner has:

No room to write down the yearly goals.

No tracking system

Too big and heavy! 

Too many pages for categories no one cares to use. 

The weeks start on Monday and the weekends are towards the end of the weekly page.

The month view of the planner also starts on Monday. 

 

How I started: 

A Month-to-Month download:

With the help of a designer friend, I was able to create the first pages that were to go out as a free download.

Every month, I would email those on my mailing list, the monthly planner so that they could keep track of their goals, month to month and also weekly.

After receiving great compliments on them and hearing how using the sheets helped them complete projects and stay on track of all their to-do's I was inspired to keep going.

Then I created a Quarterly Planner for download. 

I self-funded the creation of Quarterly Planners that would also be available as a download.

Some people would download the sheets and enter them into a spiral notebook to keep them in place! 

I knew I had to create one that women could carry around and not have to go to a store to find a notebook or folder to place them in. 

Where we are now:

I decided to hire a designer that has experience creating planners. 

She's already created a cover page & back page.

The beautiful salmon/peachy color has been selected.

And my current Mastermind group has been using and loving the January version of the planner. 

One of the best parts about this planner is that it's a quarter of the year.

Meaning, the first round will be January-March.

This really helps to get clearer on the goals at hand and focus on the year from quarter to quarter.

I need your help to see this through.

What I need: 

I'm looking to raise $2,500.

I'm self-funding the project and I have been doing so and providing the download version of the first drafts of the planners.

This allowed me to test the product before a full investment. 

I've self-funded $1,700 so far (not including creating the first versions that would go out monthly to the email list) of the $4,700 total.

This would ensure the design of the Modern Woman Planner and I can tweak the rest of the years as they come along. 

Reaching my goal won't only help me make my first product a reality, I will show other entrepreneurs how they can also make their products a reality. 

What you get with perks:

With a $25 perk, or more you get a copy of the printed First Quarter Planner (includes shipping). 

With a $5 perk, you get a digital download of the January Planner & a very big thanks from me and Joey (the cutie Cat, my assistant). 

For a $100 perk, you get the four Quarter planners as they are printed.  Updates will be posted on the page. 

What if I want to help and I don’t want a planner?

I just want to contribute: 

Donations on any amount are possible. Anywhere from $1 to ….

Launch Party!

I can't wait to thank you in person at the soft launch party! Save the Date: February 29th. 

 

Risks & Challenges:

I'm a one-woman show, but if you know anything about me, I make it happen. 

The biggest risk is that the first planner will not be ready by February 1. January has sailed but getting this out in February is better than nothing at all. 

To help this issue, everyone that donates will get the January download version of the planner. 

The color of the planner may be slightly different than that shown on the screen. 

If I am missing any info, please let me know!

Or, you’re not really into planners but would you like to help a self-funded entrepreneur bring out an amazing productivity product into the world?
...or all of the above?
I'm an NYC artist and creative entrepreneur and I envision a world in which every individual is free to design a life of personal success. That starts with being clear on our goals & tracking them. 
My mission:
To inspire, encourage & motivate individuals, to pave their own way to success by navigating modern-day life and creating success on their own terms.  
The Product: A planner.
I created my own planner because as a busy, commuting, NYC woman, I didn't want to carry a big, bulky planner anymore. Especially a spiral-bound planner that would get stuck on my sweaters and cling to my purse pockets or get my keys mixed into them. 
If I have one word to describe how I feel about writing things down in a planner, it would be: Grateful! 
Why? Because if it wasn't for writing things down and constantly looking at them, I wouldn't be where I am today. 
My planners won't just have lines across a page, it will have inspirational quotes, a space to write what your leading affirmation for the month is, and very importantly, a place to write down your Quarterly and Monthly Goals. 
Tracking our goals is key to making things happen! Words have power and writing those down, even more. 
_________________________________
There is no need to overwhelm yourself with trying to map out the whole year if it doesn't work for you. If it does, awesome, and that's not to say there isn't a space to write your yearly goals in the first Quarter Planner of the 2020 Modern Woman Planner.  What I am creating: 
Quarterly 2020 Modern Woman Planner.
It's a physical 6 X 9  saddle-stitched book. 
52 pages printed in black & white. 
16pt C2S with a full color printed cover. 
That means I will create four versions: 
Jan-March
April-June
July-September
October-December
I've hired an experienced planner designer to help me carry out this project and make sure the printing is carried out correctly. 
We have focused on the first quarter planner and will print out 50 copies of those the prototype.  The Idea: 
An easy to carry 6 X 9 stitched quarterly planner. 
I wanted to create a planner for a long time but before I ventured into creating a "book," I embarked on creating a version that people could download from my website. 
What the other planners are lacking that my planner has:
No room to write down the yearly goals.
No tracking system
Too big and heavy! 
Too many pages for categories no one cares to use. 
The weeks start on Monday and the weekends are towards the end of the weekly page.
The month view of the planner also starts on Monday.  How I started: 
A Month-to-Month download:
With the help of a designer friend, I was able to create the first pages that were to go out as a free download.
Every month, I would email those on my mailing list, the monthly planner so that they could keep track of their goals, month to month and also weekly.
After receiving great compliments on them and hearing how using the sheets helped them complete projects and stay on track of all their to-do's I was inspired to keep going.
Then I created a Quarterly Planner for download. 
I self-funded the creation of Quarterly Planners that would also be available as a download.
Some people would download the sheets and enter them into a spiral notebook to keep them in place! 
I knew I had to create one that women could carry around and not have to go to a store to find a notebook or folder to place them in. 
Where we are now:
I decided to hire a designer that has experience creating planners. 
She's already created a cover page & back page.
The beautiful salmon/peachy color has been selected.
And my current Mastermind group has been using and loving the January version of the planner. 
One of the best parts about this planner is that it's a quarter of the year.
Meaning, the first round will be January-March.
This really helps to get clearer on the goals at hand and focus on the year from quarter to quarter.
I need your help to see this through.
What I need: 
I'm looking to raise $2,500.
I'm self-funding the project and I have been doing so and providing the download version of the first drafts of the planners.
This allowed me to test the product before a full investment. 
I've self-funded $1,700 so far (not including creating the first versions that would go out monthly to the email list) of the $4,700 total.
This would ensure the design of the Modern Woman Planner and I can tweak the rest of the years as they come along. 
Reaching my goal won't only help me make my first product a reality, I will show other entrepreneurs how they can also make their products a reality. 
What you get with perks:
With a $25 perk, or more you get a copy of the printed First Quarter Planner (includes shipping). 
With a $5 perk, you get a digital download of the January Planner & a very big thanks from me and Joey (the cutie Cat, my assistant). 
For a $100 perk, you get the four Quarter planners as they are printed.  Updates will be posted on the page. 
What if I want to help and I don’t want a planner?
I just want to contribute: 
Donations on any amount are possible. Anywhere from $1 to ….
Launch Party!
I can't wait to thank you in person at the soft launch party! Save the Date: February 29th. 
 
Risks & Challenges:
I'm a one-woman show, but if you know anything about me, I make it happen. 
The biggest risk is that the first planner will not be ready by February 1. January has sailed but getting this out in February is better than nothing at all. 
To help this issue, everyone that donates will get the January download version of the planner. 
The color of the planner may be slightly different than that shown on the screen. 
If I am missing any info, please let me know!

story:
Short Summary

Introduce yourself and your background. My name is Kira Rae, and I am a 17 year old girl from Germantown Tennessee. For years, I have been writing, whether it be short stories or novels, and recently I started writing screenplays and started an interest in acting. With a family as supportive as mine, I was able to pursue what I wanted which is where I ran into my problem. Getting known in the film industry is one of the toughest tasks in the world because it's all about connections, all about who you know. What happens when you don't know anyone? Without contacts, it's near impossible to get parts or become known for whatever you want to do, acting, directing, writing, etc. And it isn't because of a lack of talent rather than a lack of representation. As someone who was always told that they had a gift, this got me thinking. Getting exposed and becoming famous was all about luck, and what if we could somehow increase this luck? With these thoughts, I was able to create Torify. Torify is a streaming service that is different than any other streaming services out there. Torify would only show its Torify Originals, meaning that it would be completely exclusive in its contents. What makes it stand out? The fact that we use the community to build upon. Our writers, directors, actors, will all be people who have had the same thoughts and feelings as me. 'I have a gift, but how can I show everyone else?' Torify's platform hires those who haven't had their break through, no previous experience necessary. For actors, if you fit a physical description, you are guaranteed to receive an online submission, and if we approve that then you get brought in for the audition. With actors, we would have workshops yearly, around the country, to work with others and help them to star in Torify originals and move on from that to bigger and better things. For writers, we offer feedback yearly to help them improve. We also would allow for independent films to be uploaded onto Torify, after supervision and look over, giving independent creators a chance to show their work. And Torify doesn't stop there. Another unique aspect would be the fact that it offers 'recommendations', a category where our users can submit in their requests for comics or books that they'd like to see adapted. While we cannot adapt everything, the most popular things we can, making Torify something for everybody. 

What We Need & What You Get

With a hopeful, full release date by November 18, 2020, Torify has some work that needs to be done to make this concept into a reality. We are looking to raise $1 Million dollars to really get this show on the road. This money is being divided into the web design fees to give customers the best experience that we possible can. We are also looking to relocate Torify to the heart of the entertainment industry, Los Angeles, California. With the money we raise, we are also going to start sponsoring ads and getting our name out there as well as beginning to look into the purchase of rights to make adaptations of popular books and comics. But, Torify plans on giving back as well. As we grow, every time a milestone is hit, we plan on doing sponsored giveaways as we celebrate the success in which we grow. We know Torify can become something huge, with your help. 

Risks & Challenges

Like any other business, Torify has risks. Our biggest risk is the lack of exposure. Without people hearing about us, we won't be able to reach the predicted milestones which is why we are really making a push towards sponsoring and getting our names out there. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Do you want to help us? Then feel free to just share the name of Torify! Mention us on your youtube or TikTok and link us! We would appreciate that! Our Instagram is torify_original and follow our founder, _kiraraee_ to stay up to date and follow us along this incredible journey. I love you guys :)

story:
Why uTandem?

Language learning, understood in modern terms, is something relatively new, something whose potential we have only grasped with globalisation and the arrival of the Internet. However, while the field of language learning is dominated by big companies, it is now time to give language learners the freedom they deserve; a freedom to choose when, where, how and with whom to learn a language. And that, exactly, is uTandem.


uTandem is a free mobile app which connects you with the people around you to learn your favourite language by doing language exchange. It gets you in touch with other language learners around you, sorted by distance, and shows you the languages they speak and the ones they want to practise. When you have found a suitable partner, you can start chatting and then arrange a place to meet and carry out your exchange session. 


Apart from connecting you with other users, uTandem provides you with a list of places where you can meet up (cafés, bars, pubs, etc.), where you can learn languages with professionals (academies, language schools, etc.) and where you can find other language learners and resources (language exchange groups, language blogs, etc.). All of this in just one sleek app. 


uTandem makes language learning easy, fun and practical. 


Who is behind uTandem?

uTandem is being developed by a team of 6 Spanish youngsters, between the ages of 20 and 30, with diverse educational backgrounds. We are all young, down-to-earth and hard-working and we are going to great lengths to see our dream come true. 

We have been working together for over 18 months and we would love to be able to provide uTandem with all the improvements and functionality that language learners dream of. However, this will not be possible without your help. 

We believe in our project and we would love you to be a part of it. 


  

How will the funds be invested?

Do you like what you’ve read so far? Good! Because uTandem already exists. We would love you to download the app for free and check it out for yourself.

So what’s this campaign for? Well, we want to go further by improving and expanding all our services so that uTandem becomes an essential language learning tool. Also, we want our users’ experience to go beyond the screen of their device. 

Since we started, we have been listening to our more than 40,000 users and many other language learners out there, and we have noted down all the changes and improvements that people would love to see us implement. For this reason, thanks to their feedback and our determination to improve, we are starting this campaign. Whatever funds we raise will be invested in the following: 

A. Expanding our app and web services:

•Chat improvements to provide a communicative experience more in accordance with the latest trends.

•Improved internal search engine so that you can easily find language partners, academies, language exchange groups, etc. that suit your needs.

•Implementation of fun, useful games, rankings and other entertaining learning elements for app users.

•New languages to translate messages.

•Improvements to app notifications.

•Improvements to the server to improve uTandem’s performance.

•Improvements to the website for businesses and partners in order to gain greater interaction and communication between users and businesses.

•Brand new events creation system

B. New translations of the website and the app, making it available for more people around the world.

C. Active participation of uTandem in language exchanges in each city, thus helping our partners through sponsorship and promotion of their activities and language exchange events.

D. Financing this campaign and broadcasting it so that it reaches a large audience around the world.


We are giving away language courses and the chance to test beta versions of the app!

To thank you for your contribution, you will enter a raffle to win a language course; the winner will choose the language and school from the list of partners of uTandem. You will get your ticket or tickets by email. The number of tickets you receive will depend on the quantity you decide to support this project with. The more you contribute, the higher chance you will have of winning the raffle.



The course that we are offering has the following features:

-  Language: depends on the languages offered by the school that the winner chooses

-  Duration: 15 days

-  School: the winner can choose any of the schools subscribed to uTandem which appear in the terms and conditions of the raffle (see raffle terms and conditions)

-  Age: 18 or over

-  Accommodation and other expenses not included.

How can you win the language course?

You will automatically enter the raffle by contributing to this campaign. 


When you receive your sticker, we invite you to take a selfie with it and upload it to Facebook with the tag #DouTandem. To do so, you can follow these steps:



Terms and Conditions of the Raffle

  • The raffle for the language course will take place 15 days after this campaign ends. 
  • Each participant will have a number of tickets according to the quantity he or she contributed with to this campaign. 
  • The course will last 15 days. 
  • The winner will decide the language of the course and the language school. The level will be agreed by the winner and the language school chosen. 
  • The schools the winner can choose are listed below: 
    • Rondalingua (Ronda, Málaga)
    • Escuela Entrelenguas (Ronda, Málaga)
    • Spanish Language Center (Marbella, Málaga)
    • Dante Alighieri (Málaga)
    • LinguaSpain (Málaga)
    • Instituto eCenter (Málaga)
    • StiM – Spanish teachers in Málaga (Málaga)
    • OnSpain – Your door to learn Spanish (Málaga)
    • Instituto Andalusí (Málaga)
    • Cenat Idiomas (Málaga)
    • Kelington Institute Arabial  (Granada)
    • The English Hall (online lessons)
    • IEI Academy  (Granada)
    • IML School of English La Zubia (La Zubia, Granada)
    • Language4you (Granada)
    • CLM (Granada)
    • Interlingua Schools SL (Granada)
    • City of languages (Madrid)
    • Cambridge Institute (Madrid)
    • Instituto Iberochino (Madrid)
    • Academia Clases Particulares (Alcobendas, Madrid)
    • Ágathos Centro de Formación (Valencia)
    • AIP Languages (Valencia)
    • Instituto Mozart (Bilbao)
    • Iberlingva (Bilbao)
    • Enseñalia Rosales-Montecanal (Zaragoza)
    • Talk Idiomes (Sant Boi de Llobregat, Barcelona)
    • EntiendesBarcelona (Barcelona)
    • Training Express (Barcelona)
    • LSB Portuguese (Barcelona)
    • Deliateacher (Sant Cugat del Vallès, Barcelona)
    • English School Evora (Evora, Portugal)
    • Accent Français (Montpellier, France)
    • CiaoItaly (Torino, Italy)
    • Abbey School (Torino, Italy)
    • Kappa Language School (Rome, Italy)
    • Delfina Language School (London, England)
    • English Domain (Mosta, Malta)
    • Company (Regensburg, Germany)
    • Interact (Hamburg, Germany)
    • Anda Sprachschule (Berlin, Germany)
    • Sprachschule-Aktiv (Munich, Germany)
    • Sprachschule Aktiv (Freising, Germany)
    • Diálogo Brasil (Salvador, Brazil)
    • Rio & Learn Portuguese School (Rio de Janeiro, Brazil)
    • Berlin-Institut (Bogotá, Colombia)
    • My English (Bogotá, Colombia)
    • Fast Forward Portuguese Language Institute (Sao Paulo, Brazil)
    • Center Lingua (Ciudad de México, México)

Once the language, school and level have been chosen by the winner, uTandem reserves the right to decide the date and schedule of the course; always taking into account the winner’s preference as well as the school’s preference. 

In any case, other expenses such as accommodation, provision, materials, transport, etc., will have to be taken care of by the winner.

The winner will be notified via email on the same day of the raffle, and the result will also be published on uTandem’s Facebook page. 

The winner has 10 days, as of the day he or she is notified by email, to claim his or her prize. In order to do so, he or she will have to contact uTandem.  If this does not happen, another winner will be chosen, who will be notified after another 10 days, should the first winner not claim the prize. 

The stickers will be sent to the donors 2-3 days after the donation is made. 

When the updates are ready, the people with access to the beta version of the new app will be notified by email. They will receive the credentials and instructions to follow.


FAQ:

Who pays for the course?

uTandem will cover the cost of the 15-day course.

Who are the academies in the list?

These academies are businesses which are subscribed to and collaborate with uTandem. 

When will the course take place?

The date will depend on a variety of factors such as language, availability, level, the school, etc. 

Does uTandem teach any of these courses?

No, we are not a language school, so we only facilitate the language schools where the winner can do the course with professionals in the field.

In order to do so, he or she will have to contact uTandem.  If this does not happen, another winner will be chosen, who will be notified after another 10 days, should the first winner not claim the prize. 
The stickers will be sent to the donors 2-3 days after the donation is made. When the updates are ready, the people with access to the beta version of the new app will be notified by email. They will receive the credentials and instructions to follow.
FAQ:
Who pays for the course?
uTandem will cover the cost of the 15-day course.
Who are the academies in the list?
These academies are businesses which are subscribed to and collaborate with uTandem. 
When will the course take place?
The date will depend on a variety of factors such as language, availability, level, the school, etc. 
Does uTandem teach any of these courses?
No, we are not a language school, so we only facilitate the language schools where the winner can do the course with professionals in the field.

story:
The Team at Mclowd have spent the last seven years building a unique SMSF Community that has been founded on the participation of over 4,000 self-funded retirees. 

Our achievements to date include:

  • Providing access to a free version of our cloud-based accounting software
  • Alongside a marketplace where Trustees can purchase related services at competitive prices

Over that period the development process has been a collaborative exercise involving:

  • Dozens of developers and support personnel
  • Subject matter experts
  • Constant feedback from active users

As a result of this collective effort Trustee Members of the Community can now manage their SMSF accounting for as little as a few hundred dollars per year, including audit.

Cost savings that have become critical given how far interest rates and yields have fallen in recent times.

However we are a small Team, and notwithstanding their dedication and tireless efforts, there are numerous improvements to the software which are yet to be delivered.

50% of active Trustee users are on the Free Forever version, and even the paid versions are much less expensive than incumbent solutions. 

Given the need to reduce the costs of managing an SMSF (in light of the decline in investment incomes), we have decided to launch a crowdfunding campaign to raise the funds necessary to:

  • Accelerate ongoing development
  • Lay a foundation for us to take advantage of technological trends such as open banking and machine learning

We are aiming to raise $50,000, and this funding will support and be focused on features that:

  • Form part of the Free Forever version
  • As such benefit all Members of the Mclowd Community

A detailed list of targets can be viewed on our website.

Speaking of his participation, Victorian Trustee David Bennett had this to say:

"We need to back the Mclowd Team so that they can build on the current foundation.  The software needs to work just as well with bonds, managed funds or crypto as it does for equities, and just as well with NZD or USD as it does for assets denominated in AUD.

The Team have a proven track record spanning seven years.  They just need the funding to deliver a more flexible product, and one that is comparable with the more expensive solutions in the market."

(If you would like to know more about Mclowd feel free to reach out at info@mclowd.com).

Regards  

Ashley Porter
Managing Director
 ashley@mclowd.com
0402 117 935

story:
What is "muuver"?

See our founder's interview on Forbes

Muuver is a simple to use social app that let's you share your hypes and gripes, kudos & complaints, likes, and dislikes - about ANYTHING.

Muuver then takes your hype or gripe about an item and adds it to the "ITEM PAGE" where you can see everybody else's posts who hyped or griped about that item.

The ITEM PAGE

This ITEM PAGE is where the power is.

Not only does it show everyone's post about that item, it also shows; an overall +/- score for the item, let's you "watch" or follow the item, it displays the item's popularity on muuver, shows total posts, total number of 'voters', and lots more that we'll be revealing soon.

Just imagine - the ITEM PAGE is also the place where companies will have to publicly respond to our user's hypes and gripes, in full transparency. You'll get to see how companies handle both positive and negative issues.

MUUVMENTS

the POWER TO THE PEOPLE tool

We call it "the POWER TO THE PEOPLE tool" because muuver effortlessly connects people who have common goals and interests about any topic to band together to forward their cause or interest using our online tools for action.

We call this suite of tools a "muuvment".  ~"Because when a group of people who collectively like or dislike something all join together, it inherently creates a muuvment."

MUUVMENTS have:

  • public, semi-private, and fully private member options
  • event management system and group calendar to help organize your muuvment
  • online petitions and petition managment system
  • fully functional self-managing forums
  • group post feeds (like the main muuver feed but restricted the muuvment only - or public if you want it)
  • lots more we can't tell you about just yet. ;)

But that's not even all of it! Read on to see how simply sharing your hypes and gripes can create change.

Here's How It Works:

It's very simple - it's like using Facebook and Twitter together, but instead of hashtag, you use a "muuvtag".

You do that by putting a "+" (plus) sign in front of something you like, or a "-" (minus) sign in front of something you dislike.

You close multiple words in a tag by putting a "+" or "-" at the end of the words. (See image below.)

Use the Tool to Build the Tool

Since muuver is a capable of having each of it's participants give their opinion about any topic, it's like an instant "mini-democracy" allowing you to get immediate feedback from participants about any issue or item. Therefore, we're going to create a "muuver issues" muuvment that will allow our users to have direct input into how the tool gets build and evolves.

Help Build Our Privacy Policy

For example, one of the first issues/items that we'll be posting is our Privacy Policy discussion. We want users to have a direct sya in the evolution and development of our privacy policy. Kinda neat, eh? Not many other sites will do that with you, if any.

$0 Contribution - I'll Help by Sharing

Want to help, but the economy has you by the pockets?

You can still help make muuver happen!

Simply share muuver on your social networks - and you'll be guaranteed a muuver BETA account BEFORE we launch to the public.

VISIT MUUVER FOR THIS PERK »

$10 Contribution - I Like This Idea

If we had $10 for every person who liked muuver...

We like THAT idea!

Think muuver is a good idea? Why not skip the Happy Meal or double vodka in your plans today and slide us a dime-bill?

We would be ever so appreciative (so would your liver)!

Just kidding…! We know you take good care of yourself, that’s why you’re smart enough to know a great thing when you see it. And since you know muuver is a great thing it only makes sense to chip in $10 to help make it happen.

  1. Get added to the "Founding Funders" page on our website
  2. Get a guaranteed BETA account for our launch (end of July-ish).
  3. Your profile and avatar on muuver will be marked as 'OM' - "Original Muuver"

$25 Contribution - I'm a Helpful Hand

Help Us Break Ground

Every little shovel full helps!

So you think muuver is going to take off and you want to contribute…

Thank you so much!

These $25 contributions are the start of it all and will be the foundation of our whole campaign. So, many thanks again for providing one of the necessary foundation blocks for building a solid muuver platform.

  1. Get added to the "Founding Funders" page on our website
  2. Get added to the "Founding Funders Wall" in our head office.
  3. Get a guaranteed BETA account for our launch (end of July-ish).
  4. Paul Marek (founder of muuver) will friend you on muuver at launch (and send you a personal message of thanks!)
  5. Your profile and avatar on muuver will be marked as 'OM' - "Original Muuver"

$50 Contribution - I'm a Very Helpful Hand

Hey Heavy Lifter!

If you've got the means, we'll take the help!

As we mentioned, every little bit of help REALLY helps, and even a modest $50 Contribution will go a long way toward making this tool we’re building for you (and all of us) a reality. A very helpful hand indeed.

Thank you so much!

Your $50 perk package will include everything from the previous perk package as well.

  1. Get 1 Year Ad Free on muuver
  2. Paul Marek and Muuver will subscribe to you or Like the FB page of your choice
  3. Paul Marek @maverick_CEO will follow you on twitter
  4. Paul Marek will Connect with you on LinkedIn
  5. PLUS get everything from the previous perk package!

$100 Contribution - I'm Damn Serious

This Is a Very Serious Matter

If you're serious, this is the perk for you!

Not only will you get a long list of perks from the previous packages, but with this perk you’ll get some cold, hard, tangible muuver swagibilia. That shizz’ll be worth something someday!

Thank you so much for being serious!

Your $100 perk package will include everything from the previous perks as well.

  1. Get a sweet, sporty & sexy muuver T-shirt. Not your average T.
  2. Get 2 Years Ad Free on muuver
  3. Get your name on a small plaque on the "Founding Funders Wall"
  4. Get direct access to bi-monthly corporate conference calls!
  5. PLUS get everything from the previous perk packages!

$250 Contribution - I'm a Firm Believer

Believers Make All The Difference

Belief is the basis for all success!

When you’re building something as big as muuver, you have to go on your own faith that it will work out – until you find other believers. Then things change. Others believing in you makes all the hardship seem effortless.

Thank you so much for believing in muuver!

Your $250 perk package will include everything from the previous perks as well.

  1. GET IMMEDIATE ACCESS TO MUUVER - see it as we build it
  2. Get a super-sexy long-sleeve cotton muuver sport shirt
  3. Paul Marek will friend you on Facebook
  4. Get a signed Paul Marek muuver business card (collectors item)
  5. Paul Marek will review your product or service or idea on muuver
  6. PLUS get everything from the previous perk packages!

$500 Contribution - I'm a Fanatical Believer

You Share Our Passion

Passionate belief is our fuel, fire and source.

The energy we get knowing that someone else shares our passion to make muuver a reality is what keeps us working on it until 4am, when the solution seems impossible… but we know it’s there… so we go until we find it.

Thank you so much for sharing your passion!

Your $500 perk package will include everything from the previous perks as well.

  1. Get a LARGE natural plaque on the "Founding Funders Wall"
  2. Get to PARTICIPATE in bi-monthly corporate conference calls
  3. Get automatic 'SHAKER' status (that's a big responsibility)
  4. Get muuver Ad Free for LIFE
  5. Get 2 VIP Tickets to the MUUVER LAUNCH PARTY in Toronto
  6. PLUS get everything from the previous perk packages!

$1000 Contribution - I'm Completely SOLD

So, You Get It.

It is a wise soul that sees a wider perspective.

If you’ve gotten to this point, you can see the full potential at hand for muuver – it isn’t just another social network, it is THE social network that will have the biggest potential impact… on almost everything. Everywhere.

Thank you so much for “getting it”!

Your $1000 perk package will include everything from the previous perks as well.

  1. Get an authentic piece of muuver concept documentation signed by Paul Marek
  2. Star in a muuver viral ad (start doing situps & crunches)
  3. Get a version of muuver named after you
  4. Be an initial incumbent of the "User Advisory Board to CEO"
  5. PLUS get everything from the previous perk packages!

$2500+ Contribution - I Wanna Get Involved

You've got our attention.

So you've got the cake. What else you got?

If you’re contributing at this level, we should meet. If you’re wanting to get involved with muuver you’ll likely have other assets that would contribute greatly to this cause. We’re very interested to hear what you have to say.

We look forward to meet, and thank you.

Your $2500 perk package will include everything from the previous perks as well.

  1. Get a seat on the "Council of Founding Funders" (have a say in funding matters advising the CEO)
  2. Private dinner with Paul Marek (You and a guest are invited to dine with our Founder and CEO)
  3. Consideration for future financial and/or professional participation methods
  4. PLUS get everything from the previous perk packages!

What Your Contribution Will Be Used For:

For the past 2 years we've been bootstrapping and working on muuver like Einstein on atoms.

Through endless nights of development and countless hours of testing, we've perfected and nearly completed the website portion of muuver which is the foundation of our overall platform. But, in order to make muuver an effective tool for everyone to use, we still need to build both; a) a mobile app version of muuver for instant access to post your kudos or complaints wherever you are, or even for citizen reporting from anywhere - and we'd also like to build, b) a handy browser toolbar feature (like StumbleUpon) for making it easy to hype or gripe about any page on the web.

So herein lies our dilemma; we're at the end of our financial resources, but we have an abundance of excitement and energy to get the mobile app and toolbar done!

We need your help to get muuver done  -  OUR GOAL IS $50,000!

Your help will help.

So..... since we're building a tool to give POWER TO THE PEOPLE, we thought we'd turn to the people, to give power to the people who are building the tool to give power to the people. ...Or something like that.

Do you want it as bad as we do?

Simply, we figured we'd ask for your help because we think that you want to see this tool be realized as much as we do.

Help Make It Happen

SEE OUR PERK LEVELS ABOVE.
