- Portal permite el registro de un código proporcionado por nosotros para abrir la aplicación, en el teléfono del usuario, de la tarjeta de visita de papel recibida por nosotros y virtualizada (solución ideal para las grandes empresas y organizaciones, donde los empleados utilizan todos el mismo formato de la tarjeta de presentación )


DESARROLLO
1) Las implementaciones InfoMage (en 20 días)
- Mejorar la usabilidad de la interfaz de usuario
- La creación de su boleto 'para virtualizar su papel de tarjeta de negocio de forma independiente desde el teléfono
- Mejorar la gestión de la cantidad de artículos
- Compartir por: 1) Sms
                          2) WhatsApp
- Rescate serviría en sus entradas con el fin de recuperarse de cualquier dispositivo que ejecute un log-in
- Mejora del método de almacenamiento
- Opción adicional de los acontecimientos: la creación de un billete que puede 'añadir una fecha y un lugar con su alarma, que se activará en el dispositivo del destinatari, por lo que es' un boleto virtual de sencillo también recordatorio (día saldos iniciales, trabajo cita, eventos, etc ...)
2) Las implementaciones de portal (aproximadamente un mes)
- Interfaz de consultar a sus propias tarjetas de visita
- Interfaz para revisar las tarjetas de visita recibidas
- Interfaz para la compra de artículos con una tarjeta de crédito
- Sistema de facturación automática
- Envío de notificaciones del sistema
3) Los objetivos futuros
- Desarrollo de aplicaciones para el sistema operativo Android
- Posibles colaboraciones con otra aplicación en el mercado
- Acuerdos con los inversores
- Visibilidad masiva en la Web
Su contribución, apoyo y difusión son necesarias para hacer de este proyecto una realidad y para introducirlo en el mercado para Android  también, a partir de ahora!

story:
Our Idea

Our idea is to create the ultimate blogging/website platform specializing in financial field. Where people can present themselves or their company, share their analysis, stock picks, experience, recommend books, schools and webinars. 

One of the key ideas is that they will be able to sell their products right from their blog or website. Readers will be able to contact the author, ask questions and leave feedback. Teachers and Educational institutions will be able to organize webinars using our platform. Newsletters and digital social media companies can have their subscribers right in our website. 

Another key idea is that people can search and find newsletters or media companies by their interests, see their ratings by other subscribers, or ask other subscribers for their feedback. Lets say I am interested in short term ideas about the energy sector. I can find people or media companies who specialize in that sector, talk to subscribers and subscribe for the one that meets my needs or interests. Right from my profile I will be able to do research with the ggfinances platform, save my research in my profile, share with my friends, find out their opinion, put stock price alerts and much more. 

 

This is the idea of ggfinances.com: to help people to make better decisions.

 

Our eCommerce tools

This is how our eCommerce tools will work. When you decide to make money with your blog you will fill out the financial section of your registration. When you sell your product(s) (book, software, hardware, services), we will process the payment securely to your account. When you are just a user and want to buy something, you will have to register and pay by using major online payment methods. We will also give an option to transfer some money in your ggfinances account and to make quick payments or set up an automatic payment, (if you subscribe to follow someone's real time trades or a newsletter). 

Our Backers will receive their credit to their ggfinances account and make payments. Bloggers will be able to pay their service fees by using these credits. So this system will be similar to paypal or amazon. It will not be as good as their's in the beginning, but we will do everything to keep you guys happy.


How this will work

It will have very simple design, you can completely customize it and it is Open Source. ggfinances allows you to write and publish your own blog, giving you the tools to make it easy and more professional. It's simple, elegant, and designed so that you can spend less time messing with making your blog work and more time for blogging or research. When you are creating your blog it will be as simple as this:



As we said It will be open source so you can work with HTML code in this mode.

 

What makes us unique?

There are a lot of blogging platforms out there. For example wordpress.com, blogger.com, tumblr.com and more, but only ggfinances.com is specialized in financial filed and it is extremely simple. It will bring professional investors and educators together with newbies.  

Our traffic exchange system. Let's say Bob has just opened a new blog. He is a financial analyst with 30 years experience. Bob is not a tech guy, he does not know how to do SEO, market his blog or find online audience. With ggfinances his articles will appear in our main page, on our article stream shown below.

Bob wrote an article about particular stock (let's say Facebook). It will show up here:

 So what is happening?        

All the traffic that ggfinances.com is getting is shared between the ggblogs. Our blogs are sending some of their traffic to us which is also shared between other blogs inside our network.  

This way Bob is getting his share and he has more time for his research and analysis.

Bob is happy

All Articles are Ready for Sharing 

All ggfinances articles come ready to connect to your social media services right out of the box.

No endless plugins required to do stuff that everyone with a blog wants to do. Connect your blog to publish to your Twitter, g+, LinkedIn and Facebook accounts.


What is there for regular users?

We are going to develop customizable interface for our users, so they can create watchlist of the stocks they follow, price alerts, if they are following any particular blog, then email notification about new article, order center where they can keep track of their purchases, take a snapshot of their analysis and save in their profile. This is just the beginning. We will expand this list with many more features.  

Chart platform


All our registered users and bloggers can use this chart platform, create watchlists, take snapshots and more.


Who will use our website?

Individual bloggers are our main target. Whoever wants to write about finance, investing, business, technology and other similar topics. This is primarily for people or companies that do not want to spend a lot of time creating a website, managing, promoting and so on.

We will provide educational videos and articles on how to create a website using our platform. In the future we will have a technical team available to help you to create the blog you want and explain how to get the best out of our resources.

Bigger companies and bloggers will use our website in parallel to their original blogs or websites in order to get more traffic from our referral features. 


STRETCH GOAL! - $50,000

If we get this amount, we will develop iPhone and Android applications for our website. As we all know, everything goes mobile these days. So it will be a huge privilege if we could launch our applications as well. We already have an iPhone app for one of our tools (https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ggearnings/id656723459?ls=1&mt=8) . 

It would be great if we have the apps for our bloggers and readers as well. 

To see some of our works go here: www.gglaboratories.com

Whoever contributes the highest amounts over $5000 will have his/her advertisement banner on our first page, in the spot shown below. 

 Contributors over $1500 will have their advertisement banners on the spots shown below.  

For location availability please contact us. Locations are assigned based on first come first served bases.  

For people who contributes over $5000.

If you are thinking to get "special tool" offer, please contact us first.

We would like to discuss and find out what do you have in mind, and make sure we can deliver it for you. 


 Risks and challenges

The main risk we will face is bringing our platform to the first 100 blogger/users. The next challenge is the correct monetization of the product, it's a crucial thing in such a projects. Overall, we are ready to cope with any issues; we are not novices in the business, we have an up and running software development company. We are eager to have our own market changing web resource.


Thank you guys for all your support.

story:
It seems as though our day to day life has been progressively consumed with never-ending checklists, mundane tasks of our 9-5 jobs and the mind-numbing scroll of our social media feeds. Although some tasks have become much easier with the advancement of technology, it seems we've lost the ability to hone into our own thoughts, ideas, and reflections of what we really want, think and believe in. 

We found that many people (including ourselves) wear our overstimulation as a badge of honor; The more we do, the "better". We want to steer away from that socially constructed mindset and wanted to create a tool to help remind us to slow things down, be more mindful, present and overall more aware in our day-to-day.

 

For centuries and throughout different cultures around the globe, the egg has symbolized life, wealth and promise. Our goal was to use natural materials that can work in harmony with the eggs simple yet captivating symbology and design.

 

Balancing at 17mm wide and 23.38mm tall, the Thinking Egg has been ergonomically designed to feel great in your hands while also being extremely portable.

 The Thinking Egg comes in four different organic materials that hold specific properties people can identify most to. Choose the Thinking Egg/s you can relate to most based on their specific metaphysical qualities.

 

The One, The Duo, The Nest and or The 1/2 Dozen... the choice is all yours. You'll be able to select which Thinking Egg/s you'd like to receive when we send out a quick survey at the end of the campaign.

 

This isn't our first rodeo. We've helped create and ship five other crowdfunding campaigns that were delivered successfully on time. We'll be continuing that tradition come fulfillment time for your Thinking Egg.

At Orijin Design Company, we strive to slow things down and intentionally think about designs and systems that can be made better. In a world inundated with information and stimuli, we aim to harmoniously intertwine form and function, making designs and systems that provide for the space to be present and aware in our daily lives. We're really excited to share The Thinking Egg with the Kickstarter community and to create a community of our own composed of individuals that desire to slow things down, be more mindful, present and overall more aware in our day-to-day.

story:
The Mad Scientist Has Arrived 

Dr. Bubbles has been working hard in the lab to bring you some mad eco-friendly genius!

 

Dr. Bubbles is set to change the way consumers like YOU clean their cars. 

Problem #1 - Convenience: Jody Pattison, CEO, and Founder of Dr. Bubbles, was frustrated one day. It was the very process of getting his car cleaned that led him on this journey. He found that the best-case scenario when taking his car to be cleaned was that he would be waiting for 30 minutes, watching someone clean his car. The reality was that he could be waiting around watching other people's cars be cleaned before they got to his, or worse he was turned away and forced to make an appointment for another day!

The solution: Jody, with his fellow Co-Founder Sameer Marria, created a mobile app that enables us to bring a car cleaner to where you are, meaning this job can be done whilst you are occupied doing something else, freeing up your free time to be just that! Free time.

Problem #2 - Water wastage: The second problem we came across, is a multi-faceted solution to a myriad of problems. Cleaning your car wastes on average 90 liters of water! Aside from being wasteful, creating a mobile solution that requires 90 liters of water per clean is hardly a scalable mobile solution!

Solution: A range of waterless car cleaning chemicals using the latest nanotechnology. These chemicals, aside from the obvious environmental benefits, also enable a car cleaner to carry enough chemicals to clean seven cars in a backpack that only weighs six kilos. A truly eco-friendly, mobile and scalable solution!

Problem #3 - Man-power: The last problem we had was first finding the cleaners and secondly making sure they delivered a satisfactory service to our customers.

Solution: We do that in a number of ways. Firstly, we do a simple to follow online tutorial on using the non-harmful chemicals, followed by a series of test questions to assure they have comprehended the tutorial. Once cleaners are in the field, we hand the policing of the customer service to you, the customer, by simply asking you to rate the service you have been given after a clean. Five-star reviews will be highly incentivised to the cleaners with rewards by Dr. Bubbles.

 

Dr. Bubbles spent a serious amount of time in the lab creating this magical set of genius but eco-friendly chemicals.

1. Dr. Bubbles - Exterior Wash: When he arrived on Planet Earth, Dr. Bubbles just couldn't understand why cars were not shining from the outside! Alas, the Exterior Wash!

2. Dr. Bubbles - Interior Wash: The inside of the car is where you sit! So it should be the most clean. Dr. Bubbles took care of that with the Interior Wash!

    3. Dr. Bubbles - Glass Clean: How can you see where you are driving if your windows are dirty?! Fear not Dr. Bubbles has a squeaky clean solution. The Glass Clean!

    4. Dr. Bubbles - Tyre Black Clean: In the Dr's books, no car is complete without having the Dr. Bubbles Tyre Black clean!

    5. Dr. Bubbles - Bug Clean: He got fed up with all the insects splattering on his screen so he created the Bug Clean!

    6. Dr. Bubbles - Interior Sanitiser: Dr. Bubbles is also very big on hygiene thus he created the Interior Sanitizer!

    Our belief is that this business will have a positive effect on the community and the environment. Anything that makes our lives easier is always welcome, but if it creates a wealth of well-paid employment and has a positive impact on our environment then surely this is a good thing, right? Of course! 

    Our aim is to change the car wash industry and minimize the wastage of water that happens every year around the world!

    As a start-up, show your support by helping us through this crowdfund page!

    1. Community-based: What we decided as a start-up company, is that our budget would be much better invested in allowing our cleaners to offer free cleans in exchange for a simple download of the app. This would allow our cleaners to build a network of customers in their local vicinity. For the free clean we would pay the cleaners 50% of the value of that service allowing them to start earning income from day one but also allowing us as a company to generate downloads in targeted areas.

     

    2. Effective eco-friendly products: As a company, we are going to offer the chance for you guys to buy and test the chemicals Dr. Bubbles has specially formulated in his laboratory to enable a professional clean, without using a drop of water. Dr. Bubbles has formulated these products to bring even the dirtiest vehicle back to new again.

     

    3. Great perks: As well as the eco-friendly chemical packages, we are offering the chance to purchase some of the creative genius we have created in the design studio, including the Dr. Bubbles comic book backstory.

    Show your support by backing this crowdfunding page. Every little bit helps!

    We hope to raise £100,000 in the next 57 days. This will give us the liquidity to make a real impact when we launch this summer. 

    We will be giving regular updates on our website about the company's progress. We feel crowdfunders deserve to share in our journey and our success!

     

    1. With the basic understanding that cleaners will be joining us for financial recompense we need to make sure that anyone that signs up to work for Dr. Bubbles can earn a decent living from day one! 

     

    2. We decided as a company that our budget would be much better invested in allowing our cleaners to offer free cleans in exchange for a simple download of the app. This would allow our cleaners to build a network of customers in their local vicinity. For the free clean we would pay the cleaners 50% of the value of that service allowing them to start earning income from day one but also allowing us as a company to generate downloads in targeted areas until we are absolutely 100% stable.

     

    3. As with anything, there is always an element of risk, and we are only as strong as the workforce we create. Our customers' only interaction with the brand will be with our cleaners. We will help cleaners convey the Dr. Bubbles message, having them believe in it as much as we do via constant training and key systems in place to monitor customer service feedback!

    4. As a start-up, show your support by helping us through this crowdfunding page on https://igg.me/at/Dr-Bubbles-Fundraiser.

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Obviously we appreciate not everyone is in a position to contribute financially but that does not mean you cannot help. Sharing this message will be of great assistance or simply downloading the app and sharing the app through social media! You may feel we are a team you would like to join. Don't be shy, get in touch. We are all friendly and happy to meet new faces.

     

    Building The Brand 

    Hi, I am Sameer Marria, CMO and Co-Founder of Dr. Bubbles. One of the biggest strengths that Dr. Bubbles has is its image and branding. There is no coincidence that the logo of Dr. Bubbles is a character.

    When I first met Jody about Dr. Bubbles I absolutely loved the idea; I immediately started strategising how I would market an on-demand car cleaning and waterless car cleaning business. When you look at the social media pages and marketing strategies of any car cleaning business, you are guaranteed to see an endless amount of before and after pictures of the car! For me, it was imperative Dr. Bubbles be different. I wanted to create something that would be memorable for anyone who ever laid eyes on it; this is where the logo was born.

    I had this idea to create a character that was almost the love child of Rick and Doc from Back to the Future. A hybrid of wacky yet lovable scientists that would create spectacular things in the lab. By creating this character we would aim to tell a story to the market and after all, everybody loves a story. 

    Dr. Bubbles has his own story, something that would completely stand us out as a brand from any other company in the industry, everything you see in the app and chemicals, from the font to the branding to the packing and even the tonality of our social media has been thought through very deeply. We are introducing a brand that will one day become a household name. I bring to you the mad scientist that is Dr. Bubbles

With the basic understanding that cleaners will be joining us for financial recompense we need to make sure that anyone that signs up to work for Dr. Bubbles can earn a decent living from day one!  2. We decided as a company that our budget would be much better invested in allowing our cleaners to offer free cleans in exchange for a simple download of the app. This would allow our cleaners to build a network of customers in their local vicinity. For the free clean we would pay the cleaners 50% of the value of that service allowing them to start earning income from day one but also allowing us as a company to generate downloads in targeted areas until we are absolutely 100% stable. 3. As with anything, there is always an element of risk, and we are only as strong as the workforce we create. Our customers' only interaction with the brand will be with our cleaners. We will help cleaners convey the Dr. Bubbles message, having them believe in it as much as we do via constant training and key systems in place to monitor customer service feedback!4. As a start-up, show your support by helping us through this crowdfunding page on https://igg.me/at/Dr-Bubbles-Fundraiser. Other Ways You Can HelpObviously we appreciate not everyone is in a position to contribute financially but that does not mean you cannot help. Sharing this message will be of great assistance or simply downloading the app and sharing the app through social media! You may feel we are a team you would like to join. Don't be shy, get in touch. We are all friendly and happy to meet new faces. Building The Brand Hi, I am Sameer Marria, CMO and Co-Founder of Dr. Bubbles. One of the biggest strengths that Dr. Bubbles has is its image and branding. There is no coincidence that the logo of Dr. Bubbles is a character.When I first met Jody about Dr. Bubbles I absolutely loved the idea; I immediately started strategising how I would market an on-demand car cleaning and waterless car cleaning business. When you look at the social media pages and marketing strategies of any car cleaning business, you are guaranteed to see an endless amount of before and after pictures of the car! For me, it was imperative Dr. Bubbles be different. I wanted to create something that would be memorable for anyone who ever laid eyes on it; this is where the logo was born.I had this idea to create a character that was almost the love child of Rick and Doc from Back to the Future. A hybrid of wacky yet lovable scientists that would create spectacular things in the lab. By creating this character we would aim to tell a story to the market and after all, everybody loves a story. Dr. Bubbles has his own story, something that would completely stand us out as a brand from any other company in the industry, everything you see in the app and chemicals, from the font to the branding to the packing and even the tonality of our social media has been thought through very deeply. We are introducing a brand that will one day become a household name. I bring to you the mad scientist that is Dr. Bubbles

story:
About

NOT-SO-SUPER GLUE

Let's face it: superglue is yesterday's adhesive.

It says it takes 30 seconds to set - yeah right! More like 30 minutes! It gets everywhere you don't want it to. AND it dries out when you don't want it to!

 

 

And if it really is so SUPER...then why do you also need epoxies for gap filling, sealants for cracks and leaks, and glue for specific materials?

 

Introducing TOTAL GLUE - the only glue you need!

Total Glue is a specially-formulated glue designed to cure instantly when exposed to blue light. Simply apply the glue, shine the included light on the glue, and in 5 seconds it will fully cure!

ALL-IN-ONE

Total Glue combines the strength of super glue, gap filling properties of epoxy, and light-curing speed of acrylic resin together to make the ULTIMATE glue...without all of the negative experiences associated with those adhesives!

SUPER GLUE VS TOTAL GLUE

Total Glue completely cures in 5 SECONDS when hit with the included blue light. Super Glue needs AT LEAST 1 minute to set...and then 24 hours for a full cure!

EPOXY VS TOTAL GLUE

OTHER LIGHT-CURING ADHESIVES VS TOTAL GLUE

You may have seen other adhesives on the market that cure with light. One big difference is that Total Glue bonds objects together with or without the light, while the other acrylic adhesives CANNOT bond without the light.

Total Glue's unique light-curing properties enable it to perform hundreds of different types of repairs.

 

BOND, FILL, SEAL, & REBUILD

BONDS WITH AND WITHOUT LIGHT

 

Total Glue bonds in 5 seconds when exposed to the blue light, making repairs and projects happen faster than ever! Unlike other light-curing glues on the market, Total Glue ALSO bonds objects without the light - it just takes about a minute to cure.

FILLS GAPS LIKE EPOXY

Because Total Glue cures with light, it can fill gaps like an epoxy, but without the annoying mixing process, and the inevitable messes! Just alternate between applying Total Glue and curing with light to build up layers until your hole or gap is filled!

SEALS CRACKS AND LEAKS

Use Total Glue to seal off cracks in tile, counters, pipes, and more! You can also insulate exposed wires on computer and phone cords, saving you from the costly replacements.

REBUILD/CREATE OBJECTS

Rebuild structures like handles and key fobs with Total Repair, or create new objects like a bolt for a screw!

WORKS ON ALL MATERIALS

WOOD

METAL

PLASTIC

GLASS

CERAMIC

HIGH STRENGTH BOND

Total Glue not only cures very fast, but it cures very STRONG. Watch us lift a bowling ball with Total Glue below!

SANDABLE & PAINTABLE

Total Glue can be sanded down and painted. No ugly repairs or projects here!

CRAFT LIKE A PRO

Total Glue is the perfect tool for crafters and creators.

Its precision application tips allow for delicate projects to be accomplished without the mess, and the resin cures clear leaving no residue!

The blue light cures the glue when you need it to, and where you want it to, helping you get more projects done faster.

Because the glue cures with and without the light, you don't need to keep switching out different adhesives for different projects!

 

SO MUCH MORE!

We can't even begin to cover all of the amazing things you can accomplish with Total Glue. Here are a few more examples:

3-D PRINTING

CIRCUITRY

SHOE REPAIR

5g of Glue – Specially formulated glue can be cured by blue light or pressure

Plastic Casing +Squeeze Applicator – Protective casing for easy application and storage

Blue Light – Removable blue light LED and applicator to cure glue in seconds; batteries included

Applicator Tip + Precision Tip: Total Glue comes with applicator tip for clean and easy application. A separate precision tip is also included for very small and precise repairs.

Cap – Keeps the glue from drying out

 

We learned about light-curing adhesives from the dentist office, and were blown away by the properties that make them so useful to dentists! So we set out to use this technology to make a glue to end all glues!

It took over 2 years for us to find the perfect adhesive that met all of our requirements:

  • Cures in 5 seconds by light application
  • Also cures under pressure where no light can get in
  • Maintains the same strength level as super glue
  • Works on all surfaces
  • Weak scent

We tried the following types of adhesives:

1. Cyanoacrylate: This is the type of adhesive found in regular super glues. However, we couldn’t find one that cured under light.

2. Acrylic-based adhesives: Acrylic adhesives can be cured by UV light (you’ll see these in a lot of “As Seen on TV” products), but the bonding capabilities are poor, and such adhesives can’t cure under pressure without the light.

Finally we discovered a specially-formulated methoxyethyl cyanoacrylate, that could both bond under pressure and cure instantly under blue light! It also met our other requirements, making us confident enough to bring this product to you!

 

Total Glue Sampler - $10

Total Glue Starter Kit - $30

Total Glue Family Pack - $55

Total Glue Pro Kit - $85

Total Glue Ultimate Value Kit - $230

HOW TO PLEDGE?

1. Click on this link: https://kck.st/2L28TIS

2. Select which pledge level you want to support.

3. You will receive updates from us on the status of your order.

4. The expected receive date is October 2018!

Total Glue has been featured in these media outlets:

We are a team of entrepreneurs and problem solvers with over 30 years of product development, manufacturing, and retail experience. Our FiberFix products have been featured on Shark Tank and are in over 24,000 retail locations worldwide. We are passionate about empowering consumers to fix things they could not easily fix before.

We recognize the Kickstarter community as an innovative group of users, and wanted to introduce our ground-breaking Total Glue directly to you. We love the early adopter mentality of the Kickstarter clan, and know that you are not OK settling for the status quo! Neither are we! We genuinely want to revolutionize the glue industry, and want you to join us for the ride. We can't wait for you to try out this product!

 

Risks and challenges

We’ve been in the tapes and adhesives business for 5 years and are very familiar with the manufacturing and fulfillment of consumer products. That being said, there is always the risk of delays due to shipping conditions or problems at the port. Additionally, the production timeline of such a specially-formulated glue can take a lot of time. However, we have built what we felt is a reasonable timeline buffer into your schedule for receiving the product. We have every expectation that this will be a seamless production process; however, we want to make sure you aware of the potential risks.

story:
Kindly also check updates

A published article on Wingman by Lighting Rumours 

 

The Wingman was developed by a visual industry veteran Viveck Bansal, founder and CEO of Viren Banserv Limited, Hong Kong and Creative Director at Studio vB.


"Like many of my fellow photographers I have always been dependent upon other technological suppliers to ease my work-flow….

and there are many good flash triggers available but none of them offer more than the basic trigger with limited exposure control and no possibility for new features.  I thought long and hard and decided to design and build an essential tool for the working photographer."  - Viveck Bansal

 

Meet your Wingman

The Wingman reinvents wireless triggers and speedlight controllers. It is a multi controller that goes beyond fixed design. It’s smart and modular design is easy to use and can accommodate any new features and functions without hardware limitations.

"It’s a pocket-sized helper that’s really big on features.

I spent countless hours designing it, building it, checking it, going back to the drawing board, tinkering some more, till I was ready to reveal it." – vB

At its heart is a powerful ARM Cortex 32bit fast and energy efficient processor, a universally accepted 2.4GHz transreceiver with auto-acknowledge, a smart OLED display, an intelligent accessories port, user friendly-adaptable navigation and a managed power system.

There is manual independent sub-stop exposure control for speedlights and a unique collective control of all light groups and a visual remote speed-light status indicator on the transmitter

It also has various test fire modes to ease creative lighting workflow

 

Wingman

Flash Trigger

    • 99 Wireless channels
    • 4 Light groups
    • Manual independent 1/3-stop exposure control for speedlights
    • Unique collective control of all light groups
    • Remote speed-light status indicator

Time-lapse Trigger

    • Frame count mode
    • Day mode
    • Start and end time mode
    • Date mode
    • Wakeup feature*
    • Mirror lock feature*
    • Slider and Pan head controller#

*Camera specific features, # Will be released later

Event Trigger

    • 3 Independent triggers
    • Laser sensor
    • Range sensor
    • Motion sensor
    • Slot sensor

Accessories

    • Dedicated receiver - Wingman Jr.
    • Speedlight cable
    • Shutter cable
    • Laser sensor
    • Range sensor
    • Motion sensor
    • Slot sensor

* more to be announced soon

Specifications

    • ARM Cortex CPU
    • 2.4GHz Auto acknowledge transreceiver
    • Coloured OLED with GOLDELOX controller
    • Intelligent accessories port
    • Real Time Clock
    • User friendly-adaptable navigation (OFN)
    • Managed power system
    • Modular flexible design

 

 

Evolutionary Wingman

As creative requirements change, Wingman can be programmed with more features and functions. Software is upgradable and we are always looking to improve and enhance its functionality. Minor upgrades will be free of charge for the life of the unit and major upgrades and new features will be available for a minor price. Wingman is designed to be a life-long companion not a short-term acquaintance.

 

Meet Wingman jr. - Dedicated Receiver

Economical dedicated receiver and range extender. The Junior is a dedicated receiver with a full color LED for group identification 99 channels to chose from and B/W oLED display. It’s firmware is upgradable as well.

 

Under the hood

Hobbyists and hackers alike will love its flexibility and possibilities that keep pace with your own growing requirements and imagination.

The Wingman is based upon a popular and powerful ARM Cortex cpu with a built in 2.4GHz transreceiver, I²C bus, a USB interface, enough analog and digital I/O, a smart 1.5" colored OLED screen with GOLDELOX controller, Real Time Clock and interrupt driven optical finger navigation control. With a little knowledge of C++ you can command it to do almost anything.

I can say with confidence that whenever you need it, the Wingman can. I think I’ve got a great product. And I need your help to take it places.

Thank you. - Viveck Bansal

story:
Imagine this: you wake up in the morning, get dressed, make coffee....but instead of leaving the house feeling frazzled with your long to-do list running through your head, you walk over to your Kindness Calendar hanging in the kitchen and pick your kindness mission for the day. In one fell swoop you feel re-centered, filled with purpose and intent, and excited at the prospect of helping another AND getting an endorphin release. This is the power of the Kindness Calendar, which gives you a new Act of Kindness to commit daily. 

"UNEXPECTED KINDNESS IS THE MOST POWERFUL, LEAST COSTLY, AND MOST UNDERRATED AGENT OF HUMAN CHANGE." BOB KERREY

My name is Oriana Galardi-Este and I'm the founder of the Kindness Calendar. My mission is simple: to transform the world, one Act of Kindness at a time. There's a monumental misconception that a complex solution is needed to fix the world's problems. I believe that the world can and WILL be put right through the exponential growth of small and simple acts of Love. I've seen the powerful effects and massive reverberations that one act creates with my own eyes. Hearts are opened, guards are shed, bridges are rebuilt, and in turn, more kindness and love are propagated. Let's work together to create a continuous momentum of Love - an upward spiral - which will, in turn, ignite a Kindness Revolution, and in the words of Martin Kornfeld: set the world in the right direction.  

Why I created the Kindness Calendar

Kindness Calendars was born from the painful experience of separating from my husband. After spending a couple of months completely engrossed in my heartache and loneliness,  I unintentionally engaged in an act of kindness at the grocery store, and it dawned on me that for the first time in ages, my focus had shifted from me and my pain, to another's needs, resulting in a lightness of being, a strong feeling of connection, and a deep sense of elation that I hadn't felt in months. Committing random acts of kindness became a daily ritual and a means to healing my broken heart. I strongly believe that the speed with which my heart mended is directly correlated to this powerful practice that brought me out of my head and my ruminating thoughts, and back into my heart space. Having experienced the incredible effects of committing regular acts of kindness on my life, relationships, and overall well-being AND living in a world currently inundated with so much hate, violence and despair - it felt time to share my findings and to help infuse the world with a massive dose of kindness. And so was born: The Kindness Calendar.

I think it's safe to say that most of us are feeling incredibly disillusioned by the current state of the world, and feel powerless to help. So my main incentive in getting the Kindness Calendar out into the world is to empower people to affect change by equipping them with a truly potent yet affordable and simple tool.

The truth is that we are each powerful beyond belief - and my hope is to prove this via the widespread use of the Kindness Calendar. Alice Walker had it right when she said: "The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any." I dare you to try the Kindness Calendar for 30 days and witness firsthand just how powerful your actions are. It's a complete game changer. A complete LIFE changer. And I have absolutely no doubt that the Kindness Calendar can and will change the world!

"BE THE CHANGE YOU WISH TO SEE IN THE WORLD." GHANDI

Versatility

My favorite thing about the Kindness Calendar is its versatility. Does your sense of self-worth need a boost? Choose the Self-Love pack. Maybe you're looking to increase kindness in your workplace. Choose one of the Corporate packs. Maybe you're looking to teach your children the value of Kindness and the power of their actions. Choose one of the Kid packs.

Each Kindness Calendar comes with your choice of Kindness Pack, depending on your needs. Each pack includes 30 laminated acts of kindness cards that fit perfectly in the Kindness Calendar's mini pockets. 

Choose from:

  • The Adult Pack - this is a generic adult pack, suitable for most all adults. 
  • The Kids 3-5 years Pack - this pack is tailored to kids aged 3-5 years. 
  • The Kids 6-11 years Pack - this pack is tailored to kids aged 6-11 years. 
  • The Kids 12-17 years Pack - this pack is tailored to kids aged 12-17 years. 
  • The Bravery Pack - this pack is inspired by Brene Brown's work on cultivating vulnerability, courage and bravery. These acts focus on getting you out of your comfort zone and encourage you to step out into the messy arena of life with courage. Perfect for those looking to increase their confidence. 
  • The Self-Love Pack - this pack is focused on increasing one's sense of self-worth. Most of us were taught as children that we are only lovable if we are 'good' or if we 'achieve.' Most all of our challenges and issues in life have to do with not feeling worthy of love, abundance and goodness. This pack aims to re-wire your brain via daily acts of kindness to the self. 
  • The Couples Pack - this pack is tailored to couples who are looking to increase their intimacy with and connection to each other. 
  • The Corporate (Employer) Pack - this pack is tailored to employers who are interested in increasing their profits by increasing their employees' satisfaction and happiness. Research shows that when people feel appreciated, treated with respect and shown kindness daily, their work satisfaction increases which in turn increases their productivity levels. This naturally leads to greater profits and success.
  • The Corporate (Employee) Pack - this pack is tailored to employers who are interested in increasing their employees' connection with each other and camaraderie. This pack is for use by the employees, on each other. Research shows that when people feel connected to each other and work in a supportive and loving environment, their work satisfaction increases which in turn increases their productivity levels. This naturally leads to greater profits and success. 
  • The Corporate (Customer Service) Pack - this pack is tailored to employers who are interested in increasing their profits by increasing their overall customer satisfaction. The acts are performed by employers and employees towards clients/customers. Research shows that businesses with consistently excellent customer service yield greater profits due to increased brand loyalty.

Key Features

In addition to the beautiful design, you’ll also discover these other great features:

  • Made in the USA. I’m proud to send you a high-quality product made by happy workers right here in the US of A. 
  • High quality materials and construction. No tearing, breaking, coming apart. These calendars are made to LAST.
  • Ethically sound. Our calendars are fabricated in a production house whose labor and manufacturing practices match our own high ethical standards. No person's integrity or wellness was harmed in the making of our calendars. 
  • Perfect for travel. Just roll it up and throw it in your suitcase!
  • 18” x 28” size. A perfect size for an office break room, classroom, bedroom or kitchen wall. Large enough to draw your attention every morning, and small enough for it not to feel like furniture. 

A RECENT HARVARD STUDY FOUND THAT ONE SINGLE ACT OF KINDNESS HAS THE POWER TO AFFECT HUNDREDS. 

IMAGINE WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IF EVERY HOME, OFFICE AND CLASSROOM HAD A KINDNESS CALENDAR AND THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE WERE PERFORMING DAILY ACTS OF KINDNESS. ACCORDING TO THE STUDY, WE COULD AFFECT MILLIONS.

WHAT MAKES THE KINDNESS CALENDAR SUCH A POWERFUL AND EFFECTIVE TOOL?

In one word: REPETITION. Repetition is powerful. It creates habit. It's through repetition that we rewire our brains. Imagine a world in which committing daily acts of kindness has become an automatic reflex by thousands. Can you picture it? Can you picture the number of people walking around smiling brightly? Glowing even? 

"WE ARE WHAT WE REPEATEDLY DO. EXCELLENCE THEN, IS NOT AN ACT, BUT A HABIT." ARISTOTLE

 

PERFECT F​OR CHILDREN AT HOME AND IN THE CLASSROOM

Let's help our children be happier, more confident, more joyful, and help them understand the power of their actions and the power of kindness! Let's teach our children how to be contributing members of society, and let's teach them the value of service. Let's reduce bullying by increasing kindness both at home and at school!

 

    KINDNESS IN THE WORKPLACE

    FACT: Happy workers are on average 31% more productive and 3x more creative.

    Ever worked for someone who was self-absorbed and filled with negativity? Ever worked in an office environment where you felt disconnected, unappreciated and unseen? Is your business struggling to offer consistently excellent customer service? Then your office needs a Kindness Calendar. Research shows that when employees feel connected, appreciated and seen by both their boss and their peers, their happiness increases, resulting in a spike in productivity, creativity and ultimately, company prosperity. Do you want to see your company thrive? Put up a Kindness Calendar in the break room, and watch as your office culture magically transforms. 

      Endorsements

       “I consider it a great day when I can look back and know that I gave more than I took. One way to give is through demonstrating and sharing kindness with customers, employees and my leadership team.  Over the past 30 years, we have moved farther away from helping others, to becoming more self-serving.  The heart is like a parachute…it only works when it is open. In my experience, profits AND productivity increase when the entire workforce operates from an open heart. Utilizing the Kindness Calendar in our office will enable our employees to think about how they treat each other and our customers.  I also believe the Kindness Calendar will spark creativity in how we demonstrate a couple of our key corporate values – RESPECT and POSITIVE ATTITUDE." 
      Keith Blackmon - Vice-President CPE Commercial Sales & Support

      "Increasingly, the research in the field of neuroscience speaks to the theme of interconnectivity. When our attachments and connections go awry or are disrupted for any reason, a myriad of symptoms can result. As a licensed therapist with 35 years of clinical experience I have learned to never underestimate the power and impact of kindness. The Kindness Calendar bridges neuroscience and diverse therapies together into the perfect tool for my clients that will allow them to experience increased connectivity, higher self-esteem, and ultimately will help them overcome trauma, depression and anxiety. A simple yet potent tool. Well done, Oriana."

      Bruce Nelson - MSW CCSW

      "Corporate culture is something we work on and talk about daily. We strive to provide phenomenal service, to treat each other with great respect, to source amazing ingredients, and to make the best decisions we can for our planet and its people - all things that require a great amount of care and kindness. I am looking forward to using the Kindness Calendars in our businesses as a way for our team to help make our community an even better place to be. This tool will allow us to make random acts of kindness a habit, which will put us well on our way to creating a culture we can be proud of."

      Matt Fox - Local Restaurateur

       

      FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

      What is a Kindness Calendar?

      The Kindness Calendar is a wall-hanging calendar made of fabric and wood, that features 30 mini burlap pockets each made to house one or more laminated act of kindness cards. The calendar is made by hand in the USA, is of exceptional quality and built to last. The calendars can easily be folded up and stored when not in use. In fact, we encourage our customers to only have it out when it is consciously being used so as to not become desensitized to it. It can be used anytime of year, as Kindness has no season. 

      Can the whole family use the Kindness Calendar?

      Absolutely! The reason we offer so many different Kindness Packs tailored to a variety of ages and themes is to ensure that everybody is able to participate. We love to think of the Kindness Calendar as a powerful tool to increase family and couple bonding. We love the idea of families discovering their kindness mission for the day at breakfast, and then each going about their respective days and committing their act, and then coming home and discussing their experience over dinner with each other. What a powerful way to begin and end the day. 

      The striped blue fabric and pink floral fabric I see in the photos don't match my home decor/aren't really my style...will you be offering any other fabric options?

      We currently have 4 fabric options for you to choose from. By mid-August, we will have many more fabric options. Stay tuned!

      What happens once I've committed all 30 acts?

      Once you've committed all 30 acts, you'll most likely be feeling so good you'll be hungry for more. The good news is that you've got a myriad of choices: you can buy another Kindness Pack for a brand new set of acts; you can re-use your current Kindness Pack; you can invest in different packs and then mix and match. For example you could mix the Adult pack with the Bravery pack to allow yourself to focus on serving others AND simultaneously increasing your courage. Another example would be to mix the Couple pack with the Self-Love pack to allow you and your love to grow in intimacy while simultaneously increasing your respective self-love. Get creative and have fun!

      What languages are the Kindness Packs available in?

      Our Kindness Packs are available in English only for now, with the hope of expanding to other languages in the future. 

      Can I claim more than one reward at once?

      It's exciting to hear that you've found multiple perks you are interested in getting!

      Unfortunately, at this time, Indiegogo does not have a feature for you to be able to add multiple perks in a single transaction. As such, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your support!
story_txt:
Imagine this: you wake up in the morning, get dressed, make coffee....but instead of leaving the house feeling frazzled with your long to-do list running through your head, you walk over to your Kindness Calendar hanging in the kitchen and pick your kindness mission for the day. In one fell swoop you feel re-centered, filled with purpose and intent, and excited at the prospect of helping another AND getting an endorphin release. This is the power of the Kindness Calendar, which gives you a new Act of Kindness to commit daily. 
"UNEXPECTED KINDNESS IS THE MOST POWERFUL, LEAST COSTLY, AND MOST UNDERRATED AGENT OF HUMAN CHANGE." BOB KERREY
My name is Oriana Galardi-Este and I'm the founder of the Kindness Calendar. My mission is simple: to transform the world, one Act of Kindness at a time. There's a monumental misconception that a complex solution is needed to fix the world's problems. I believe that the world can and WILL be put right through the exponential growth of small and simple acts of Love. I've seen the powerful effects and massive reverberations that one act creates with my own eyes. Hearts are opened, guards are shed, bridges are rebuilt, and in turn, more kindness and love are propagated. Let's work together to create a continuous momentum of Love - an upward spiral - which will, in turn, ignite a Kindness Revolution, and in the words of Martin Kornfeld: set the world in the right direction.  
Why I created the Kindness Calendar
Kindness Calendars was born from the painful experience of separating from my husband. After spending a couple of months completely engrossed in my heartache and loneliness,  I unintentionally engaged in an act of kindness at the grocery store, and it dawned on me that for the first time in ages, my focus had shifted from me and my pain, to another's needs, resulting in a lightness of being, a strong feeling of connection, and a deep sense of elation that I hadn't felt in months. Committing random acts of kindness became a daily ritual and a means to healing my broken heart. I strongly believe that the speed with which my heart mended is directly correlated to this powerful practice that brought me out of my head and my ruminating thoughts, and back into my heart space. Having experienced the incredible effects of committing regular acts of kindness on my life, relationships, and overall well-being AND living in a world currently inundated with so much hate, violence and despair - it felt time to share my findings and to help infuse the world with a massive dose of kindness. And so was born: The Kindness Calendar.
I think it's safe to say that most of us are feeling incredibly disillusioned by the current state of the world, and feel powerless to help. So my main incentive in getting the Kindness Calendar out into the world is to empower people to affect change by equipping them with a truly potent yet affordable and simple tool.
The truth is that we are each powerful beyond belief - and my hope is to prove this via the widespread use of the Kindness Calendar. Alice Walker had it right when she said: "The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any." I dare you to try the Kindness Calendar for 30 days and witness firsthand just how powerful your actions are. It's a complete game changer. A complete LIFE changer. And I have absolutely no doubt that the Kindness Calendar can and will change the world!
"BE THE CHANGE YOU WISH TO SEE IN THE WORLD." GHANDI
Versatility
My favorite thing about the Kindness Calendar is its versatility. Does your sense of self-worth need a boost? Choose the Self-Love pack. Maybe you're looking to increase kindness in your workplace. Choose one of the Corporate packs. Maybe you're looking to teach your children the value of Kindness and the power of their actions. Choose one of the Kid packs.
Each Kindness Calendar comes with your choice of Kindness Pack, depending on your needs. Each pack includes 30 laminated acts of kindness cards that fit perfectly in the Kindness Calendar's mini pockets. 
Choose from:


The Adult Pack - this is a generic adult pack, suitable for most all adults. 

The Kids 3-5 years Pack - this pack is tailored to kids aged 3-5 years. 

The Kids 6-11 years Pack - this pack is tailored to kids aged 6-11 years. 

The Kids 12-17 years Pack - this pack is tailored to kids aged 12-17 years. 

The Bravery Pack - this pack is inspired by Brene Brown's work on cultivating vulnerability, courage and bravery. These acts focus on getting you out of your comfort zone and encourage you to step out into the messy arena of life with courage. Perfect for those looking to increase their confidence. 

The Self-Love Pack - this pack is focused on increasing one's sense of self-worth. Most of us were taught as children that we are only lovable if we are 'good' or if we 'achieve.' Most all of our challenges and issues in life have to do with not feeling worthy of love, abundance and goodness. This pack aims to re-wire your brain via daily acts of kindness to the self. 

The Couples Pack - this pack is tailored to couples who are looking to increase their intimacy with and connection to each other. 

The Corporate (Employer) Pack - this pack is tailored to employers who are interested in increasing their profits by increasing their employees' satisfaction and happiness. Research shows that when people feel appreciated, treated with respect and shown kindness daily, their work satisfaction increases which in turn increases their productivity levels. This naturally leads to greater profits and success.


The Corporate (Employee) Pack - this pack is tailored to employers who are interested in increasing their employees' connection with each other and camaraderie. This pack is for use by the employees, on each other. Research shows that when people feel connected to each other and work in a supportive and loving environment, their work satisfaction increases which in turn increases their productivity levels. This naturally leads to greater profits and success. 


The Corporate (Customer Service) Pack - this pack is tailored to employers who are interested in increasing their profits by increasing their overall customer satisfaction. The acts are performed by employers and employees towards clients/customers. Research shows that businesses with consistently excellent customer service yield greater profits due to increased brand loyalty.


Key Features
In addition to the beautiful design, you’ll also discover these other great features:


Made in the USA. I’m proud to send you a high-quality product made by happy workers right here in the US of A. 

High quality materials and construction. No tearing, breaking, coming apart. These calendars are made to LAST.

Ethically sound. Our calendars are fabricated in a production house whose labor and manufacturing practices match our own high ethical standards. No person's integrity or wellness was harmed in the making of our calendars. 

Perfect for travel. Just roll it up and throw it in your suitcase!

18” x 28” size. A perfect size for an office break room, classroom, bedroom or kitchen wall. Large enough to draw your attention every morning, and small enough for it not to feel like furniture. 

A RECENT HARVARD STUDY FOUND THAT ONE SINGLE ACT OF KINDNESS HAS THE POWER TO AFFECT HUNDREDS. 
IMAGINE WHAT WOULD HAPPEN IF EVERY HOME, OFFICE AND CLASSROOM HAD A KINDNESS CALENDAR AND THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE WERE PERFORMING DAILY ACTS OF KINDNESS. ACCORDING TO THE STUDY, WE COULD AFFECT MILLIONS.

WHAT MAKES THE KINDNESS CALENDAR SUCH A POWERFUL AND EFFECTIVE TOOL?
In one word: REPETITION. Repetition is powerful. It creates habit. It's through repetition that we rewire our brains. Imagine a world in which committing daily acts of kindness has become an automatic reflex by thousands. Can you picture it? Can you picture the number of people walking around smiling brightly? Glowing even? 
"WE ARE WHAT WE REPEATEDLY DO. EXCELLENCE THEN, IS NOT AN ACT, BUT A HABIT." ARISTOTLE

 

PERFECT F​OR CHILDREN AT HOME AND IN THE CLASSROOM
Let's help our children be happier, more confident, more joyful, and help them understand the power of their actions and the power of kindness! Let's teach our children how to be contributing members of society, and let's teach them the value of service. Let's reduce bullying by increasing kindness both at home and at school!

FACT: Happy workers are on average 31% more productive and 3x more creative.
Ever worked for someone who was self-absorbed and filled with negativity? Ever worked in an office environment where you felt disconnected, unappreciated and unseen? Is your business struggling to offer consistently excellent customer service? Then your office needs a Kindness Calendar. Research shows that when employees feel connected, appreciated and seen by both their boss and their peers, their happiness increases, resulting in a spike in productivity, creativity and ultimately, company prosperity. In my experience, profits AND productivity increase when the entire workforce operates from an open heart. Utilizing the Kindness Calendar in our office will enable our employees to think about how they treat each other and our customers.  I also believe the Kindness Calendar will spark creativity in how we demonstrate a couple of our key corporate values – RESPECT and POSITIVE ATTITUDE." Keith Blackmon - Vice-President CPE Commercial Sales & Support

As a licensed therapist with 35 years of clinical experience I have learned to never underestimate the power and impact of kindness. The Kindness Calendar bridges neuroscience and diverse therapies together into the perfect tool for my clients that will allow them to experience increased connectivity, higher self-esteem, and ultimately will help them overcome trauma, depression and anxiety. A simple yet potent tool. Well done, Oriana."
Bruce Nelson - MSW CCSW

Matt Fox - Local Restaurateur
