story:
A Means to Express your Thoughts

The almighty pen. To ink your thoughts on paper is a direct connection between you and your ideas. Even in this digital world, it is impossible to ignore the need for a pen. Whether it's taking notes, signing a check, or addressing an envelope, you cannot escape the requirement to use a pen. Many of us embrace this refreshingly analog need as special. There is something irreplaceably tactile about putting your thoughts in a notebook, sketching a diagram, or simply documenting an idea without the need of a power plug or battery. There are numerous pen designs in existence, and there are literally billions of pens in use all around the world. There are no barriers, everyone knows what a pen looks like and we all use them. It is the most natural, intuitive way to communicate in writing.

At TEC Accessories, we use pens. A lot. We carry journals for documenting our daily actions, we make sketches in Field Notes booklets to jot down a concept when a thought flashes through our minds. We adore the pen and paper medium. So when we chose to develop a completely new pen design, we abandoned our preconceived notions of what a pen is and what it isn't. We redesigned from the ground up. After many months of planning, development, prototyping, and testing, we are pleased to present you the result of our effort through this Indiegogo campaign.

Introducing the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen:

We've abandoned the cylindrical shape of a traditional pen. Instead, the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen leverages the benefits of a flat, wide, rectangular geometry for unparalleled writing comfort and low-profile carry. Rather than cramping your fingers around a thin cylindrical shaft, you can embrace your writing instrument in a more natural way that provides long term comfort with less tension on your fingers. The 4-1/2" length is optimized to deliver a fluid writing experience in your hand, yet be incredibly compact for convenient everyday carry. The magnetic twin-rail mechanism used to extend and retract the ink refill eliminates the need for a separate cap, ensuring you have nothing to lose. Combined with an instant, no-tool refill replacement method, the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen will always be your pen of choice. Its elegance, comfort, and simplicity will make you wonder why this never happened sooner.

 

Extend/Retract Refill Animation

 

Titanium Blue Raspberry Edition

 

 

 

 

  • Flat geometry: The rectangular shape provides comfort during long writing sessions
  • 6 mm low-profile body (less than 1/4" thick) for discrete storage when carried or clipped
  • The perfect pen to accompany journals, notebooks, diaries, etc.
  • The embedded micro socket provides an "Instant", no hassle refill replacement that does not require tools: pull-to-remove/push-to-insert
  • Accepts a wide variety of commonly available D1 stylus refills, including Fisher pressurized refills (in case you want to write upside-down)
  • Unique, twin-rail skeletonized body is strong, lightweight and will make heads turn
  • Magnetic actuation and retention mechanism
  • Balanced design for the ultimate writing experience
  • No possibility of accidental ink retraction during use
  • Flat, anti-roll design stays where you put it
  • Symmetrical profile allows for identical writing comfort for both right and left hand usage
  • Assembled from 24 individual, custom machined and critically selected components, to ensure a high quality, bulletproof pen that will last a lifetime

The following dimensions are in millimeters [inches]:

Refill Extended

 

Refill Retracted

 

Magnet Actuation

 

 SPECIFICATIONS:  

  • Weight (Aluminum Editions): 46 grams (1.6 oz)
  • Weight (Titanium Editions): 56 grams [2 oz.]
  • Size: 6 mm x 109 mm x 22 mm (.236" x 4.29" x 0.866")
  • Height with clip: approximately 8.77 mm (0.35”)
  • Materials: As stated above
  • Refill Actuation: Magnetic Push/Pull
  • Refill Replacement: Pull-to-remove, Push-to-insert

 

FORM FACTOR:

We've designed the Ko-Axis™ with a purpose-built, distinctive shape, sparing no detail. The comfort and ergonomics that were considered in the design phase are unparalleled, resulting in a truly unique writing experience. These features create an aesthetic that turns heads. All of these features have been packed into a pen so thin that it easily hides in any notebook. We have spent countless hours and fabricated over one hundred 3D printed prototypes with the sole purpose of selecting the perfect form factor for long term writing sessions. Be warned: once you write with the Ko-Axis™, you will never go back to a conventional pen.

 

ACTUATION:

Upon closer inspection of the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen, you will discover that the aluminum bronze grip slider contains the ink cartridge. By implementing this clever design, it is impossible for the pen to accidentally retract while writing. The ink refill is always present when you need it and never when you don't. We have painstakingly integrated eight ultra-strong neodymium magnets into the end stop positions to ensure perfect engagement, and eliminate any potential for movement of the mechanism while writing. 

Magnet end stops

 

WRITING EXPERIENCE:

The Ko-axis™ isn’t just a beautiful writing instrument, it transforms the act of writing into a wonderful experience. From the first time you extend the ink refill, you’re hooked. The rectangular shape of the Ko-axis™ rests gently in the crease of your hand and lands comfortably in your thumb-and-finger pinch. The shallow divot in the finely polished aluminum bronze offers the perfect spot for your pointer to land every time. The weight distribution of the pen was carefully calculated to rest in your hand without applying any torque to your fingers that would tire your hand in a late-night writing session. The Aluminum Edition is the featherlight member of the Ko-Axis™ family. The aluminum body allows the pen to float effortlessly across page after page. The Titanium Edition has 25% more mass than its aluminum brother, providing a solid and comfortable resilience that will last a lifetime. Every titanium model affords a rock-solid, stable action and exudes confidence in every word it writes.

 

MATERIALS:

Although the materials and finishes will vary depending upon the reward you select, materials used in the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen include: 

  • Body materials - aircraft grade 6061-T6 aluminum or aerospace grade Ti-6Al-4V titanium
  • The slider and refill guide are made from QAl 9-4 aluminum bronze, a durable bearing material known for its low coefficient of friction. This provides ultra smooth travel of the slider actuation mechanism as well as the perfect weight and balance
  • The twin guide rails are solid stainless steel precision rod, with a highly polished finish for super-smooth acutation
  • The refill cover tube is manufactured from stainless steel surgical tubing
  • The integrated pocket clip is formed from 301 stainless spring steel
  • N52 Neodymium magnets with the highest magnetic strength/size ratio available

We are also offering a very special version of the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen with the body components being manufactured from Titanium Damascus. This material is a high strength titanium composite formed by diffusion welding and offers an absolutely stunning, colorful grain pattern. Although we have not actually made any prototypes with this material due to the extremely high cost, we have placed an order for the raw material so we will be ready to begin machining the parts in parallel with the production run in order to fulfill this very unique reward. The image shown below is a CAD rendering of the Titanium Damascus Edition to give you an idea of it's final appearance. We should also point out that due to cost considerations of the material, there will only be 10 units available of this exclusive model.

Titanium Damascus CAD Model

 

FINISHING:

All aluminum body components are finished using TEC Accessories' micro polishing process, and anodized in a selection of beautiful, hyper-saturated colors

All titanium body components are either semi-polished (bare titanium model) or micro-polished (anodized model) to a fine uniform finish that will stand up to abuse

Our in-house titanium anodizing process has been refined over the years to consistently achieve an astonishing array of remarkable colors that takes style to the next level. Our Blue Raspberry tint is the absolute epitome of this color palette, and is our prime choice for this Special Edition of the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen

TEC’s Black Diamond Finish is a proprietary, nano-composite microlayer, uniquely replicating diamond’s low friction, high hardness and superb corrosion resistance. Genuine TEC products with Black Diamond Finish provide an extremely durable, near-black coating that offers exceptional wear resistance and a stunning color contrast that is impossible to ignore

Blue Raspberry Titanium Anodizing

 

Black Diamond Finish

The Ko-Axis™ is built to last. The materials, fit, and finish are impressive and you will agree the instant you pick it up. No plastic to break, no cheap steel to rust, no plating to flake off, and no parts that will wear out. This pen will last a lifetime.

INK REFILLS:

When determining which ink refill to include in the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen, it was an easy decision. Nothing but the best will do, so we selected the Monteverde D1/Multipen refill, which we think is the best refill on the planet. This medium point, black ink refill is the perfect way to experience everything the Ko-Axis™ has to offer. It features Soft Roll ink technology which is a low viscosity ink for the smoothest writing experience, with a high quality nickel silver tube and a Swiss tip.

However, any D1 style refill will work in the Ko-Axis™, including but not limited to the following:

  • Schmidt 635 Mini D1
  • Lamy Mini Ballpoint Refill M21
  • Kaweco D1
  • Monteverde D1/Multipen
  • Parker D1
  • Zebra Sharbo X Gel Ink Multi Pen/D1
  • Zebra ESB-0.7 Emulsion Ink Ballpoint Pen Refill - D1
  • Ohto R-4C7NP Needle-Point D1
  • Rotring D1 Multi Pen
  • Fisher mini ballpoint refill with adjustable lengths (shortest length)

Compatible D1 Ink Refills

 

MANUFACTURING:

This product is proudly made in the USA, at our Tucson Arizona facility. All parts are inspected, polished, finished, assembled, tested and packaged to our own internal set of rigorous standards. In order to provide the most uniform and consistent part finishes achievable, our polishing process can take upwards of 2 weeks, depending upon the material of the parts. In addition, we are already developing tooling and fixtures to maintain consistency and accuracy of the entire assembly process. We are addressing this now to mitigate any possible delays in the production schedule. All of this effort is to ensure you receive a product of uncompromising quality that you can be proud of for a lifetime. 

We unconditionally warrant the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen for 90 days against defects in materials and workmanship, because we believe there should be zero risk in the purchasing process.

PACKAGING:

When developing a pen as unique as the Ko-Axis™ we looked at every aspect with excruciating detail, and this extends all the way down to the packaging. The Ko-Axis™ not only deserves to be protected in a way that is as unique as it's appearance, but also guarantees you will receive your reward safely, and also without passing down a high cost to the customer.  So we came up with a novel approach using laser cut layered acrylic sheet, fabricated in-house, that is cost effective and just as amazing in appearance as the pen itself.

Ready for safe travel

 

A BRIEF LOOK BACK - PROTOTYPING:

Prototyping a new design can be fun and exhilarating, but it takes obsessive commitment and unrelenting willpower to iterate all the way to your 103rd model. Sometimes that is what it takes to get a product refined to a point of perfection. 

The first of over 100 3D printed prototype models

We have had three revisions of machined parts fabricated and spent countless man hours of engineering time to get to this milestone. Each iteration bringing us closer, but not all the way, to the final design. After months of brainstorming, obsessing, changing and improving, we are finally ready for prime time.

One thing we should mention here, is that the pocket clip you see in the pictures is not the final production version. We hand-formed a number of clips made from different material thicknesses to ensure we could get the correct tension when in use. However getting actual clips fabricated will require tooling. That is why we need your help, so that we can move into full production on these final details. The actual clip that will be included with your rewards will look very similar to the CAD model images shown above.

 Download the Press Kit here.

For PR inquiries, please email sales@tecaccessories.com

The timeline below reflects our immediate release of parts procurement when the campaign is successfully funded. To ensure you receive your Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen as soon as humanly possible, we will not wait for receipt of Indiegogo funding (approximate 2 week delay) to initiate production. 

Once the campaign has ended and we are successfully funded, we plan to have additional accessories available for purchase on our web site, at a special discount to Indiegogo backers. You will be able to purchase these items prior to your order being shipped, so you can receive everything in one package and avoid any additional shipping charges. These accessories will allow you to customize your Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen to reflect your personal style, with items such as Black Diamond coated rails and clips, hardware of anodized colors or different materials, and keychain attachments. 

 

The following is a summary of all available rewards, at Indiegogo early bird pricing. If you wish to order more than one version, choose one reward and simply total the price for all units desired and pledge that amount. We will confirm pricing and selection at the end of the campaign. Please refer to the Reward boxes for more details.

TEC Accessories has been developing personal accessories since 2004, and has established a reputation for high quality, value, and excellent customer service.

Pleasanton, California Office

Our administrative office in Pleasanton California manages corporate operations and product development. Our facility in Tucson Arizona manages all production and order fulfillment. We process orders from our web site and our reseller network on a daily basis, typically within one working day. We have trained staff to accommodate this campaign. We will not hire short-term inexperienced workers to assemble and ship your order. You can be assured that your Indiegogo rewards will be packaged, processed and shipped using the same care and attention we have been performing at TEC Accessories every work day for the last 14 years.

This is not our first rodeo. We are proud to say we have already completed wildly successful Indiegogo and Kickstarter campaign, in which we fulfilled all of our shipping commitments and held to our stringent quality standards. It is equally important to know that we've also run a Kickstarter campaign that did not reach our funding goal. Discouraged but not defeated, we went on to self-fund and launch the product anyway. At the announcement of the product launch, we allowed those who pledged during the campaign a discount to receive their product at the deeply discounted Kickstarter price to show our gratitude for supporting us.

We take our commitment to deliver your Indiegogo pledge gravely serious. Once we launch a campaign, we respect and honor the obligation to ship you your purchase and in the time frame we have promised. In addition, we guarantee that you will receive your purchase before the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen is sold to anyone on the open market. The purpose of a crowdfunding campaign is to bring a product to market with the support and cooperation of an incredibly special group of investors. We are humbled by your faith in us and we hope to bring you many more products in the future.

Risks and challenges:

TEC Accessories is very experienced in developing, manufacturing and delivering fine quality personal accessories. We are fully prepared to release production at the end of the campaign and are confident in our ability to deliver. 

The Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen design is complete, prototypes have been fabricated and tested and packaging is in development. Although we handle most of the work in-house, there are some processes that are performed under contract with our outside vendors (who we have dealt with for many years). For example, although we now have the ability to anodize titanium in-house, we do not have the capability of performing the aluminum anodizing or the Black Diamond finishing in-house. Therefore, there is always the possibility that problems may arise that are out of our control. We do find this unlikely, however we will do our best to ensure adherence to schedule and advise backers immediately if there are any issues that may affect delivery. If you have any questions, we encourage you to contact us.
story_txt:
A Means to Express your ThoughtsThe almighty pen. To ink your thoughts on paper is a direct connection between you and your ideas. Even in this digital world, it is impossible to ignore the need for a pen. Whether it's taking notes, signing a check, or addressing an envelope, you cannot escape the requirement to use a pen. Many of us embrace this refreshingly analog need as special. There is something irreplaceably tactile about putting your thoughts in a notebook, sketching a diagram, or simply documenting an idea without the need of a power plug or battery. There are numerous pen designs in existence, and there are literally billions of pens in use all around the world. There are no barriers, everyone knows what a pen looks like and we all use them. It is the most natural, intuitive way to communicate in writing.At TEC Accessories, we use pens. A lot. We carry journals for documenting our daily actions, we make sketches in Field Notes booklets to jot down a concept when a thought flashes through our minds. We adore the pen and paper medium. So when we chose to develop a completely new pen design, we abandoned our preconceived notions of what a pen is and what it isn't. We redesigned from the ground up. After many months of planning, development, prototyping, and testing, we are pleased to present you the result of our effort through this Indiegogo campaign.Introducing the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen:We've abandoned the cylindrical shape of a traditional pen. Instead, the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen leverages the benefits of a flat, wide, rectangular geometry for unparalleled writing comfort and low-profile carry. Rather than cramping your fingers around a thin cylindrical shaft, you can embrace your writing instrument in a more natural way that provides long term comfort with less tension on your fingers. The 4-1/2" length is optimized to deliver a fluid writing experience in your hand, yet be incredibly compact for convenient everyday carry. The magnetic twin-rail mechanism used to extend and retract the ink refill eliminates the need for a separate cap, ensuring you have nothing to lose. Combined with an instant, no-tool refill replacement method, the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen will always be your pen of choice. Its elegance, comfort, and simplicity will make you wonder why this never happened sooner. Extend/Retract Refill Animation Titanium Blue Raspberry Edition    
Flat geometry: The rectangular shape provides comfort during long writing sessions
6 mm low-profile body (less than 1/4" thick) for discrete storage when carried or clipped
The perfect pen to accompany journals, notebooks, diaries, etc.
The embedded micro socket provides an "Instant", no hassle refill replacement that does not require tools: pull-to-remove/push-to-insert
Accepts a wide variety of commonly available D1 stylus refills, including Fisher pressurized refills (in case you want to write upside-down)
Unique, twin-rail skeletonized body is strong, lightweight and will make heads turn
Magnetic actuation and retention mechanism
Balanced design for the ultimate writing experience
No possibility of accidental ink retraction during use
Flat, anti-roll design stays where you put it
Symmetrical profile allows for identical writing comfort for both right and left hand usage
Assembled from 24 individual, custom machined and critically selected components, to ensure a high quality, bulletproof pen that will last a lifetime
The following dimensions are in millimeters [inches]:Refill Extended Refill Retracted Magnet Actuation  SPECIFICATIONS:  
Weight (Aluminum Editions): 46 grams (1.6 oz)
Weight (Titanium Editions): 56 grams [2 oz.]
Size: 6 mm x 109 mm x 22 mm (.236" x 4.29" x 0.866")
Height with clip: approximately 8.77 mm (0.35”)
Materials: As stated above
Refill Actuation: Magnetic Push/Pull
Refill Replacement: Pull-to-remove, Push-to-insert
 FORM FACTOR:We've designed the Ko-Axis™ with a purpose-built, distinctive shape, sparing no detail. The comfort and ergonomics that were considered in the design phase are unparalleled, resulting in a truly unique writing experience. These features create an aesthetic that turns heads. All of these features have been packed into a pen so thin that it easily hides in any notebook. We have spent countless hours and fabricated over one hundred 3D printed prototypes with the sole purpose of selecting the perfect form factor for long term writing sessions. Be warned: once you write with the Ko-Axis™, you will never go back to a conventional pen. ACTUATION:Upon closer inspection of the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen, you will discover that the aluminum bronze grip slider contains the ink cartridge. By implementing this clever design, it is impossible for the pen to accidentally retract while writing. The ink refill is always present when you need it and never when you don't. We have painstakingly integrated eight ultra-strong neodymium magnets into the end stop positions to ensure perfect engagement, and eliminate any potential for movement of the mechanism while writing. Magnet end stops WRITING EXPERIENCE:The Ko-axis™ isn’t just a beautiful writing instrument, it transforms the act of writing into a wonderful experience. From the first time you extend the ink refill, you’re hooked. The rectangular shape of the Ko-axis™ rests gently in the crease of your hand and lands comfortably in your thumb-and-finger pinch. The shallow divot in the finely polished aluminum bronze offers the perfect spot for your pointer to land every time. The weight distribution of the pen was carefully calculated to rest in your hand without applying any torque to your fingers that would tire your hand in a late-night writing session. The Aluminum Edition is the featherlight member of the Ko-Axis™ family. The aluminum body allows the pen to float effortlessly across page after page. The Titanium Edition has 25% more mass than its aluminum brother, providing a solid and comfortable resilience that will last a lifetime. Every titanium model affords a rock-solid, stable action and exudes confidence in every word it writes. MATERIALS:Although the materials and finishes will vary depending upon the reward you select, materials used in the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen include: 
Body materials - aircraft grade 6061-T6 aluminum or aerospace grade Ti-6Al-4V titanium
The slider and refill guide are made from QAl 9-4 aluminum bronze, a durable bearing material known for its low coefficient of friction. This provides ultra smooth travel of the slider actuation mechanism as well as the perfect weight and balance
The twin guide rails are solid stainless steel precision rod, with a highly polished finish for super-smooth acutation
The refill cover tube is manufactured from stainless steel surgical tubing
The integrated pocket clip is formed from 301 stainless spring steel
N52 Neodymium magnets with the highest magnetic strength/size ratio available
We are also offering a very special version of the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen with the body components being manufactured from Titanium Damascus. This material is a high strength titanium composite formed by diffusion welding and offers an absolutely stunning, colorful grain pattern. Although we have not actually made any prototypes with this material due to the extremely high cost, we have placed an order for the raw material so we will be ready to begin machining the parts in parallel with the production run in order to fulfill this very unique reward. The image shown below is a CAD rendering of the Titanium Damascus Edition to give you an idea of it's final appearance. We should also point out that due to cost considerations of the material, there will only be 10 units available of this exclusive model.Titanium Damascus CAD Model FINISHING:All aluminum body components are finished using TEC Accessories' micro polishing process, and anodized in a selection of beautiful, hyper-saturated colorsAll titanium body components are either semi-polished (bare titanium model) or micro-polished (anodized model) to a fine uniform finish that will stand up to abuseOur in-house titanium anodizing process has been refined over the years to consistently achieve an astonishing array of remarkable colors that takes style to the next level. Our Blue Raspberry tint is the absolute epitome of this color palette, and is our prime choice for this Special Edition of the Ko-Axis™ Rail PenTEC’s Black Diamond Finish is a proprietary, nano-composite microlayer, uniquely replicating diamond’s low friction, high hardness and superb corrosion resistance. Genuine TEC products with Black Diamond Finish provide an extremely durable, near-black coating that offers exceptional wear resistance and a stunning color contrast that is impossible to ignoreBlue Raspberry Titanium Anodizing Black Diamond FinishThe Ko-Axis™ is built to last. The materials, fit, and finish are impressive and you will agree the instant you pick it up. No plastic to break, no cheap steel to rust, no plating to flake off, and no parts that will wear out. This pen will last a lifetime.INK REFILLS:When determining which ink refill to include in the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen, it was an easy decision. Nothing but the best will do, so we selected the Monteverde D1/Multipen refill, which we think is the best refill on the planet. This medium point, black ink refill is the perfect way to experience everything the Ko-Axis™ has to offer. It features Soft Roll ink technology which is a low viscosity ink for the smoothest writing experience, with a high quality nickel silver tube and a Swiss tip.However, any D1 style refill will work in the Ko-Axis™, including but not limited to the following:
Schmidt 635 Mini D1
Lamy Mini Ballpoint Refill M21
Kaweco D1
Monteverde D1/Multipen
Parker D1
Zebra Sharbo X Gel Ink Multi Pen/D1
Zebra ESB-0.7 Emulsion Ink Ballpoint Pen Refill - D1
Ohto R-4C7NP Needle-Point D1
Rotring D1 Multi Pen
Fisher mini ballpoint refill with adjustable lengths (shortest length)
Compatible D1 Ink Refills MANUFACTURING:This product is proudly made in the USA, at our Tucson Arizona facility. All parts are inspected, polished, finished, assembled, tested and packaged to our own internal set of rigorous standards. In order to provide the most uniform and consistent part finishes achievable, our polishing process can take upwards of 2 weeks, depending upon the material of the parts. In addition, we are already developing tooling and fixtures to maintain consistency and accuracy of the entire assembly process. We are addressing this now to mitigate any possible delays in the production schedule. All of this effort is to ensure you receive a product of uncompromising quality that you can be proud of for a lifetime. We unconditionally warrant the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen for 90 days against defects in materials and workmanship, because we believe there should be zero risk in the purchasing process.PACKAGING:When developing a pen as unique as the Ko-Axis™ we looked at every aspect with excruciating detail, and this extends all the way down to the packaging. The Ko-Axis™ not only deserves to be protected in a way that is as unique as it's appearance, but also guarantees you will receive your reward safely, and also without passing down a high cost to the customer.  So we came up with a novel approach using laser cut layered acrylic sheet, fabricated in-house, that is cost effective and just as amazing in appearance as the pen itself.Ready for safe travel A BRIEF LOOK BACK - PROTOTYPING:Prototyping a new design can be fun and exhilarating, but it takes obsessive commitment and unrelenting willpower to iterate all the way to your 103rd model. Sometimes that is what it takes to get a product refined to a point of perfection. The first of over 100 3D printed prototype modelsWe have had three revisions of machined parts fabricated and spent countless man hours of engineering time to get to this milestone. Each iteration bringing us closer, but not all the way, to the final design. After months of brainstorming, obsessing, changing and improving, we are finally ready for prime time.One thing we should mention here, is that the pocket clip you see in the pictures is not the final production version. We hand-formed a number of clips made from different material thicknesses to ensure we could get the correct tension when in use. However getting actual clips fabricated will require tooling. That is why we need your help, so that we can move into full production on these final details. The actual clip that will be included with your rewards will look very similar to the CAD model images shown above. Download the Press Kit here.For PR inquiries, please email sales@tecaccessories.comThe timeline below reflects our immediate release of parts procurement when the campaign is successfully funded. To ensure you receive your Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen as soon as humanly possible, we will not wait for receipt of Indiegogo funding (approximate 2 week delay) to initiate production. Once the campaign has ended and we are successfully funded, we plan to have additional accessories available for purchase on our web site, at a special discount to Indiegogo backers. You will be able to purchase these items prior to your order being shipped, so you can receive everything in one package and avoid any additional shipping charges. These accessories will allow you to customize your Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen to reflect your personal style, with items such as Black Diamond coated rails and clips, hardware of anodized colors or different materials, and keychain attachments.  The following is a summary of all available rewards, at Indiegogo early bird pricing. If you wish to order more than one version, choose one reward and simply total the price for all units desired and pledge that amount. We will confirm pricing and selection at the end of the campaign. Please refer to the Reward boxes for more details.TEC Accessories has been developing personal accessories since 2004, and has established a reputation for high quality, value, and excellent customer service.Pleasanton, California OfficeOur administrative office in Pleasanton California manages corporate operations and product development. Our facility in Tucson Arizona manages all production and order fulfillment. We process orders from our web site and our reseller network on a daily basis, typically within one working day. We have trained staff to accommodate this campaign. We will not hire short-term inexperienced workers to assemble and ship your order. You can be assured that your Indiegogo rewards will be packaged, processed and shipped using the same care and attention we have been performing at TEC Accessories every work day for the last 14 years.This is not our first rodeo. We are proud to say we have already completed wildly successful Indiegogo and Kickstarter campaign, in which we fulfilled all of our shipping commitments and held to our stringent quality standards. It is equally important to know that we've also run a Kickstarter campaign that did not reach our funding goal. Discouraged but not defeated, we went on to self-fund and launch the product anyway. At the announcement of the product launch, we allowed those who pledged during the campaign a discount to receive their product at the deeply discounted Kickstarter price to show our gratitude for supporting us.We take our commitment to deliver your Indiegogo pledge gravely serious. Once we launch a campaign, we respect and honor the obligation to ship you your purchase and in the time frame we have promised. In addition, we guarantee that you will receive your purchase before the Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen is sold to anyone on the open market. The purpose of a crowdfunding campaign is to bring a product to market with the support and cooperation of an incredibly special group of investors. We are humbled by your faith in us and we hope to bring you many more products in the future.Risks and challenges:TEC Accessories is very experienced in developing, manufacturing and delivering fine quality personal accessories. We are fully prepared to release production at the end of the campaign and are confident in our ability to deliver. The Ko-Axis™ Rail Pen design is complete, prototypes have been fabricated and tested and packaging is in development. Although we handle most of the work in-house, there are some processes that are performed under contract with our outside vendors (who we have dealt with for many years). For example, although we now have the ability to anodize titanium in-house, we do not have the capability of performing the aluminum anodizing or the Black Diamond finishing in-house. Therefore, there is always the possibility that problems may arise that are out of our control. We do find this unlikely, however we will do our best to ensure adherence to schedule and advise backers immediately if there are any issues that may affect delivery. If you have any questions, we encourage you to contact us.

story:
What is Cashmaker Forex Robot

Cashmaker Forex Robot is an Expert Advisor (EA) based and developed on a very profitable strategy.

An Expert Advisor (also known as a “Forex Robot”) is a software algorithm that automatically executes (open/close) trades 24 hours per day in your forex account based on a powerful investment strategy, saving you hours of hard work in front of you computer making your trading decisions.

Cashmaker Forex System is an investment strategy in foreign currency market (forex) that combines secret intraday trading techniques with money management  rules which were compiled into a secret algorithm software to trade 24 hours per day.

Trading with this software in your computer, means that you don´t have to lose lots of hours analyzing trading charts to open one single trade, and that you don’t have to learn or study complicated patterns, technical or fundamental analyses or anything else, because this system already proved that it works in all market conditions.

You only need to set it once at your forex account and sit back watching it working hard for you.

It takes no more than 5 minutes to install and config in your computer, and then you can go away because the Cashmaker Robot will take care of your forex account to makes you profits and get it growing day after day.

Note - If you are or were one of the Cashmaker subscribers/followers you already knew all this for sure. Right?

The Cashmaker Full Package includes:

- Cashmaker Software – How to install and config


- Cashmaker Forex System Secret Files – How it works, Money Management to boost your profits faster and much more information;

 

- Guide “How to turn losing trades into to profitable trades”;



- VIP Access to the Secret Group on Facebook the Cashmaker Secret Files Guardians (please, don’t share this group with anyone else);

- Personal Skype ID to direct and personalized support

- EA Configuration support

- Lifetime Personal support.

- Super Guide: “How to Make Money Giving Away FREE Forex Signals” - limited to the first 20 supporters




Cashmaker Summary - How it Started and How it’s Now!

Let’s make short a long story!

The story of Cashmaker started going back to 2008 when I did started to invest in the currencies forex market, and like everybody else I was looking for some miraculous thing to allows me to make big big money in a very short period of time

I mean, I was looking for some “Get Rich Quick” forex tools… Get it?!

By that time I haven’t any forex market trading experience.

The inexperience result was that for the next 3 years I did invest and lost lots of money on forex market. Then, in 2011 I did developed my own strategy based in a secret that I have found in a meanwhile by myself.

That secret strategy is so effective that I have turned a $10.000 account into an account over $550.000 in just 2½ years! Pretty amazing, right?!... (check here full results report)



Then, I have shared those results for FREE with other small forex investors around the world via mql5, becoming the most subscribed (#1) forex signal at that sharing signals platform with over 1000 subscribers. (Here some followers screenshots)

(Do you know … Through a free forex signals platform, all Cashmaker trades are copied directly to subscribers trading accounts?)

Of course, these kind of results attracted the attention of several forex brokers and big funds managers around the world, so they have started asking me to tell them the Cashmaker Secret! My answer to them was always NO!

But, about 1 year ago one of those BIG FUNDS MANAGERS came to me with an unrefusable proposal and bought me the Cashmaker Secret, with the condition to stop trade and broadcast the forex signal for free for at least 12 months, so they can have an advantage over any other competitors interested in copying Cashmaker trades to their clientes accounts.

Now that period of time ended, I decided to make Cashmaker Secrets available to all beginners and small forex investors around the world at a fair and affordable price, so everyone can have Cashmaker secret software making big profits into their forex accounts.

A fair price evaluation to Cashmaker full system is much above the 1000€, but it will be sold to a target price of only 899€ retail price.

However, I want to make it even more affordable to all small and even part-time forex investors, so the final retail price should be much cheaper.

So, the main goal of this campaign, is to get lower the retail price of Cashmaker system to just 477€, in order to allow thousands of inexperienced and small forex investors like you and me, to have access to this secret trading tool to make a good living from forex market.

By contributing to Cashmaker Campaign, you are giving to all those small and inexperient investors a chance to make their financial dreams come true, and you can also get the Cashmaker full system before anyone else. (please, check the perks available on the right side of this page)


What We Need & What You Get

The project goal of 10.000€ covers the cost of website development to make it available to everyone.

Any amount above the primary goal will be used to promote (ads) it to small forex investors around the world.

If the raised total exceeds the secondary goal of 25.000€ the retail price will be decreased to less than 500€, making the Cashmaker Full System even more affordable to everyone.

This project offers you a chance to help thousands of people around the world to make a living from forex market by using a proved investment tool.

Also, by contributing selecting the perks you can get the Cashmaker Full System for a tiny part of the price you will have to pay after this Indiegogo Campaign ends, and you can have it trading in your account much earlier than anyone else.


How this works to get your files?

There are only 100 supporters who will have direct access to Cashmaker Secret Files with special conditions.
From those 100 supporters there only 10 "Super Early Birds" you can get all the files with only a $99 contribution. Do you gone miss this opportunity?
After all the 100 perks are fulfiled you can get a pre-order vouchers to Official Cashmaker launch in May.

The Impact In Your Life and Others

If this software have turned a $10.000 into an account over $550.000 just in a Conservative Mode, can you imagine what could happen to your forex account in Standard or Aggressive mode?

Well, you could get retired in less than 5 years!

This is your opportunity to make a BIG BIG DIFFERENCE in your life and the life of many other people all over the world!


Select your perk and make your contribution now to this Awesome Project!


Let's make your and someone life's change!



Other Ways You Can Help

If you think Cashmaker is great, but you don't want to fund this project by now, please spread the word to your friends, your social media, or your blog!

Use the Indiegogo share tools.

We're grateful for any efforts on our behalf.



Legal Risk Disclosure

By getting and using Cashmaker Forex System you accept the following Risk Disclosure.

Cashmaker Forex System does not manage Forex accounts and has no control over your account. Past performance is not indicative of future results, as returns may vary according to market conditions. Trading in foreign exchange is speculative and may involve the loss of some or all of your principal. The use of leverage can work against you as well as for you. While there is great potential for reward in Forex trading, there is also significant risk of loss; therefore, funds used for these systems should be risk capital funds that if lost will not significantly affect one's personal financial well being. This is not a solicitation to invest and you should carefully consider your financial situation for suitability or discuss with a financial advisor prior to making any investment. Cashmaker makes no consideration or is made toward your financial circumstances. All material presented is for general informational purposes only. We suggest that the user test all information and trading methodologies provided here through paper trading or some other form of testing. There is no guarantee past performance will be indicative or future results. No assurance can be given that the recommendations of Cashmaker will be profitable or will not be subject to losses. All users should understand that the results of a particular period will not necessarily be indicative of results in future periods. The results listed at the recommended websites are based on hypothetical trade results. Plainly speaking, these trades were not actually executed. Hypothetical or simulated performance results have certain inherent limitations. Unlike an actual performance record, simulated trades do not represent actual trading. Also, since the trades have not actually been executed, the results may have over or under compensated for the impact, if any, of certain market factors such as lack of liquidity. You may have done better or worse than the results portrayed. No representation is being made that any account will or is likely to achieve profits or losses similar to those shown. No independent party has audited the hypothetical performance contained at this website, nor has any independent party undertaken to confirm that they reflect the trading method under the assumptions or conditions specified hereafter. While the results presented at this website are based upon certain assumptions believed to reflect actual trading conditions, these assumptions may not include all variables that will affect, or have in the past affected, the execution of trades indicated by Cashmaker. The simulation assumes purchase and sale prices believed to be attainable. In actual trading, prices received may or may not be the same as the assumed order prices. You expressly understand and agree that Cashmaker owner /provider shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss or profits, goodwill, use, data or other tangible and intangible losses. Hypothetical or simulated performance results have certain limitations. Unlike an actual performance record, simulated results do not represent actual trading. Also, since the trades have not actually been executed, the results may have under or over-compensated for the impact, if any, of certain market factors such as lack of liquidity. Hypothetical trading programs in general are benefit of hindsight. No representation is being made that any account will or is likely to achieve profits or losses similar to those shown. Substantial risk is involved. Forex trading has large potential rewards, but also large potential risk. You must be aware of the risks and be willing to accept them in order to invest in the Forex markets. Don’t trade with money you can’t afford to lose. Nothing here or in any suggested website shall be deemed a solicitation or an offer to Buy/sell  currencies pairs at forex market. No representation is being made that any account will or is likely to achieve profits or losses similar to those discussed on our site. Also, the past performance of any trading methodology is not necessarily indicative of futures results. Day trading involves high risks and you can lose a lot of money.


All the pictures are for demonstration purposes only. All the Cashmaker files will be sent by email.

story:
“Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it.” - Buddha

Overview

C’reer is the first app that will uniquely support foster kids in pursuing a career and higher education.

Through specialized career and vocational guidance, C’reer is already helping young people navigate their options after high school. With your help, we’ll be able to add functionality that brings training programs, apprenticeships, jobs and higher education placement opportunities to the youth in the U.S. who need support the most.

Summary

When Jose Mallabo and Ian Leslie co-founded Vireo Labs in August 2015 they began working on the early renderings of what is now C’reer. The goal was to make career and college exploration possible for anyone. Now, after the successful launch of the app in early 2017, C’reer is already causing a shift in college recruitment marketing and the college search process.

The team wants to do more.

Only 7-13% of foster kids will get into college and of those only 2% will graduate (compared to 24% of general adult population). Faced with the prospect of aging out of the system – finding a career or education path beyond high school is far more critical for these kids because the alternative is almost surely homelessness.

Through a partnership with national non-profit iFoster, Vireo Labs is working to develop a special platform within C’reer to support kids in the American foster system. (Our CEO served as the original board member to iFoster when it was founded.) The goal is to help youth find their path in life sooner using the app that can connect them to apprenticeships, career paths and higher education placement opportunities. 

We believe that everyone should have the same opportunity to answer the question: What do I want to be when I grow up? And, know C’reer can revolutionize the way kids transition out of the foster system.

What We Need

We are looking to raise $30,000 to do a few specific things:

  • Create a separate C’reer login page and user interface designed specifically for youth and mentors in the foster system.
  • Secure expensive and valuable information and research on colleges, universities and vocational schools that have specific programs dedicated to foster youth.
  • Integrate the massive data structure of the apprenticeships offered by thousands of companies around the United States into C'reer.
  • Continue to improve our software and user experience.

C’reer will always be free for all students of any age. Whether or not we reach our goal, your support will make it possible for us to ensure the information we provide students is always relevant, helpful, and easy to navigate. Every dollar you donate helps young people get closer to a meaningful, vibrant career, by connecting them to the valuable resources and information they need.

The Impact

There are about 500,000 American kids in foster care each year. That’s equivalent to every man, woman and child living in our home towns of Savannah, Georgia, Charleston and Beaufort, South Carolina being homeless. About 30,000 foster children age out of the system at 17 or 18, effectively becoming homeless due to lack of support and higher education assistance in the transitional time surrounding high school.

C’reer has already had a great deal of success, but we want to give kids in the foster system, who are typically the least supported in their home and school environments, an opportunity to thrive by helping them to find information, education and work opportunities they may not have access to otherwise.

C’reer will be an on demand career and school counselor in the palm of their hands.

Risks & Challenges

We know that youth in the foster care system may be less likely to have a cell phone, tablet or computer than their peers. But that trend is changing.

That’s why, thanks to our partnership with iFoster, it’s possible for many of these kids to receive devices at deeply discounted rates through special funding and resource programs.

It’s one of our goals to make access to digital information and resources as easy as possible for all youth. Because, sometimes the difference in a young person finding her way in life is as simple as access to information.

Beyond money – we can still use your help!

Spread the word.  We've built a great supporting team including Katherine Pastor -- 2016 School Counselor of the Year and member of our corporate board of advisors -- but we could use your help in spreading the word! 

Download the app in the App Store or Google Play. Let us know what you think — even if you’re already well into your career!

Get social with us. Stay connected via Twitter, Facebook and Instagram.

And thank you! It’s all of you who make C’reer work!

 

Featuring a special partnership with Fostering Success Michigan

 

For a generous $2,500 contribution to our campaign, we will donate $500 in your name to the Fostering Success Michigan Higher Education Consortium (FSM HEC). The consortium is comprised of 16 campus-based support programs from across Michigan that collaborates and advocates to increase postsecondary access for youth in foster care. FSM HEC aims to inspire, educate, coordinate, build capacity and support campus-based programs across the state of Michigan. For more information visit http://fosteringsuccessmichigan.com/library/fostering-success-michigan-hec. 

To contribute at this level, please click on the perk named “Fostering Success” to ensure you claim the benefits for funding our campaign at this level! 

Participating programs: 

  • Aquinas College Fostering Success Scholarship Initiative
  • Baker College-Flint Link Program (Living Independently Networking Knowledge)
  • Eastern Michigan University MAGIC Program (Mentorship Access Guidance In College)
  • Ferris State University FYI Program (Ferris Youth Initiative)
  • Kalamazoo Valley Community College Life Resources
  • Lake Michigan College Smart to Finish Program
  • Lansing Community College Fostering Stars Program
  • Michigan State University FAME Program (Fostering Academics, Mentoring Excellence)
  • Northwestern Michigan College YourNMC
  • Saginaw Valley State University/Delta College FAST Youth in Transition Program
  • University of Michigan-Ann Arbor Blavin Scholars Program
  • University of Michigan-Flint Mpowering My Success Program
  • Washtenaw Community College Reach (Realizing Educational Achievement Can Happen)
  • Wayne County Community College SMART Program (Scholars Motivated to Advocate and Realize their Talents)
  • Wayne State University Transition to Independence Program (TIP)
  • Western Michigan University Seita Scholars Program 

 

Also in partnership with

 

 

C'reer gets 4 out of 5 stars in product review by:

Other press coverage

story:
PUMPIT is an extremely compact and versatile air compressor that weighs only 1.1 pounds and measures just 5.1 inches on its longest side. It includes a variety of nozzle adapters and preset modes for inflating all sorts of vehicles and household items. It operates by its built-in battery which does not require cable connection to a power outlet.

It is incredibly simple to use, just hook it up, press the button and it will start pumping. Its easy-to-read LCD screen and auto cut-off ensure to fill the tire to the desired pressure without overinflation. PUMPIT is a small, useful pump that everyone shall keep on hand in the car or in the garage for emergencies on the road or inflation jobs at home.

PUMPIT barely tips the scales over 1 pound, and doesn’t exceed 5.1 inches on any side, making it the smallest pump among all the competing brands in the market. 

 

The air hose and the interchangeable nozzles are safely and cleverly stored internally to keep it tight and compact enough to fit in a glove box, utility box, drawer, purse or even a pocket. 

 

It is intended for regular top-ups or in the event of a flat for standard size passenger car tires, motorcycles, bicycles, lawn mower tires, sporting equipment, pools, balls, toys, rafts, etc., so you will get back on the road or back in the game in no time.

PUMPIT comes with a 40cm(16inch) rubber air hose, a sports equipment needle, two high-pressure nozzles for cars and bicycles, covering almost all your inflation needs.

Simply remove the hose and the applicable nozzle, plug them in and screw it on the tire valve stem, hit the power on button, choose the right inflation mode and start pumping. It’s that easy.

The realtime inflation pressure and mode are clearly indicated on the LCD screen, and the operation is so intuitive and instinctive that there is no need for an instruction manual. 

You don’t have to worry about overinflation or underinflation at all, because PUMPIT has taken care of the whole process for you. It has a built-in digital gauge that will automatically measure the pressure when attached; a 4-modes-in-1 design which will intelligently preset a desired pressure once you press the button; an auto shut-off feature which will stop the motor when the target pressure is reached.

You can also manually adjust the pressure by pressing the “+” and “-” at an accuracy of 1.5PSI.

The four preset air pumping modes are designed to simplify the complicated manual operation towards cars, bicycles, motorcycles and basketballs, etc. 

Thanks to its built-in Li-battery, PUMPIT is absolutely cable-free, making it extremely convenient to use on the go.

When fully charged, the high-power, large-capacity battery is able to inflate a classic road bike tire from 0 to 55PSI 6 to 8 times.

The four LED lights on PUMPIT indicate the power status and it can be recharged in just over 2 hours using a power bank or a 5V/2A phone charger via a micro-USB cable. 

PUMPIT has a relatively powerful motor with a maximum working pressure of 120PSI and a good airflow which can inflate tires in a quiet, fast, efficient way without heating up. It It has the capability of fully inflating up to a 700x23c road bike tire from 0 to 120PSI or a 26x1.95 mountain bike tire from 0 to 55PSI in just about 2 minutes, and a 195/65R15 vehicle tire from 0 to as high as 35PSI in about 15 minutes.

PUMPIT is made of premium material which can sustain temperature as high as 160°F(70°C) and as low as -20°F(-4°C) and work properly, so you don’t have to worry about it being damaged by the extreme temperature while stored in the car in the summer or in the winter.

It has a very durable construction that can survive drops and scratches, ideal for outdoor use and you can always count on it in an emergency.

 PUMPIT’s back-lit LCD screen and floodlight make tire inflation or changes much easier even in pitch-black conditions. It is a helpful addition to your emergency r oadside kit to guarantee you never get stranded with a flat tire at night.

PUMPIT has a simple appearance, adhering to the design concept of organically combining function and form, and achieving a balance between appearance and function. Its functional area has been re-integrated and designed, and is split into two divisions: digital display and operation area. Users will find it easier and better to use.The PUMPIT team has an R&D center and three major manufacturing departments: electromechanical, electronic, and injection molding. We have extensively cooperated with many well-known colleges (institutions) of the Chinese Academy of Sciences to produce more than 150 national patents and 5 foreign patents. We won the Dongguan City Science and Technology Award Innovation Enterprise Award, Dongguan City Science and Technology Progress Award Second Prize and Dongguan Patent Award Prize. Our products have been rated as Guangdong Famous Brand Product, Guangdong Key New Product, Guangdong Independent Innovation Product and Guangdong High-tech Product. We attach great importance to the user experience, and through the joint efforts of the team to perfect this tire inflator.

 

This project is constructed and presented to you by OTO1, the marketing expert who've helped make 250+ campaigns successful, risk-free. 

Featured on BackerPlanet- IDEAL PLANET FOR CROWDFUNDING ENTHUSIASTS

story:
​

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Important Information:

*Weight: Please refer to the 'Recommended Weight Range' information under the 'Technical Specifications' section found above.

*Recycling: As each country/location has different regulations and policies regarding their accepted recyclable items we ask that you please check with your local council or governing body from more information on correctly disposing of your Cling Nano Strips once they reach the end of their useful life. 

*Email Marketing: With your permission, by signing up to our email newsletter or purchasing from our site, we may send you emails about our store, new products and other updates. This includes our partner products and companies. We will never contact you about anything un-related or give your information to any other party outside of our organisation as mentioned above. Your information is safe and secure with us. We are doing our best to abide by and remain in line with the GDPR rules for personal data and email contact. If you have any questions or wish to contact us to have your information removed, please use the form on our website or reach out to support@crowdfundedco.com.

Risks and challenges:

Over the past year Cling Adhesives has grown rapidly! We've shipped thousands of our nano pads worldwide, acquired international warehouse space, and have built strong professional relations with our manufacturing partners overseas. Not to mention we've also run and fulfilled a super successful Kickstarter campaign.

However, whilst we've been hard at work to ensure all the details associated with designing, prototyping, and planning for production of our Cling nanoMATS are correctly managed and accounted for there is always the possibility of a few speed bumps interfering with the final delivery date.

In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in manufacturing, transit times, or even a natural disaster, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until the issue is rectified and your rewards are on their way.

However, whilst we've been hard at work to ensure all the details associated with designing, prototyping, and planning for production of our Cling nanoMATS are correctly managed and accounted for there is always the possibility of a few speed bumps interfering with the final delivery date.
In the event that things don't go as planned, whether it's a delay in manufacturing, transit times, or even a natural disaster, we promise to communicate honestly with you and work around the clock until the issue is rectified and your rewards are on their way.

story:
We are looking to develop and market a new breed of social app. A transactional social app, where good deeds will be the currency. Here’s how we started…

My name is Irfan Khan, and I am the main driving force at Social Hero. I am 28 years old, and am expecting my first child later this year. The upcoming news of this new invitee in my life has inspired me to want to help and heal the world as best I can, in small, realistic, and achievable steps of course.   

I live a pretty normal life (if that’s what it’s called nowadays). I have a job, friends and family I care for and who care for me. I live in a normal fashion, in normal circumstances. Yet, I feel our generations (Older & Younger), can do more. More for our community, more for our friends, more for our family, and more for our neighbours and fellow humans…..the only question is how?

I am also a realist and appreciate that the world will not change overnight, but some steps have to be taken to make and improve it as best we can. Not just for us, but for our children too, you know, we do have too at some point think about them

I have always been interested in technology and have a background in IT, as well as running previous businesses, and I am the biggest techno geek you will ever find. I think that best qualify me for this project... I think... :-)  I love technology, and I love the opportunities it can and will open for us and for our children.

I also believe the social media aspect of our life is going to be further intertwined and is only going to snowball into more and more usage, I don’t think this is something anyone can change, and I don’t think it should; this should be something that should not only be embraced, but utilised to do good. I wish to be at the forefront of using technology to help, and better lives that couldn’t happen before this social media age.

Anyway, enough about me.

Now…

 

Our target is £30,000 to be able to really kick off the app development and most importantly the marketing. To spread the word, and really get people to back the idea. Once the app is developed, and certain traction is gained, we will be looking for large investment to really push the marketing forward. If this large sum can be achieved by Crowd funding than perfect, but realistically, we are after some capital to get things going

The app itself will require over 40 days’ worth of programming, and will come in at approx. £20000. To make sure the idea and the good deed spreads without technical hiccups, the app is designed to be extremely robust, and will go through thorough testing. The User interface will also be highly enhanced to allow for ease of use. Also we expect it to be very feature rich straight of the bat. Some of the features are below

  • Sign in with Facebook or Twitter
  • Create a profile in your HERO CHAMBER -which will have
    • Your rank, this will be decided by points earned doing good deeds – like walking a neighbour’s dog, helping an old lady cross the road, saving someone’s life is extreme, but it can happen. At the start, there will be a lot of flexibility as to what we will score for ‘good deeds’
    • Your Badges, which are earned depending on your points, and also independent of them too. So if you did one huge good deed, it may warrant a badge on its own accord. Each badge then ahas a level within too.
    • You will be able to customise your hero avatar, using unique and varied costumes. As well as link your hero to your other social sites, Facebook, Twitter, and have images from there sync into the hero chamber.
    • You will also be able to share, and link all of yours, and your friends heroic deeds through Facebook and twitter
    • You will be able to create your own Superhero League, with your friends, or heroes who share the same location/interests/charities with you.
    • You will be able to create a neighbourhood league, allowing you and your community to use social network to help each other, like cut the lawn of a neighbour who’s broken his leg, or lend an wrench to one who has a leaking pipe. As well as alert your community if there has been any robberies recently. We are talking with some local community’s councils to see if we can also link in with them for the latest news in your town/city.

 

  • Request/or attend to a request
    • You will be able to see all local quests set by other users
    • You will be able to set quests, so if you were moving and needed a hero to assist. Or a more simple, needed a light bulb replacing.

 

  • Charity Page
    • You will be linked to charities that can collaborate with us, and have your score with them, the tasks you have done for them recently. As well as what the charity is doing, their latest statuses too.
    • Donating to charities will earn you points, and allow you to level up.
    • Gifts and vouchers are donated to us to give to ‘top hero of the week’, and ‘most valiant deed’

  

The above are not all the features, and there will be plenty more. We are also willing to listen to any additional features you may want. Though we can’t promise all of them, you know, no teleportation feature just yet.

The remaining amount will be used by marketing to launch the App, and to get as much celebrity endorsements as possible. 

So this will be for social marketing, web page designs, and hiring of staff to lobby to the large number of celebrities on a lot of social media websites. 

If the goal is not reached, we will use whatever sum that has been established to formulate a skeleton of the app, and release this to gain further traction within the market. This will allow for further investment once the app goes live, and real life figures and audiences can be reached. 

Now for you guys…

Firstly thank you for reading this far!!!

And now in line with the APP, below are our perks for you, and it’s all about being recognition. Lots and lots of recognition. As well as recognition inside the community, we will give you merchandise that allows you to be recognised outside too!!! So here we go!

 

£1 - FOR THE CAUSE

Start you hero campaign

You will receive a code to allow you to download the add free version of the app for free.

You will also be awarded with the in App Badge

Founding Hero: For the cause

Est. Del - Dec 2013

 

£5 - HEART OF GOLD

Get Recognised

All of the above

We officially thank you on the App, and if you want on your social sites. 

You will also be awarded with the in App Badge

Founding Hero: Heart of Gold

Est. Del – Dec 2013

 £10 - HERO UPGRADE

Get Kitted Out

All of the Above

+Exclusive Wristband, only an exclusive 500 founder wristbands available. Be one of the first. 

You will also be awarded with the in App Badge

Founding Hero: Hero Upgrade

Est. Del – Mar 2014

Add £10 for outside the UK

£25 - SHOW YOUR METAL

Show the Hero in you

All of the Above

Exclusive Social Hero recycled metal badge/keyring, clip onto your coat, hat or handbag…show your metal, without harming the environment

You will also be awarded with the in App Badge

Founding Hero: Show Your Metal

Est. Del – Mar 2014

Add £5 for outside UK Delivery

 

£50 - TOTAL HERO

Level Up

All of the Above

A Fair Trade, Organic Baseball Cap!!! Things are going insane!! And the hero inside you is bursting to leap out

You will also be awarded with the in App Badge

Founding Hero: Total Hero

Est. Del – Mar 2014

Add £20 for delivery outside the UK

 

£100 - LEGEND

Complete Hero

All of the Above

An Exclusive, desirable, Social Hero organic and Fairtrade T-shirt

You will also be awarded with the in App Badge

Founding Hero: Legend

Est. Del – Mar 2014

Add £20 for delivery outside the UK

 

£500 - THE CHOSEN

Meet the team

All of the Above

A trip to our London Office (Expenses Covered if in the UK), and meeting the team. Name to be etched forever in our Hero Hall of Fame, as well as attached to the Credits.  

Once at our office, you will be treated to lunch out by us, in Central London

And Finally a Super Exclusive Social Hero Hoodie, designed by American Apparel. 

You will also be awarded with the in App Badge

Founding Hero: The Chosen

 

GOAL NOT REACHED

If the goal is not reached, I will use whatever sum that has been established to formulate a skeleton of the app, and release this to gain further traction within the market. This will allow for further investment once the app goes live, and real life figures and audiences can be reached. 

 

WHAT DIFFERENCE WILL YOU MAKE

The motivation behind this app, is that there are millions and millions of us who are good people, we live by a certain ethical code, and we don’t wish harm to others, or ourselves. Yet were not actively doing well in the world. We may be too busy, too tired, too hard spent at work... there could be a million reasons, but for one reason or another, were not doing enough good in the world. And as the saying goes - Good Men not need do anything... for evil to succeed. 

We want to see the good in the world, and we want the word to be a better place. We went the good people to do a little every now and again to make sure evil doesn’t succeed. 

I’m not asking that the above people sell everything they have, move to a remote country and help the indigenous population discover clean water (although nothing is stopping you)

We want those people above to just do a good deed every now and again, and hopefully often enough to make it a habit. To smile at a stranger, to help an old lady cross the road, to volunteer at a local shelter, 5 min, 10 min, 10 hours, whatever you can do. And We for that person through the app will allow them to be recognised amongst their peers, and family, which will want them to do it again, and continue with this whole circle of 'Paying it Forward' and bringing good vibes to themselves and all around them. 

We plan to get celebrities to help us promote the app, as well as give away gifts, memorabilia, tickets, etc. to entice the good deeds even further. 

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you can’t contribute, don’t fear. The app will be released and will be free of charge. There all your good deeds can be counted and racked up. 

But before it gets there, we need you to share, and mention, and like, until your blue in the face. Let’s get this out there, and let’s get this happening.

Wish us the best of luck!!!
