story:
It is Available for ALL!

Few months back, after trying many "Big names" of 3D printers using different technologies.. I felt disappointed for having bad quality and precise in making good shape with a beautiful end results..

And after searching, spending & experimenting over 2000 hours looking for good machine and compare prices, I decided to build my own machine using either DLP or SLA technology, so after experimenting and testing it in my lab, finally.. my dream of having high resolution printer comes to life!

Therefore, I'd loved to share with everybody in this world my experience in putting my machines between everyone's hand to in order to share it with your friends & colleagues..

Today..

I came up with "The" most affordable, fastest, cheapest, precise, open source DLP 3D printer at your place where ever you are, with the best price ever comparing with other big Brands in this industry..


Why DLP Technology?

Simply.. FDM technology can not match high resolution or speed running with DLP or SLA tech, beside some facts:

1. I was looking for a big challenge to reach 50 micron layer thickness even less, with larger printing bed I can reach.. and I did, and it is True!

2. To bring 3D printing technology into everyone's home.. True!

3. To build a quality and affordable 3D printer that everyone can enjoy! True!

4. I want this technology to be available to everyone at great and affordable price!.. True!

5. Assembling and using the 3D printer should be also easy to use with minimal efforts.. True!

6. Challenge many big Brands in this industry, True!

So, lets take a look on the technical comparison:


Why my Project Matters

Many prominent people believe 3D printing technology is not ready for the home. I respectfully disagree. When you help me to succeed, you are helping to bring this technology to everyone at a price that is easily affordable.

My reason for starting this project is simple: there are no low-cost 3D printers that meet the quality standards of the professional designer. As researchers at the MIT Media Lab, I was lucky to experience the best and most expensive fabrication equipment in the world. But, I became frustrated by the fact that all the professional-quality 3D printers were ridiculously expensive (read: tens of thousands of dollars) and were so complex to use. In 2013, I decided to build a solution to this problem myself, and I am now ready to share it with the world.

See the comparison below with other Brands!

Machine Features:

You can put up the Kit and use DLP or LED projectors to shine a 1024 x 768 pixel image onto a layer of photo-initiated polymer resin.  The result is a quick solid cure of the entire layer in one operation.  The layer thickness is typically 50 microns but your model can be sliced even thinner if you need even higher resolution.

Printer Size & Weight: 20cm*30cm*55cm , kit is about (3.5 kg) (7.5 kg with projector)

Accuracy: Resolutions in the z axis from 50-100 microns.

Speed: from 24 to 48 mm per hour.

Build Volume: 102.4 mm (4.03″) x 76.8 mm (3.02″) x 1400 mm (5.50″) at the 50 micron.

Projector: The Full kit with "Projector" perk includes a 1024x768 DLP projector, tested and ready for use. Since every one has their own specifications, it would be unnecessary to attach a high resolution projector to your machine. You can find projectors for about $200 - $300 on e-Bay, which would be suited for 99% of all your applications.

Click here to see the images bigger in order to see the fine details :)


Why I need Funding!

As some of you may know, I already have some funding (app~ for making some DLP complete kits) but in this campaign, I am planning to provide at least 20 complete kits, plus to have some Balsa wood, Acrylic sheets, light aluminium sheets, also to buy 40x30 Laser cutting machine to produce frames for the printers (of course, laser machine in based on the fund collected at the end of this campaign, otherwise, I'll use third party supplier to accomplish that stage).

However, the magnitude of my dream is too big in this project, and All I need is your support to accelerate development and to help me bring my machines into manufacture and into your homes.

Take a look on what I provide in this campaign:


And here is my target plan:


So... what would be your next printing model you would like to share?

story:
Whiteboards are great for enriching creative visualization during brainstorms, inspiring teams to innovate and helping them come up with more ideas - faster. However, great ideas can come anytime, anywhere, not just during your scheduled brainstorm meetings. With this in mind, ButterflyBoard was born.

Designed for today’s busy creative leaders, ButterflyBoard is not just an office stationery product. It is a creative tool that enables problem-solving and ideation on a lightweight and portable whiteboard - without limitations in time, space or scale.

Organize and present your ideas for your next meeting with ButterflyBoard - whether you’re working on a business plan, sketching a wireframe for your UI/UX design project, or brainstorming during a design thinking process!

ButterflyBoard is lighter and thinner than a regular notebook. Innovate anywhere.

 

Connect multiple pages without any gaps with ButterflyBoard’s magnetic binding.

 

Special magnets allow you to separate, rotate, and reconnect pages as you see fit.

 

Use ButterflyBoard like a notebook when alone, or brainstorm together in a group.

 

Write, save your notes digitally, erase, write again. Share your ideas anytime, anywhere.

 

There are many different kinds of whiteboards out there, but ButterflyBoard is different.

While ButterflyBoard is portable and can be used alone, it is also great in a group setting as you can add any number of pages and display it on a wall - making it almost infinitely scalable. 

 

...for fun!    

     

 

...for work!

 

 

THE ULTRA THIN WHITEBOARD PENCIL

Running out of space on your whiteboard? What you need is not more whiteboard space but a thinner pen! With ButterflyBoard’s specially designed 0.5mm whiteboard pencil, fit more notes on your whiteboard than you have ever imagined.

 

 

SNAP BINDING TECHNOLOGY (PATENT PENDING)

Ever put a magnet on a fridge to hold up some paper only to have it slide right off? Snap binding technology uses strong neodymium magnets on one edge of the ButterflyBoard to snap two or more boards together. With the right size and polarity, neodymium magnets allow for a smooth and sturdy binding experience - far more advanced than your average magnet. 

 

 

HIGH-QUALITY WHITEBOARD MATERIALS

ButterflyBoard writes and erases extra smooth because we make it by coating ultra light paper with several varnishes all differing in material, viscosity and thickness. Many other whiteboards use only normal laminate or a single coating, which may scratch or eventually peel. ButterflyBoard’s special multilayer coating makes the board extra tough and prevents it from peeling or scratching.

 

5MM LIGHT SQUARE GRID

After significant research, testing all kinds of graph paper, we figured out the perfect balance in terms of line thickness and grayscale. The grid lines on ButterflyBoard are unobtrusive but helpful, and won’t show up in photos you take of your notes.

 

 

 

 

 

In our past projects, we worked to figure out ways in which robotics, AI, the Internet, and technology could solve people’s everyday problems. Through that, we got to see what it really meant when people say 47 percent of jobs done by humans today will be replaced by robots in 20 years. To thrive in that kind of world, creativity is the most important thing - it’s something that cannot be replaced by technology.

To make the world a better place, we need creative and innovative ideas. We believe that creative ideas that can change the world come from active conversation and collaboration among people with diverse knowledge, background, and experiences. ButterflyBoard could be used  during these intellectual collaborations visualizing ideas and goals, which can happen anytime, anywhere, with anyone.

We pitched the ButterflyBoard along with the ultra thin dry erase marker to major Japanese stationery brands, but because the product market was too small, major brands avoided taking the risk.

Without their support, we decided to develop the product and create a new market for it. In the process, we challenged ourselves to expand globally to deliver ButterflyBoard to users all over the world. We hope that with worldwide support, we can help accelerate innovation globally.

 

This campaign is ButterflyBoard’s first step outside of Japan, where the product has been available online domestically for the past year. With this, the ButterflyBoard team hopes to showcase Made in Japan quality to people all over the world. The funds raised through Indiegogo will go to fine-tuning analog product development to achieve the highest quality possible. In addition, the ButterflyBoard team hopes to make future versions of ButterflyBoard an IoT device.

story:
Rotio® Compass.

Simple but intuitive

The most simple and intuitive design tool to complement natural creativity and add a new layer to the design process.  

Story.

The Rotio Compass was created by two professional industrial designers after noticing how many people are reluctant to draw and express their creativity through fear of being judged. 

‘Part of this issue is that the bar has been set so high, people don’t have the confidence to draw’. 

Our aim is to encourage more people to be creative. 

Two sizes. Two colours. 

Introducing the Rotio Standard and the Rotio Plus compass.

Both size compass are available in black or silver finish, we'll contact you after the campaign for your choice.

The holes are spaced at 5mm radius increments and has a circle range of ⌀40mm to ⌀140mm for the standard size and to ⌀40mm to ⌀200mm for the plus size. 

The proportions were developed around the standard A4 paper size. The largest circle of the Plus size fits within the width of an A4 paper sheet.

Undecided on which size? Most designers prefer the Rotio Set, one of each size.

 

The final prototypes have been made by the chosen manufacturer, we are ready for production.

The Rotio Compass has been entered into design awards:

Why the Rotio® Compass is not just another compass.

1. Precise and considered design. We have worked hard to create an intuitive and efficient design tool that gives a completely new drawing experience. Simply place on the page, your finger on the centre and rotate with a pen.

2. Designed to last. The body and centre are machined from aluminium making the compass is tough and robust. While the cartridge bearing at the centre allows for smooth and accurate arcs, curves and circles. The evenly spaced holes while won't suit all, has been sized to accommodate a range of pens and pencils.

3. Built for control and accuracy. While other compasses can be hard to use, the Rotio Compass has a stable base for accurate and defined line work. With greater control over the pen, the Rotio Compass allows you to go over and vary the line weight for greater depth and contrast to your sketching. Compared to a traditional compass, drawing full circles using the Rotio Compass is much easier, particularly for younger users. 

4. Leave no mark. As the Rotio Compass has no sharp point, it grips the page using a concealed nitrile o-ring. There are no marks or unsightly damage on the page leaving your work pristine.

5. Accurate line up. The hole in the centre is sized to make it easy to line up on specific points.

 

Design and Development.

Many different styles and versions of the compass were prototyped and tested. The design was finalised to two sizes, a small and a large known as the Plus. Larger versions, proved useful for a greater range of arcs but compromised usability when drawing smaller arcs. Likewise a version with more holes, at half increments, compromised the aesthetic of the product while providing arguably limited utility improvement. 

 

Why have we created the Rotio® Compass.

By creating a tool that is simple and intuitive to use, we hope the Rotio Compass breaks some of the stigma surrounding drawing and sketching. 

It is honest. It does not try to be any other tool - it is purely a compass. This is important as many other tools add features that do not improve the experience and are not utilised by the consumer.

We have balanced the compromise of aesthetics and utility. The product has its limitations, it cannot draw a circle of any size, there are fixed increments. However this lends the compass a refined aesthetic and a purposeful form.

Team 

We have an experienced design team of professional engineers and designers, from a number of industries, having worked for prestigious clients in the past.  

 

Click to go the the Rotio Compass Press Pack

Join the crowd and share on Twitter.

Share on Facebook.

 

Risks and challenges

Both the standard and the Plus compass are ready for manufacture. The final prototypes have been made by the manufacturer of the product and we are confident of shipping on time. Our design philosophy is to produce simple and well designed products. This does not make it immune from difficulties but the simplicity inherently reduces risk.

story: Sneakers needed a home . . . so we built it one.
story_txt: Sneakers needed a home . . . so we built it one.

story:
The Pitch...

Keiron Cunningham, current Saints coach and former player, has selflessy donated his prized World Club Challenge winning medal to raise funds for the Tony Barrow Fund.

Tony has been diagnosed with the aggressive glioblastoma multiforme, and a testimonial fund has been set up to help with Tony's treatment and care.

Keiron has donated his winner's medal to attract more donations to the fund, and immediately attracted a bid of £3000.

A poster on Facebook, Jonathon Morgan, suggested that fans chip together to put in a winning bid for the medal, which can then be returned to to its rightful owner - Keiron Cunningham!

The result - a win/win. Keiron gets to treasure his well earned prize, and the Tony Barrow Testimonial Fund receives a substantial winning bid.

The Cause...


At the age of 43 Tony Junior has been diagnosed with a highly malignant brain tumour (Grade 4 Glioblastoma). Tony will be commencing his treatment at Clatterbridge Hospital in July; this will be combination of Radiotherapy and Chemotherapy.

Tony Barrow Testimonial has been set up to help raise money for any treatment available and support Tony and his two young daughters, Megan and Lucy, through this difficult and distressing time.

Tony began his Rugby League career at Cronton before moving on to his local team, Thatto Heath. He then went on to sign for Oldham and play professionally. Tony finished his professional career at Swinton and also represented Lancashire. His passion for Rugby League did not end there and he went on to become player/coach with Willy Johnson at Portico Vine. Being a local Thatto Heath lad, Tony went back to his roots and laced up his boots to play with his friends in The Masters.

As you are already aware Tony is a very fit and active person who prides himself on helping others and giving what he can to those who need it most. He has displayed this with his endless charity work and training for The Steve Prescott Foundation.

We will be organising a variety of events in the coming weeks/months so will be using this page to keep everybody updated with our progress and plans.

Tony has the never ending support of his family, close friends and partner Anne-Marie. We are with him every step of the way and will not let this beat us!!!

The Tony Barrow Testimonial Twitter account:
@Tonybarrowfund

The Goal...

It's hard to know what a priceless item like this would attract as a winning bid, but a target of £5000 seems a realistic amount for this project to aim for and should stand a good chance of winning the auction - although it is hoped that donations will far exceed this amount.

If we fall short...

If the money raised isn't enough to win the auction, the money raised will still be donated to the Tony Barrow Testimonial Fund - it is a fantastic cause, and something the Rugby League family has already come together to support.

All money collected, after Indiegogo fees and any 3rd party fees from Paypal or Credit Card companies, will be donated to the fund.

Keiron Cunningham, current Saints coach and former player, has selflessy donated his prized World Club Challenge winning medal to raise funds for the Tony Barrow Fund.Tony has been diagnosed with the aggressive glioblastoma multiforme, and a testimonial fund has been set up to help with Tony's treatment and care.Keiron has donated his winner's medal to attract more donations to the fund, and immediately attracted a bid of £3000.A poster on Facebook, Jonathon Morgan, suggested that fans chip together to put in a winning bid for the medal, which can then be returned to to its rightful owner - Keiron Cunningham!The result - a win/win. story:
Motivated! is a powerful and easy to navigate tool to help anyone set and achieve goals.

We all have goals.  Whether your goal is to get a new job, lose weight, climb Mt. Everest, or simply to get out of bed every day feeling excited about your life, Motivated! helps you take each step.  We understand that sometimes getting out of bed can be the challenging part.  Motivated is designed to meet you exactly where you are right now, in your mind, with your goals and guide you forward.

Motivated! is a multi-level app that has many free levels that users can enjoy that includes a daily goal minder, calendar, stress-relieving tools, smile-inducing activities and advice, and tips from qualified motivation coaches.

Why motivation coaches?

Everything begins with a thought.  

Everything.

In order for your goals to be achieved, your thoughts need to be filled with visions of your successful outcome.  When you are stressed out, worried, you actually begin to expect the worst-case scenario.   It then it becomes near impossible to even take a step towards your biggest dreams.  By getting your mind on board with your goals, you will be a fiery, passionate, motivated, and SUCCESSFUL person with any goals you set for yourself with the Motivated! app.  Each step has been designed specifically for this app by qualified and certified psychologists and mental health professionals who have designed powerful steps of achieving your goals including all of the pitfalls you may experience when moving towards a challenge.  These qualified individuals have combined their expertise into one place that can now be available to everyone.

How does it work?

Motivated! guides you through a step by step process every day.  With action steps and reminders that take less than 5 minutes a day, users complete these steps in a 6-week timeframe.

If the user chooses a more comprehensive program then a more personalized process is available to catapult them into success.

How many levels are there?

Motivated! Savvy

Motivated! Performance

Motivated! Masterpiece

Savvy is available for free and includes extensive support including the daily reminders, calendar,  video, and audio journaling as well as the unique question and answer feature unique to this app called Connected.

What is Connected?

Connected is the capability to ask specific questions and have your question answered by a health professional and motivational coach.  Each Motivated! level allows different levels of support.  The Motivated! Masterpiece level allows for up to 10 questions a month with the option to video chat with your health professional to work through your challenges while working towards your goals.

story:
iMoov 

USE ANY DEVICE, ANYWHERE, WITH THE WORLD'S MOST VERSATILE AND ERGONOMIC STAND 

 

 

The iMoov Astuto is the only transformable device stand designed to work on your lap or any flat surface, and with any device you own. Pair it with the Teclado Bluetooth keyboard, and you have the ultimate solution for working on the go.

 

 

iMoov is...

  • ULTRA-PORTABLE - The iMoov Astuto stand and Teclado keyboard together are no wider than an iPad when folded, and are designed to always be available on the go. 
  • ERGONOMIC - The Astuto stand places your devices near eye level whether you're working on your lap or a desk, fighting back pain, heavy shoulders, and lumbago. 
  • MULTI-DEVICE - The iMoov Astuto's cleverly designed slots and the Teclado's Bluetooth connectivity are optimized to work great with practically any digital device.

  

Nous parlons aussi français. Question? Ecrivez-nous!  

Wir sprechen auch Deutsch. Frage ? Schreiben Sie uns! 

Hablamos tambien espanol. ¿Pregunta? ¡Escribanos! 

Wij spreken ook nederlands. Vraag? Schrijf ons!

  

 

   

   

Jared Green is a massage therapist with extensive expertise in the field of ergonomics. Check out his review above to see why he thinks the iMoov is the best way to stay healthy while working on the go.

  

iMoov's unique combination of sturdy feet and leatherette-velvet straps let you use it anywhere.

Pair it with the Teclado Bluetooth keyboard, and you have the ultimate solution for working on the go.  iMoov is...

MULTI-DEVICE - The iMoov Astuto's cleverly designed slots and the Teclado's Bluetooth connectivity are optimized to work great with practically any digital device.

Schrijf ons!         Jared Green is a massage therapist with extensive expertise in the field of ergonomics. Check out his review above to see why he thinks the iMoov is the best way to stay healthy while working on the go.  iMoov's unique combination of sturdy feet and leatherette-velvet straps let you use it anywhere.  
Use iMoov in your home office, watching TV or Netflix, travelling in airports or on trains, or anywhere you can sit or stand next to a flat surface.

Whether you are a frequent traveler, home office worker, or just want a better way to use your favorite mobile devices without craning your neck or holding them up, iMoov is right for you.
 

At just 1.1" thick and 1.74 lbs, the iMoov Astuto provides a portable workplace that is easy to pack.

Add in our .26" thick Teclado Bluetooth keyboard, and the whole package still doesn't take up much more space than an iPad. 
Both fit perfectly in our lightweight 10" and 14" BagIT shoulder bags, along with your tablet or ultrabook.

Thanks to our patented design combining sturdy legs and straps for your lap, you can truly use the iMoov Astuto and Teclado wherever you go.

iMoov is extremely compact, making it easy to grab and take along, even if you are packing light. Suddenly, the whole world opens itself up as a comfortable, efficient working environment.
iMoov even comes in handy at home, letting you use your tablet or laptop in bed or on the couch without worrying about strained necks and overheating devices.

iMoov's straps fit neatly across your legs, sturdily conforming to your body. 

Anywhere you can sit, you can use iMoov. The Astuto stand is incredibly stable whether supported by its straps or its feet.

The iMoov Astuto folds to about the size of an iPad, and the Teclado snaps magnetically into place. 

You can easily store your iMoov in your own laptop bags, or opt for one of our BagIT bags, designed specifically to fit the Astuto, Teclado, and either a tablet or laptop of your choice.
 
 
Our BagIT is the perfect companion for your iMoov Astuto and Teclado, with compartments for your stand, devices, and peripherals. It comes in an attractive coal black or heather grey, and two sizes: 10” and 14”
 

The BagIT 10” is ideal for tablet users and frequent travelers who want to minimize bulk. It fits everything you need, and nothing you don’t.

Our BagIT 14” is perfect for using your laptop or ultrabook on the go, maintaining a slim form factor with surprising utility.
 
Features:
 
Conductive cell phone pouch:

Equipped with cable managing straps, our cell phone pouch lets you use your phone without removing it from your BagIT’s strap. Color-matched to your BagIT, removeable, and fits up to an iPhone 7 Plus.
 
Luggage Strap:

 
Locking Zipper:

Provides added security and peace of mind, protecting your belongings.
 
Two Colors to Choose From:

Black or Grey, the BagIt is sure to look good in any scenario. Built from high quality materials and designed just for our iMoov products, the BagIT will stand the test of time.

iMoov banishes back pain, strained necks, and lumbago, bringing your devices to eye level so you can work comfortably.  

Working with devices sitting in your lap can have seriously detrimental effects to your health. More and more people are using their devices everywhere they go.
iMoov takes the pain out of using your devices while travelling or away from your desk. 

The Astuto stand brings all your devices much closer to eye level, giving you an ergonomic working position. 
 

iMoov is also perfect for watching your favorite shows in bed, gaming on your laptop, or even giving presentations at the office. 
In any scenario, iMoov will give you a vastly improved viewing angle and seating or standing position.

With six different use positions and endless device configurations, you won't run our of ways to use iMoov.

The iMoov Astuto allows you to place it on your lap supported by its straps, use it on a flat surface, or even use it with the legs folded in, to elevate your laptop for better air circulation. 
The Teclado Bluetooth keyboard is compatible with Windows, Android, Mac, and iOS devices, as well as some smart TVs. Use it in cramped spaces like trains and cabs, to watch your shows comfortably in your bed, or at the cafe.
 

 The iMoov stand is built from premium quality materials, and designed to remain stable through years of use.

 
The iMoov Astuto can support up to 11 pounds of weight. It is robust and resilient, and will fold and unfold in seconds. It features an anti-slip and anti-scratch rubberized surface, perfect for keeping your devices securely in place.
 
 

iMoov patented design will accommodate practically all phones, tablets, and laptops on the market.  

The Astuto stand is designed to have enough room for any device you may want to use, thanks to a sticky rubber work surface and two slots to fit your mobile phones and tablets.  

Two angled slots - one fully adjustable to the thickness of your devices - make it a breeze to comfortably view your mobile phones and tablets, while the sturdy stand will support computers up to 17". 

The slots provide two different viewing angles. The rear slot is fully adjustable with sliders to support devices of differing thickness.

The Teclado Bluetooth keyboard connects to all your devices, transforming tablets into powerful productivity companions.

The ultra-slim keyboard magnetically attaches to your Astuto stand, slotting securely into divots on the Astuto's surface. It boasts a built-in multi-touch touchpad, Bluetooth pairing memory for 3 devices, and a 500mAH battery good for up to 120 hours of continuous use. 
It is compatible with Android, Windows, iOS and Mac. You can even use it to control your Bluetooth equipped smart TV (provided it supports third party devices), thanks to the 33 foot range.

 

 
 

 

 
iMoov Astuto
Measurements:
     Closed: 7.72 x 1.12 x 10.43 inches (WxDxH) (196 x 28.4 x 265 mm)
     Opened: 14.57 x 10.43 inches (WxH) (370 x 265 mm) 
Weight : 1.74 lb (790 gr) 
Materials: ABS +PC plastic, Thermoplastic elastomer, aluminum, steel, leatherette, velvet
  
iMoov Teclado 
QWERTY US/UK layout keyboard with 17 shortcut / function keys (other layouts available upon request)
Memory for 3 paired devices
Built-in multi-touch touchpad w/left and right click
Magnetically slots into recessed divots in Astuto stand
Color: White with black letters 
Dimensions: LWH 10.16 x 6.78 x 0.26 inches (258 x 172 x 6.5 mm) 
Weight: .56 lbs (254 gr) 
Touchpad on/off key 
Battery: 500 mAh Li-Ion. Upt to 90 days standby, 120 hours continuous use, sub-4 hour charge time. Sleep mode after 10 minutes of idle. 
Bluetooth 3.0: 33ft (10m) range 
Compatibility - Bluetooth enabled Android/Windows/iOS / Mac devices and some Smart TVs. Touchpad not supported on iPad and iPhone. 
On/off switch; Bluetooth status LED; Power LED 
USB-to-micro USB charging cable & user manual included 
Certifications: CE, FCC, RoHS
  
iMoov Bag IT 10 & Bag IT 14 
Bag IT 10 
Internal Measurements: 10.63 x 7.87 x 1.57 (WxHxD ) (270 x 200 x 40 mm) 
External Measurements: 11.41 x 8.66 x 1.97 (WxHxD) (290 x 220 x 50 mm) 
Weight : 0.7 lb with shoulder strap (320 g) 
Materials: Polyamide, polyethylene foam, polyurethane accents, lockable metal zipper
Bag IT 14 
Internal Measurements: 14.17 x 9.5 x 1.97 (WxHxD ) (360 x 242 x 50 mm) 
External Measurements: 14.96 x 10.24 x 2.36 (WxHxD) (380 x 262 x 60 mm) 
Weight : 1.04 lb with shoulder strap (475 g) 
Materials: Polyamide, polyethylene foam, polyurethane accents, lockable metal zipper

The history of iMoov
 

 

 
Say hello to the people that made the iMoov possible.

story:
OverLord Pro Plus
The Most Reliable Delta 3D Printer

Reliable, Simple, Precise

The DreamMaker Overlord’s stylish design and ergonomic features helped to make it an unparalleled tool for makers and engineers since its release in 2015. We now present the DreamMaker Overlord Pro Plus. With improved reliability and precision it will look great in your garage, studio and classroom.

As featured on

Rapid Prototype Your Way To Success: TetraPOT

TetraPOT is a sustainability project that allows Mangrove trees to take root and grow in water. Industrial Designer Shen-Hung Lee’s goal is to distribute TetraPOT along coastlines so that tree roots will intertwine and gradually become a natural sea defense. 

Shen-Hung Lee, designer of TetraPOT

Thanks to the Overlord Pro Plus’ ultra-fast print speed and super reliability, Shen-Hung’s idea has been a huge success and has gone on to win a James Dyson award, a Red Dot Design award, and many more!

An Indispensable Tool for Mr. Tovar's classroom

A 3D Printer is a great tool for education – but not if you have to spend all your time fixing it. The OverLord Pro + is the number one choice for teachers: its reliable, quick, low noise performance will help you to demonstrate this exciting new technology easier than ever before. The simple, ergonomic three-button interface is all you need to make amazing prints and impress your students!

The DreamMaker Team

Team DreamMaker began with a dream: to create an ultra-reliable, affordable 3D printer for every creative mind. 
The team has expanded since 2011 with each member offering passion, talent and sweat.

After thousands of hours of trial, error and improvement, our team is confident that the Overlord Pro Plus is the smartest, most stylish, most reliable delta 3D printer in the world. The time and money invested to in the R&D process has not been wasted, and they guarantee that yours wont be either!

More info about OverLord 3D printer.

story:
Update (March 8, 2014): My research was featured on several other sites, including news websites from China, Spain, Croatia and France. I have been receiving a lot of positive feedback and I’m very excited to hear from the large number of people whose lives this project could touch!

Update (2 March 2014): Funding goal reached! Thank you for the contributions. Contributions beyond the initial goal will be used to collect an even larger number of samples for the research - a larger sample size will directly lead to a more optimal algorithm.

Update (1 March 2014): My research was featured on Mashable! Special thanks to Melissa Goldin for getting in touch :)

Update (15 February 2014): Thanks to very, very generous contributions, this project has almost reached it's funding goal within two days. I cannot begin to describe how helpful this contribution would be in my performance at the Intel ISEF and my motivation for research. Thank you very much for the support! Further contributions would be used to substantiate the survey's sample size - a larger sample size of color-blind users would lead to more refinement and improvements in the color-correction algorithms.


Summary

Around 7% of the world's population is color-blind. This Intel International Science and Engineering Fair research project is based on color compensation algorithms and techniques that improve images for color-blind viewers. 

About Me


I'm Animesh, 17, a grade 12 student from New Delhi, India. Over the last two years, I have been working on a research project that aims to optimize images, videos, websites and other visual content for color-blind viewers using image-processing algorithms. This research explores four image optimization algorithms with several permutations of color-correction techniques, and aims to determine the best color-correction process.

  

                  

In June 2013, this research won recognition when I was selected as a Regional Finalist at the Google Global Science Fair. After working throughout my senior year to bring this project to the Intel ISEF, I have been selected to represent India at the international-level fair in May 2014 at Los Angeles, California.

The Constraints

1) In order to extend my research, prove the effectiveness of the algorithms, and determine the most efficient algorithm, I need to test it on a sufficiently large sample set. While I have tested the algorithms with several people in my community, finding a mobilized group of color-blind viewers has been difficult. 

However, by leveraging the power of crowdsourcing and the Internet, I can obtain responses to a survey by presenting images optimized using four novel algorithms to color-blind viewers. A larger sample size would lead to increased credibility and a stronger basis for this research. Amazon MechTurks and a social-media application are currently top choices for these surveys.

2) I have currently been using unlicensed software. However, for the international level fair, I have been instructed to purchase licensed copies of MATLAB, Mathematica and other digital image processing toolkits that I am using in my research.

3) I am currently using my own web-server that has several bandwidth and speed constraints. As a result, even relatively simple computations take upto 10 seconds of processing time. In order to develop a scalable and universal application for improving images, I need to use Amazon Web Services or an equivalent host that is capable of handling a multitude of image processing requests at any given time. 

With sufficient data and the right platform, I believe this project could immensely benefit the color-blind community. Over the next few years, with calibration and improvements, these optimization algorithms could find their way into devices as software-based accessibility features. 


The Campaign

  • Amazon MechTurks is a crowdsourcing marketplace where real people perform surveys and other HITs (Human Intelligence Tasks) to earn rewards of the order of 1 or 2 cents for each task. This platform can be leveraged to find color-blind people and test them for color-blindness, allowing them to determine the best perceivable images from a variety of samples generated using the enhancement algorithms.
  • More funds would lead to more volunteers for the color-blindness tests. During manual surveys, only one in every twelve volunteers was diagnosed with color blindness. Thus, one volunteer would not translate to one sample at most times, and a significant number of people would need to be tested before a sufficient data set is created.
  • A portion of the funds would be used to buy licenses and hosting for the project source code. This is an important step before the project can be exhibited at the international level.

I am still a high school student, so I cannot offer a lot of fancy rewards, but I would like to show my appreciation in the following ways:

  • For contributions upto $25, the contributors names would be listed on the acknowledgements in my project report at the Intel ISEF.
  • For contributions upto $50, the contributors would receive an additional handwritten Thank You card from me in addition to the above.
  • For contributions upto $100, the contributors names would receive a special acknowledgement on the project's webpage in addition to the above rewards.
  • For contributions upto $500, the contributors names would be mentioned on my main project panel at the Intel ISEF.


The Impact


,

The motivation behind this project was to help color-blind people perceive information that they would otherwise be missing. Color-blindness is often left undetected, and even when detected, people rarely visit doctors for this condition. 

During the course of my research, I visited several blind schools, ophthalmologists and vision centers, but I could never gather information about people suffering from color-blindness. I then used simulation algorithms to predict the most effective methods for color compensation for color-blind viewers.

Testing can corroborate the findings and developments of my research, and a proven algorithm could then be used as the norm for color-correction. This feature could then be built into any device - phones, tablets, desktops, billboards - every element with a visual or digital aspect would benefit from this research.

With your help, I can substantiate this research and present a viable solution for the millions of color blind viewers across the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help share this campaign so I can gather more support for the research!

Note: All logos used above are copyrights of their respective owners.

A larger sample size would lead to increased credibility and a stronger basis for this research. Amazon MechTurks and a social-media application are currently top choices for these surveys.2) I have currently been using unlicensed software. However, for the international level fair, I have been instructed to purchase licensed copies of MATLAB, Mathematica and other digital image processing toolkits that I am using in my research.3) I am currently using my own web-server that has several bandwidth and speed constraints. As a result, even relatively simple computations take upto 10 seconds of processing time. In order to develop a scalable and universal application for improving images, I need to use Amazon Web Services or an equivalent host that is capable of handling a multitude of image processing requests at any given time. With sufficient data and the right platform, I believe this project could immensely benefit the color-blind community. Over the next few years, with calibration and improvements, these optimization algorithms could find their way into devices as software-based accessibility features. The Campaign
Amazon MechTurks is a crowdsourcing marketplace where real people perform surveys and other HITs (Human Intelligence Tasks) to earn rewards of the order of 1 or 2 cents for each task. This platform can be leveraged to find color-blind people and test them for color-blindness, allowing them to determine the best perceivable images from a variety of samples generated using the enhancement algorithms.
More funds would lead to more volunteers for the color-blindness tests. During manual surveys, only one in every twelve volunteers was diagnosed with color blindness. Thus, one volunteer would not translate to one sample at most times, and a significant number of people would need to be tested before a sufficient data set is created.
A portion of the funds would be used to buy licenses and hosting for the project source code. This is an important step before the project can be exhibited at the international level.
I am still a high school student, so I cannot offer a lot of fancy rewards, but I would like to show my appreciation in the following ways:
For contributions upto $25, the contributors names would be listed on the acknowledgements in my project report at the Intel ISEF.
For contributions upto $50, the contributors would receive an additional handwritten Thank You card from me in addition to the above.
For contributions upto $100, the contributors names would receive a special acknowledgement on the project's webpage in addition to the above rewards.
For contributions upto $500, the contributors names would be mentioned on my main project panel at the Intel ISEF.
The Impact,The motivation behind this project was to help color-blind people perceive information that they would otherwise be missing. Color-blindness is often left undetected, and even when detected, people rarely visit doctors for this condition. During the course of my research, I visited several blind schools, ophthalmologists and vision centers, but I could never gather information about people suffering from color-blindness. I then used simulation algorithms to predict the most effective methods for color compensation for color-blind viewers.Testing can corroborate the findings and developments of my research, and a proven algorithm could then be used as the norm for color-correction. This feature could then be built into any device - phones, tablets, desktops, billboards - every element with a visual or digital aspect would benefit from this research.With your help, I can substantiate this research and present a viable solution for the millions of color blind viewers across the world.Other Ways You Can HelpPlease help share this campaign so I can gather more support for the research!Note: All logos used above are copyrights of their respective owners.

story:
Short Summary

Crosstalk Ministries Senior Youth Camp strives to make camp happen every summer for as many campers as possible, regardless of financial means. This often means that we have people on bursaries, which can take a toll on our finances. We love to be able to bless people with camp every year, and so we are trying to raise some extra money to help pay for bursaries past, present, and future. Our staff are all volunteers, and so all of the money that comes from camp fees goes toward site fees, food, programming, etc.

What We Need & What You Get

We're currently at a deficit of about $5000 after this year's camp. So we're hoping to raise that much, to get us back onto the positive side of things. If we're able to raise more than that, the extra will go toward future bursaries, allowing more and more campers to come and enjoy camp! :)

We've got a lot of amazingly talented people on our team who have offered up some really awesome perks that you can claim along with your donations.

    The Impact

    So realistically it costs about $300 to send a person to camp for a week. This covers site fees as well as food and programming. Your donations will help make this more affordable for potential campers who might not be able to pay the full amount, and you'll be helping to keep an awesome camp going.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you're not able to make a donation yourself, we'd still love your support, both through prayer, and through shares ;) Let other people know about this campaign so that we can spread the word about Senior Youth Camp, and so that more campers can come out next summer than ever before! :)

story:
Colluide LLC

Colluide is a new web social start up that has developed an online social platform for public grading of posts. Founded in 2012 Colluide has a mission to define people with a new type of grade & measure how well people live their lives. It seeks to help people get a grade on how awesome they are based on their postings of memes, pictures, and videos.

Through this new platform, Colluide provides a way for users to connect and grade each other's life experiences and achievements. Colluide issues a challenge for everyone to share their greatest moments that they are proud of for the public to grade. As well as define themselves with a grade based on how well they live their life.

Construction of the website is in progress and app designs are ready however Colluide is asking the public for help to fund this project. Colluide will be focused towards college and high school students as a way to measure intelligence and EQ for a new type of grade to define students. Please help take our first challenge to help fund this project. If funding is hard to give help us spread the word or give us feedback either way Colluide appreciates your concern! Check out the website at www.colluide.com or our blog at http://colluide.blogspot.com/


Campaign Purpose

Colluide hopes to create an official way to properly define people with a new form of grading based on their posts using social media. Instead of posting a picture or video on facebook or twitter and getting a bunch of 'likes' why not post it to receive a grade based on how awesome it is. This grade could be used to measure multiple qualities such as I.Q., E.Q., athletic skill, business value or your own life.

Consequently funding of at least $10,000 is needed to complete website development and build a mobile app for all iphones and android users. It is our goal to spare no expense to hire the best programmers and developers to develop the most functional and ideal mobile app for our users. We are looking to expand its user base, and increase awareness of the new set of college resources available.  We are raising funds to reach out to our on the go users who are interested in networking and learning more about college. 
Colluide is a major supporter of the world cup. We hope it will be a place to post and receive a grade for the greatest football moments captured as well.


The Impact

#takethecolluidechallenge- Share Your Achievements For A Grade

Let's face it, everyone sooner or later has something to prove...whether it is a desire to be recognized or a need to show that they are living life to the fullest. Colluide challenges you to share your greatest moments in the form of memes, pictures, or videos for the public to grade. Instead of giving a bunch of 'likes' users will be able to provide a grade to the shared accomplishment based on their own liking. So post something awesome, subscribe to new people, and share your grades to everyone to prove you are a champion among champions with the highest grade!

Challengers:

Students- Whether you are in college or in high school,Colluide provides a  way to showcase your academic merit. Post a  philosophical thought  through a meme, captured moment of a graduation with a picture or an awesome video performing an athletic stunt. Define yourself with a whole new GPA based on how you life your life. Prove that you are not just book smart nerd but a go-getter that's living their life.

 Businesses- All businesses aim to be the best of the best in their  respective industries. Take the  challenge to post pictures & videos about your business to see how fans and customers rate you among competitors.

Average Joe- Anybody can take the challenge! If you have a proud moment and need to share it to the public go for it! Post your deepest thoughts, picture of climbing a mountain or video of scoring a goal to show off to the world.


Colluide is intended to be a vastly professional and educational related social tool. With adequate funding we will be one step closer to not only promote Colluide, but create a more user friendly site to increase connections between colleges and students. More features such as premium accounts for college recruiters and business need to be built as well as advertising tools throughout the website need to be developed.


Help us reach a goal to revolutionize the social network experience with a new grading feature. To create an easy, and fun social website and mobile app for everyone to take the colluide challenge and start sharing their experiences for a grade!
Monetary contributions are great but helping us spread the word of a new college recruiting social network for prospective students and recruiting colleges would be awesome too!! Colluide with us on instagram, facebook, twitter or ourblog.

story:
At Creator's Brand, we enjoy developing new products to enhance people's lifestyles. Our Team of Inventors is a dynamic group of individuals, who together, help develop ideas into reality.

 

Product Description

The Mouse Ledge is a portable mouse surface that easily attaches to either side of your laptop. It gives you a comfortable space to use your mouse or touchpad. The Mouse Ledge attaches with a simple tightening of the knob on the underside of the surface. To remove the Mouse Ledge, simply loosen the knob. The fine textured surface accurately reads your mouse movement.

Unlike a typical mouse pad, the Mouse Ledge is made of high quality Lexan(Polycarbonate) which provides an easy to clean, durable product. The Mouse Ledge's unique lever technology allows you to attach it to laptops from 0" to 1" thickness. 

The overall product dimensions are 6.5" x 6" x 2.5". The useable mouse space is 5" x 6" giving you plenty of space for your cursor to travel across your laptop's screen.

 

 Mulcreevy wrote via Amazon  "We used this for a keyboard tray that had a split keyboard on it that took all the space and left little for the mouse. This worked perfectly especially because the keyboard tray is barely an 1/8" thick."

 

The Story Behind The Mouse Ledge

The idea of the Mouse Ledge originated from one of our team member's frustration of using standard track pads. Our research found that most people prefer a work space that allows them to use a mouse. Tasks are completed much faster and with less headache. What we wanted to create was that same desktop feel that people desire, but on the go.

Busy lifestyles require more work to be performed in various environments that do not always have a desk to work at. For example, in your living room, bedroom, car, train, plane, etc. Our desire was to create a great product that was portable, sleek, easy to use, and enhance the laptop experience for all users.

 

Budget

Our Goal of $1,500 helps pay for the start of the molding process. The total cost of the mold will be $18,000. Any extra funds will be used to offset mold costs, production, packaging, and marketing. Our intentions are to get the Mouse Ledge in big box stores, major IT distributors, and to consumers all over the world.

 

Our Passion

The Mouse Ledge is a Game Changer for anyone who uses a laptop. We know that we have created a revolutionary product that will change your life. Here at Creator's Brand we are all in on making sure the Mouse Ledge becomes a worldwide success. Will you be one of the first to help us achieve that goal? 

The Future Is Closer Than We Could Have Imagined

 

Silke wrote via Amazon "I've had my mouse ledge for over a week now and couldn't imagine being without it now. I like to work outdoors, with my laptop on my knees. Now I can do just that without my hand cramping up. This is a great, much needed product for all you laptop users on the go."

 

Risks and Challenges

We have been manufacturing the Mouse Ledge since February 2017. Our sales have reached a point where we need to get a mold created. The Lexan molded Mouse Ledge will be available October 2017. This will allow us to supply quantities to keep up with demand. Having over 20 years of manufacturing experience with over 30 products, we WILL deliver the Mouse Ledge as promised.

story:
In today's techy world, we can find a cab, a date, or send money to someone in seconds.  At Boardhunt.com we believe buying and selling surfboards should be no different and we are raising funds to build a mobile app to accompany our website.


A little about us:

Since 2007 Boardhunt.com has been connecting surfer so they can sell their surfboards to each other online. 

Our long-term goal is to provide the best results to the surfing community and the surfboard ecosystem by, "boosting the board flow".  




1. The money we raise will allow us to build an app. Apps produce better results.


  • Easy login
  • Post pictures from your mobile phone
  • Auto-text recognition fields 
  • Text message with sellers
  • Clean viewing with GPS mapping

 

 

Today we upload images like this...

   

We need to do this...

   


2. We have momentum...




Estimates based on the average of several design firms in San Diego, CA. 



Goods will ship in the fall of 2014.  Beta will release the first quarter of 2015.


a. Sticker 


b.  Boardhunt App (beta)



c. Boardhunt tees 

American Apparel like, soft cotton Tee (yellow, white, or green).


d. Boardhunt trucker hat


Building an mobile app is our main priority.  However, if we reach our goal, we have major plans to revamp the website:

  • Board Alerts
  • Secure payment for long distance shipping
  • More privacy features
  • More accuracy controls
  • More social aspect to help buyers



Jon Howard, age 25

A wave riding fiend and surfboard design nerd. Long history of being involved with the surf industry, as well as a financial professional. Currently residing in La Jolla, CA.

Other interests: golf, hiking, live music, traveling

Nickname: Howie


Pat Muirragui, age 42 

A long time board-rider, electrical engineer, software developer, sales engineer in the web and mobile industry.  Proud father of two, living in Encinitas, CA

Other interests:  futbol, family, culture, yardwork

Nickname: Afuera-Papi



Fabi Muirragui, age 39

A long time surf/surfboard enthusiast, and entrepreneur.  Business development, sales and marketing professional in the technology industry.  Also living in Encinitas, CA.

Other interests:  travel, art/design, futbol, craft beer

Nickname:  Fonzerelli


Please let us know if you have any questions, comments or suggestions!

Email us at info@boardhunt.com

Insta: #boardhunt



About the campaign:

Q) How does the Beta work?
A) When we're ready with our beta version (estimated in Dec 2014) we can apply your 3 or 12 month membership.

Q) How will Boardhunt prioritize the spend?
A) Each $29 purchase counts as a vote toward the highest priority.  

Q) How was the target determined?
A) We worked with three design firms and grabbed the average cost of all projects.


About the service:

Q) Does Boardhunt sell surfboards?
A) No. We just connect buyers and sellers online.

Q) How does Boardhunt make money?
A) Ad space and PRO memberships which is geared for business or the  heavy users.

Q) Can I edit/delete my AD?
A) Yes. Login and select "edit ad/post" in the menu.

Q) How is BH better than other websites?
A) We know boards and offer a better experience.

Q) Can I post for free?
A) Yes, but only five items at a time. Otherwise it's only $9 for 3 months, or $19 per year. 

Q) Does Boardhunt sell user info?
A) Never. 

Q) How do I connect with a buyer?
A) Several ways.  Directly by email,  or with a single-click called, "nudge", by phone, texting, and then face to face when your're ready to buy.

Q) What is Nudge?
A) It automatically asks the seller over email if the board is still available. All you need do is click it once and wait for the response in email. 

Q) How long do boards stay posted?
A) Until they're sold

Q) How does BH maintain quality?
A) We remove junk and fix mis-categorized items. 

Q) Why can surf shops post?
A) Because they have good used boards for sale and its better to check online than driving.

story:
Our solution:

How we compare:

Designed to easily integrate into your favorite stores :

More about the project:




 


The chemical BPA (Bisphenol A) has been linked to a variety of health diseases including diabetes and cancer. Two separate studies showed BPA found in 96% of adults and 91% of pregnant women tested in the United States. BPA has already been banned by the FDA (Federal Disease Agency) from some products like baby bottles and children's drinking cups. It is still found however in beverage bottles, lining of food products, and our sales receipts. 

Voucher is committed to a safer alternative and we will supply retailers who use our printers with BPA-free paper for cash transactions.    

                            The Voucher Story

"Voucher began as a solution to a problem I had during my senior year of undergrad. I was very busy with classes and I frequently ate out. As a result, my car often accumulated piles of receipts that I would have to clean out about once every week. One particular day, I was disposing of my receipts at a gas station and noticed another student, a few pumps over, doing the same thing. I thought about how many people overlook their receipts and set them aside as waste. I went to the internet to see just exactly what the numbers were and I saw that as a nation, the US consumes around 640,000 tons of thermal paper annually. I thought there was a better, more sustainable solution, so I dedicated myself to figuring it out." - Kenneth Mack, Co-Founder
It took several months to architect a method for delivering a digital receipt directly from the retailer to the customer. After a number of attempts and failures, we finally developed a method including custom hardware, firmware, and a mobile application that leveraged open source APIs. 
Once the patent was filed for the method and the apparatus, work began on the prototype and now we are raising seed-funding to continue growing our company! 


                   Peek into our design process



The design for the Voucher printer is centered around the TI CC3200, the newest WiFi microcontroller from Texas Instruments. These ICs are currently on the forefront of the IoT (Internet of Things) industry . 



                                We need you

Currently we've spent about 8 months and $2,000 of our own money developing the architecture for Voucher, obtaining a provisional patent and beginning work on the backend of the mobile app. We are currently raising seed-funding to continue growing our company. With your help, here is what our future looks like:

Team


Perks

Our perks for your donations involve a mix of merchandise, say in future product development, and efforts the team can take to continue preserving natural resources.  We are untraditional in that we are unfortunately unable to offer our printer as a perk as it is designed for use in a retail environment. We appreciate donations of any amount and sincerely thank you for helping make this happen for us!


FAQ

Q: Can I use the Voucher app to return an item?
Yes, the receipt on your app will be valid for returns.

Q: How long will the receipts be stored in the app?
There will be options to customize how long you'd like to store a particular receipt. All receipts will be kept for entirety that they are valid unless chosen otherwise by the user.

Q: If I already get my receipts emailed to me, why do we need Voucher?
Voucher is a system to store all of your receipts. The goal is to be global, where the majority of credit and debit card transactions result in a Voucher receipt.

Q: How does Voucher work when customer pays with cash?
The first iteration of our product, unfortunately, will not support digital receipts for cash payments. However, it is our business model to supply our contracted retailers with non-BPA paper to stay carcinogen free. 

Please contact us!

We would love to hear from our community. Please reach out to us about any questions or comments about Voucher. Email the team at:
voucher.indiegogo@gmail.com


Thank you for your support!

story:
What we want to do

We are raising funds on Indiegogo to develop a stand-alone mobile app that uses artificial intelligence to analyze text pulled from messages on a mobile device (texts, e-mail, etc) to better understand the personality traits and possible behaviors of the author. We currently offer a web based application that utilizes the essential algorithms and process to be employed in the mobile app.

Have you or someone you know ever been cheated on, lied to, harmed either financially or emotionally; or worse, physically abused?

How would your life or their life be different if that bad situation had never happened?

Background

TruthSerum.comwas started in an effort to help people avoid harmful situations and relationships. Please help us impact the world for good by being a part of true and meaningful change. The world needs to know THE TRUTH. Please join the TRUTH REVOLUTION by contributing today.

My name is Mark Hunter, one of the co-founders of TruthSerum.com.  I have known many people in my life who have been lied to or cheated on.  I have  known people who have been physically or emotionally abused and this has been difficult to witness. 

Problem: When you first meet someone, or even if you have known someone for a long time, you don't always know the real person behind the face.  Even as you get to know them better, there are hidden traits within each of us...some more scary than others.  Many people meet others either on social media (FaceBook, Twitter, etc.) or on dating sites...but the reality is that people do NOT fully present their true self on these sites. Even if you meet someone in person at a club, bar, school, work, or any other social setting; you don't really know if they will be truthful, loyal and kind; or a liar, cheater, or worse.

Solution: I have partnered with scientists who specialize in linguistics and predictive analytics. We not only have the ability to to reveal personality traits...but also predict behaviors a person may manifest. THAT'S RIGHT, WE CAN PREDICT HUMAN BEHAVIOR. The cool thing about our process is that we can do this discretely, without requiring someone to complete lengthy psychometric assessments. We have already built an online tool (www.truthserum.com) that analyzes social media and can tell you a person's true personality.

Now is the time for SOCIAL CHANGE. Keep reading and you will learn how to help us change the world through the TRUTH REVOLUTION.

What we have done

TruthSerum.com utilizes a revolutionary, patent pending, analytical process that infers personality and behavioral characteristics of an individual from their own social network activity. No need to complete lengthy assessment forms or answer confusing questions, the “true you” has already been subconsciously encoded in your social network activity.

Just as a messy desk, a loud voice or a polished resume reveal subtle aspects of an individual’s personality, so too does social network activity. The things you say about yourself, the language you use, the photos you post and the pages you “like” all reveal aspects of your personality. The same is true of your friends and associates; there is much that can be learned simply by analyzing the information already made public.

Once you grant us permission to access your social network data our patent pending Personality Engine goes to work collecting and analyzing information from your profiles, posts, comments and tweets to create a multidimensional personality profile. Each profile is a unique snapshot of the traits and characteristics that make you, you. While the Personality Engine finishes gathering data from your social networks we will ask you few questions about your life. These life outcome questions help improve the Personality Engine’s inferences about you and others. The more it learns the better it can predict.

We need help from Indiegogo contributors like you to develop a standalone mobile app that will allow you to analyze virtually any text on your phone, whether it be social media, emails or text messages to reveal the underlying personality characteristics of the author.  (Please, if you are not able to help out financially, please help us by sending this to all your friends so the TRUTH REVOLUTION will go viral.)

Check out some of the fun video's we have produced demonstrating situations where the powerful predictive analytic of the TruthSerum Personality Engine can come in handy.

Is your friend a "TRUE" friend?  Is your boyfriend or girlfriend cheating on you?  Are people you trust lying to you?


Is the person you are going out on a date with some "Creepo" or really a great person?

Is your co-worker going to tell false stories about you, or try to sabotage your position within the company? Is your boss only saying you will get the promotion with no plan to follow through.

To learn more about the science behind TruthSerum.com, listen to a recent radio interview with one of the TruthSerum scientists.

Thank you so much for your support !!!!!

REWARDS DEFINED:

Our app utilizes TRUTHCredits that give you access to certain features. Let's say you want to gain a deeper understanding of a friend, you can use TRUCHCredits to:

  • BASIC: Analyze words from Text Messages and E-mails (1 TRUTHCredit per person analyzed)
  • DETAILED: Receive a detailed report about the personality traits of your friend (10 TRUTHCredits PP analyzed)
  • COMPLETE: Receive a full report that predicts what type of future behavior you might expect from your friend (15 TRUTHCredits PP analyzed)

SAMPLES:

Autographed Cartoon Story Board

T-Shirts

Mugs

 Customized

 

iPhone Covers (Can be customized)

INTERESTED INVESTORS: 

Following are several potential applications for the TruthSerum Personality Engine.

  • Dating sites - to enhance user experience while saving time, money and potential heartache, by revealing deep personality characteristics.
  • Market Research - enhance relationships with customers by learning their personality characteristics.
  • General Business - Understand your clients and customers on a deeper level, helping to increase sales.

story:
You and your pet bring each other so many moments of pure joy.  If you could, you'd always be there to brighten each others day, but sometimes you're not able to be together.  Thats why we created the PetziConnect, a new way for you to treat your pet and share a happy moment together, from anywhere, at anytime!

Introducing the Petzi Treat Cam, Its simple, 

  • Download the simple to use app on your smartphone or tablet.
  • Load your pet's favorite treats.
  • Then, from anywhere at anytime you can pull up the app to connect with your little buddy at home.
  • With the tap of a button you can see your best friend, speak to them and give them a treat. Creating a bright spot in each of your day!
  • Capture it all with photo or video, to create a happy moment in someone else's day by sharing with friends and family.

While science may explain why it makes sense, the mutually satisfying experience and heart-warming ray of sunshine that it brings to you and your pets day explains the PetziConnect. 

Simple to Use App

Intuitive controls allow you to interact seamlessly with simple and common-sense settings like audio, alerts and scheduling. 

Security and Peace of Mind

Transparent to the user, PetziConnect operates upon a 128-/256-bit encrypted, proprietary transport layer that blanket secures our three PZ modules - Portal (mobile or web), Cloud, and PetziConnect device. By building out the Petzila architecture from the bottom up, we ensure secure access and peace of mind at all times. 

Use Petzi Treat Cam to take your Pet Viral

Petzi Treat Cam

Stylish and smooth with rounded corners an HD camera and crystal-clear sound along with an easy-fill treat dispenser. It mounts securely and is rugged enough to take on Fido coming with a 12 month warranty.

Personalize your PetziConnect

Your new PetziConnect automaticaly comes ready for use with a white skin and now Petzila is offering optional decorative skinz! Each skin is easily removable for cleaning and interchanging to keep that fresh new look in any setting.

As an addtional exclusive perk for our Indiegogo contibutors each of you will have the opportunity to chose one additional skin for your PetziConnect at no charge!

Shipping

Shipping is free within the US. International shipping is an additional $20 per PetziConnect which should be added to you contribution total. 
NOW TAKING CONTRIBUTIONS FOR JANUARY DELIVERY. 

Why Crowd Funding

This section is typically about use of proceeds and the funds raised are important to bringing PetziConnect to market but that's not everything behind our decision to use this resource. There are many benefits to crowdfunding but first and foremost is that we at Petzila have the opportunity during, not after, the go-to-market process to interact with our customers. Without question, both PetziConnect the product and Petzila the company will be better for your input, suggestions and feedback. Ultimately, we are about the experience that our products create between you and your pet and that experience starts right here right now. With your help and our passion to get it right we will make sure that the entire experience is a smile! 

Petzila in the Press

What People Are Saying

"Petzila Waves Bye Bye to the Babysitter" - Marware.

"Beam me up, Petzila" - Paws Tech Magazine.

"Video Conference with your Dog ..." - Cult of Mac.

"Petzila – организуем «видеочат» со своим четвероногим другом" / "Organize a Chat with your Four-legged Friend" - Tech Touch.

"videochatten met je hond voor een koekje" / "Video chat with your dog for a cookie" - iPhone club.

"Petzila Allows You to Stay in Touch With Your Pet All Day" - TrendHunter.

"Petzila takes the Edge off Separation Anxiety" - ChipChick.

"Be Close to Your Pet While Away with Petzila" - Techmash. 

Contact

Address: 560 South Winchester Blvd., Suite 500, San Jose, CA 95128, USA. 

Telephone: +1.408.236.7395

info@petzila.com

david@petzila.com

simon@petzila.com

About Us

 

Founded in the heart of Silicon Valley, Petzila cofounders Simon Milner and Dave Clark both recognized the benefits of technology but realized how little technology there was related to something they both loved, their pets!

One night while out to dinner chatting and sharing pictures from their smartphones they inevitably came across pictures of their pets. Next thing they knew everyone wanted to see, even total strangers. Simon turned to Dave and said, "Ya know, why can’t we introduce our pets live and in real time with our smartphones?"

The wheels started turning ...

Both being veterans of companies large and small, new and old, public and private and both having brought products from concept to market that millions are currently enjoying today, it was a good question!

They were shocked when they searched for existing solutions and found none, with the exception of the larger home security offerings touting the ability to check on your pet, which they thought was great if you were watching the video stream while your pet walked by. But where was the interactive joy in that?

There had to be a way to get their pets on the net and create a truly interactive experience with a reward, a moment of joy? 

They thought...Heck if Pavlov could do it with a treat, why couldn’t we?

Many long conversations and lots of research later they both took the leap and committed full time to launcing the pet-tech revolution and creating what is now Petzila.

As an aside, the first night that Dave took home the PetziConnect initial prototype, not only did his dogs respond exactly as expected to his girlfriends voice (their real master) but upon receiving the dispensed treat the dogs were immediately hooked. Zero learning curve. 

Unfortunately, upstairs Dave’s girlfriend took to the experience equally as enthusiastically. Dave literally had to go downstairs and unplug the device so that he and the dogs could get some sleep as her phone battery was showing no signs of running out. That night one of the dogs actually slept downstairs by the unit:-)

The result of over 24 months of research and development is PetziConnect - the first salvo in the pet-tech revolution and just the beginning of the vision that is Petzila.

Come join us! Ohhh, and don't forget to like us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Petzila
