story:
Plug'n'Play

Everybody wants to jump right into printing and nobody wants to spend half a day setting up a complicated machine. You only need to unbox PLUTO, plug in the power supply and fill the tank with the resin. After you launch 3Deviser the printer will be automatically detected and you are ready to go!
 

Wireless connectivity

We also dislike unnecessary cables (we had enough of them during developing the first prototypes). PLUTO has a built-in WiFi module and it can connect to your existing network or create it's own. 3Deviser automatically detects every PLUTO connected to the WiFi.
 

Open Source

We have used a lot of open source and free software during the development of PLUTO and we would like to give back something in return. 3Deviser, PLUTO's firmwares and it's schematics will be published on GitHub. 
While PLUTO and it's softwares are quite capable in their current state we think that opening PLUTO up will enable it to do much more than we alone could provide. We believe that everybody should be free to tinker with their 3D printers.

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
The quality of the printed objects is much higher than anybody could achieve on a standard FDM machine. Take a look at the details that PLUTO is able to create:
 
 
 For more high resolution photos visit the gallery on our website:
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 

Compact size

 
We designed PLUTO to be far smaller than regular desktop 3D printers. Its size is only 6.1"x6.1"x11.4" (155x155x290 mm), so you don't need an extra desk to operate it.
 
 
 

Top-Down architecture

Stereolithography (SLA) printers can be divided into two groups: bottom-up and top-down machines. Most of the printers on the market today use the bottom-up architecture. Unfortunately there is a significant peeling force after every cured layer, making these type of printers slower and less reliable.

These forces act not only on the printed objects but on the vat coating as well, limiting its lifetime. 

By choosing a top-down architecture we eliminated the problems with resin vats failing mid-print while making the overall construction simpler, therefore more reliable. The obvious downside of this approach is that you have to fill the whole tank to a fixed level, regardless of printed object size.

We solved this by filling most of the tank with glycerine, and only adding resin onto the top of it. Glycerine is much denser than resin and won't mix with it, while being completely non toxic and inert. As an added bonus it's water-clear so regardless of the chosen resin's opacity you can see the built object through the glycerine while printing.

 

Magnetic build platform

After the print is completed you should be able to easily exctract your printed object. No tools needed, just pop the magnetic build platform out of the machine and you can immediately add a clean one to start a new print.

Handling the printed object together with the build platform makes cleaning and post curing much easier.

 

German precision - provided by IGUS®

We wanted to make the Z axis as rigid and compact as possible. By placing it directly into the tank, we made the distance between the build platform and the leadscrew shorter, ensuring precision.  
However this design decision came with its own problems. Added lubrication for the components (leadscrew nut, linear bearing) is out of the question, since it could contaminate the resin. 

Choosing plastic bearing and nut components, as opposed to metal, was an obvious solution - but during development, we ran into a lot of dead ends. Commonly used plastics are not compatible with stereolithography resins, which results in swelling, distortion and eventually complete mechanical failure.

Here is when igus® came to the rescue. They are the world leader in engineered plastic bearing materials and could supply us with the highest precision leadscrews, nuts, bearings and linear guides. Utilizing their products, we could construct a precise Z axis with utmost reliability.

 

Modular Tank Design

The resin tank with the Z axis is designed to be easy to disassemble and clean. You don't need any tools to take it apart into the build platform, the mechanics of the Z axis and the tank itself. 

If you would like to go even further, taking the Z axis apart you will only need 2 allen keys (included with PLUTO).

 

PLUTO's PC software is 3Deviser. It was written from the ground up by us and it's source code will be published on GitHub. 

Import your models in .stl format and prepare them for printing on PLUTO. You can freely move, rotate and scale the objects and even do advanced processing on them like hollowing them out or automatically generating the necessary support structures for overhangs.

3Deviser automatically detects all the PLUTOs connected to your network and it enables you to manage all of your printers from one computer.  

 

 

 

Our focused image has 100 micron sized pixels on the surface of the resin, but we are still able to print objects with much smoother surface finishes. They can be compared to objects printed at 25-50 micron resolution.  

How do we do it?

The technology is called antialiasing. We can control each pixel individually and accurately, so we are able to project grayscale images instead of using only black&white pixels.

The object on the left shows how the ring would look like without smoothing, the one on the right shows how the grayscale pixels work. If a pixel hits the resin with 50% intensity the resin hardens to a half-width and half-height voxel attached to the neighbouring full intensity pixel's hardened voxel. In practice this means that we effectively multiplied the achievable resolution both in XY and in Z without using a higher resolution projector.

 

 

 

Third party resins
The working principle of PLUTO (top-down printing, no PDMS coated vat) means that it should be compatible with pretty much every material on the market. 

If you would like to experiment with different blends from different suppliers, then you can fine-tune the printing settings (such as movement, speed and exposure time) directly from 3Deviser, enabling you to cook up your own recipes for the materials of your choice.

 

 

People who are... 
not satisfied with the capabilities of the traditional FDM printers, but don't have the budget to invest in an expensive SLA machine. 

Beginners who are...
looking for their first machine to experience 3D printing.

Jewelers
We offer castable resin which supports traditional investment casting processes by burning out without any residue in the furnace. Since PLUTO is a DLP based printer, the printing time only depends on the height of the object. So you can easily print multiple items with high precision at the same time.

Engineers
It doesn't matter which engineering field you are coming from, stereolithography ensures the highest precision with durable finished parts. It can be an enclosure for a PCB, a designed product housing or a working mechanical component, you can create what you need from a wide range of materials.

Hobbyist / Scale modelers
You only need a small part which you cannot buy separately? Just print it on PLUTO! Or would you like to create custom scale models? Our model making grade material is just the perfect choice for you.

Hackers
PLUTO is designed to be Open Source. Experiment with your wildest ideas and share them with the community!

 

  • PLUTO
  • 1 pc resin tank
  • 1 pc Z motion axis (igus®)
  • 1 pc build platform
  • Power supply
  • USB cable
  • User manual
  • 2 pcs allen keys
  • 250 g resin 
  • 1 L glycerine

 

 

 

If you are interested in the main stages of PLUTO's development, please read our blog post on the following link:

 

 

 

We are a small, but experienced team of mechanical engineers, electrical engineers, product designers, programmers, but first of all: makers. 

5 years ago, we experienced 3D printing for the first time, when we bought our first FDM machine. We tried to utilize the technology to complete a range of different tasks, but we faced the never-ending issues of reliability and inaccuracy. It was at this point that we needed a better solution: We met the concept of stereolithography. 

These kind of printers and their operating costs were prohibitively expensive for our budget, so we had to find an another way. 
After countless hours of browsing and research, we decided to build our first machines based on SLA technology, back in 2013. Since then we gained a lot of experience in this field, and we built numerous prototypes throughout the years. 

In 2015 we felt confident enough to set our goal to develop a market-ready, reliable, precise, but still affordable machine. The journey of PLUTO has begun. And here we are today, we have learned a lot and we are proud what we have achieved in the past years. 

PLUTO is ready and is only waiting for mass production.

During the campaign we will be as transparent as possible. Feel free to ask anything in the comment section, we will answer them as soon as possible.

You can follow our journey on the following channels as well:
 

 

Risks and challenges

We know that bringing a project to life has big risks and challenges after the campaign is over.

During the development of PLUTO we set the goal that we should only start our Kickstarter campaign when the development is really finished and the product is ready for mass production.

To prove it to ourselves, we fully built 10 pre-production units of PLUTO, enabling us to test and evaluate our supply chain and parts procurement / assembly processes. 
We can proudly say that we didn't need to change any major aspect of PLUTO or it's manufacturing processes.

As our engineers and managers have many years of experience in the field of product development and manufacturing, we know that even while we do our best and work hard, a small problem in the supply chain can cause delivery delays. 
Therefore we included a 'safety zone' into our timeline to ensure the shipping and distribution of all PLUTOs, on time.

During the campaign we will be as transparent as possible and we will inform you about everything through the comments and campaign updates.

You only need to unbox PLUTO, plug in the power supply and fill the tank with the resin. PLUTO has a built-in WiFi module and it can connect to your existing network or create it's own. 3Deviser automatically detects every PLUTO connected to the WiFi. Open SourceWe have used a lot of open source and free software during the development of PLUTO and we would like to give back something in return. 3Deviser, PLUTO's firmwares and it's schematics will be published on GitHub. While PLUTO and it's softwares are quite capable in their current state we think that opening PLUTO up will enable it to do much more than we alone could provide. story:
ExpandHR helps you shape your company’s culture by being intuitive, easy to use and scalable so you can hire, onboard, pay and support your workforce with confidence every time. 

Story

Two women meet at a bar in Buckhead during happy hour time. They are both small business owners. They click and they talked about tech, people, and business growth.
Delmar is a Human Resources expert with over 25 years of experience working with corporate and startups. Shayna is the founder of a small product and design agency and Human Resources is the one thing causing lots of pain.

In less than a year, a GenX’r and a Millennial, would join forces to begin laying the building blocks for the best HR software company for small business in the world.
Their goal is simple: To be the HR partner for business owners who need to grow their teams and revenues safely and effectively.

Problem

Did you know it takes 42 days at a cost of $4,100 to hire? Did you know small business owners spend up to 40% of working hours on non-revenue generating activities like hiring?
Those challenges are not the only ones’ small businesses are facing, there are more like:

• Being productive in the first week of working is hard to do because onboarding takes up more time than it needs to. Processes are manual and technology has not been integrated

• Communication suffers because employees don’t have a centralized channel to express issues.

• The company wants to achieve a culture of diversity, equity, and inclusion but there is no reporting or tracking to support that.

• There is no centralized access to all the proper documentation.
• There is no time relevant plan around Health, Safety, and Well-being

Solution

ExpandHR is the solution providing Human Resources strategy that makes a world of difference to small business owners with a goal to expand, be productive, and increase profits. Expand HR offers easy to use expertise at your fingertips through automation.

How it Works

How does the product/service work?

• ExpandHR provides on demand access to HR lifecycle management for hiring, training, onboarding, health tracking and performance management of an employee.

Who is our customer?

• Small business owners with 100 or less employees in industries with a higher concentration of manual people processes as well as in person workers (i.e. eCommerce Fulfillment, Construction, etc)

Fundraising Goals

• Launch a successful crowdfunding campaign.

• Start to collect investor feedback as we open our seed round.
• Product Development-Prioritize our product backlog against our feature roadmap and working with our CEO and user research group to launch beta of product.

• Further develop technology and improve user experience.
• Create launch marketing strategy to attract our first 100 customers.

• Develop iOS and Android application in addition to existing desktop application.

• Hire a business development person to develop approach to software sales.

Company Background

ExpandHR is the solution providing people management strategy that makes a world of difference to growing small business owners. Expand HR offers easy to use expertise at your fingertips through automation

The 6 ways that ExpandHR solves for small business HR challenges

1. Easy onboarding so employees are productive on day one
2. Simple and automated employee reporting with demographic data to ensure compliance with equal opportunity employment
3. Intuitive and affordable solution with on demand acccess
4. Seamless team communications
5. Health and symptom tracking
6. Elimination of excessive manual processes

Press

story:
Overview:


3Dsimo creates multifunctional workshop that can fit into your pocket.

Now you will be able to create or fix almost everything! Multipro is the most multifunctional workshop that can fit into your pocket. This small device is able to substitute 3Dprinter, soldering station, plastic welder, resistance wire cutter, jigsaw, small drill, and electric screwdriver. If you prefer to build the device yourself and customize it to your needs then Kit is the world’s first Open Source multifunctional tool in the world.

In 3DSimo we design with compactness and user-friendly experience in mind. 3Dsimo company was founded in 2014, and we have sold more than 40 000 units of our previous models to this date. As a nod to 3D printing fans and makers all over the world, we have announced our Open Source product: 3Dsimo Kit 2.

 

Good things last, great things get even better.

We use this saying as our motto at 3Dsimo, and that is why we are happy to introduce you to new members of the 3Dsimo product lineup. They are multifunctional, smarter, more beautiful and more affordable than before. Our aim is to change the way you see and think about our tools.

 

3D drawing tool works using the same technology as FDM 3D printers, so you can create 3D objects without any knowledge of 3D modeling. Just start creating or repairing.

  • Create - phone covers, models of buildings, cosplay parts, jewelry, statues, action figures, household items, toys and much more.
  • Repair - 3D printed objects, toys, delaminated cables, electronic devices and much more.

You can start creating using any 3D printing filament currently on the market (ABS, PLA, HiPS, Flexi, Fluorescent, Wood, Metalic, Thermochrome, Conductive, e.t.c.) thanks to easy to set temperature and feeding speed.

 

Customize your sneakers or formal footwear and stand out on every occasion. Using the Burning tool, you can burn-in designs into wood, leather, plastic, and repair damaged plastic objects (chargers, phone covers, e.t.c.).

  • Leather burning - customize your leather wallet, belt, shoes or your pet's collar with the Burning tool
  • Wood burning - customize wood jewelry, cutting board or even desk of your table. And if you are a skilled artist, you can try even more exotic wood.
  • Repair and finishing touches - Whatever you create with the 3D Drawing tool, you can finalize with the Burning tool. Also, you can easily repair your 3D printed objects, cracked phone cover or any other plastic device. There is no easier way to repair damaged things than by heating up the broken pieces and connecting them back together.

 

For the electrical engineer in you. There is no need of purchase of an expensive soldering station any more. Our products can substitute it fully. Our soldering tip can heat up to 490°C within 20 seconds, while your hand will stay the same. Now you can repair broken USB cable, damaged headphones or create your own electronic devices your self.

 

Resistance wire cutting tool is an awesome tool for model builders, architects, designers and makers. Now you can create building models, RC models (cars, boats, planes), artpieces and much more. Thanks to high temperature of the wire, you can cut polystyrene, plastic boards, plexiglass, balsa wood and cork with ease. Another great feature is the angle platform, which allows you to set desired angle of cutting for precise and clean cut.

Use the Foam cutting attachment to create wooden glass frames, quadcopter frame or for example custom dress bow with ease.

 

Almost everyone knows a tool called jigsaw, which is used to cut wood, fiberglass and other materials. This tool in its standard form if big, heavy and expensive. Because of that, we though to ourselves, that it is time for a change and we created an attachment for 3Dsimo MultiPro with the same function. What are its advantages? It is small, light and powerful for a great price. Thanks to the fine teeth, it makes clean and precise cut.

Saw can be used to cut into wood, fiberglass, carbon, plastic or even aluminium.

Make yourself a wooden butterfly, glasses or quadcopter frame.

 

Electric drill is a valued tool in any household or toolbox of a handy maker.

Thanks to microclamps of the Drill attachment, you can use drill bits (0,3 - 3,2mm diameter), engraving bits or grinding bits.

  • Engraving - engrave glass or metal, create custom designs into glass as a present, or a custom ring
  • Drilling - drill into wood, plastic, carbon fibre, fiberglass, aluminium, brass or copper
  • Grinding - choose correct grinding wheel to grind any material, the Drilling attachment can reach upto 20 000 RPM
  • Cutting - by using circular saw blade, you can cut thin wood or glass

 

If we want to call 3Dsimo Multipro “The handheld workshop”, an electric screwdriver can not be missing. Our screwdriver is small and very capable. It’s peak torque is 4,5 Nm at 200 RPM.

It is a great tool for precise work, for screwing in self-tapping screws into wood, plastic or soft metal.

 

3Dsimo Kit 2 is the world’s first fully Open Source multifunctional 4 in 1 tool in the world.

All it’s plastic parts are 3D printed out of PLA, which is ecologically recyclable material made out of corn starch.

All of the hardware and software is Open Source, available on our Github here: https://github.com/3dsimo/3dsimo_kit

The assembly of 3Dsimo Kit 2 is user friendly and anybody can do it by following our assembly manual full of pictures or by watching a short video.

3Dsimo Kit 2 capabilities:

  • 3D drawing - user friendly temperature and feeding speed settings
  • Soldering - soldering electronics and creation of 3Dsimo Kit 2 upgrades with ease
  • Burning - burn into wood and leather or finalize 3D printed parts
  • Foam cutting - great tool for cutting 3D printing supports, for cutting plastic or polystyrene

We are looking forward to your upgrades of this Open Source product, we will be happy to check them out on our Github.

3Dsimo accessories:

to make choosing the right accessory for 3Dsimo products easier, we have sorted them by the product they belong to!

Sold units

In 2014, 3Dsimo s.r.o. was established, and since then, we have successfuly sold over 40 000 units of our products and a lot of accessories and secondary products.

We were able to find distribution partners in 31 countries around the world. But there is more!

We aim to create a product, that will be easy to update and upgrade in the future and will bring innovation year after year.

Thanks to our experience and very capable team, we were able to create such products - 3Dsimo Multipro and 3Dsimo Kit 2. There will no longer be the need for purchase of new device every year, you will be able to easily update your device via smartphone and purchase new attachments as we release them for a few dollars.

Learning from past mistakes is very important part of laying solid base for future success. Which is true for companies twice over.

In last 6 years of 3Dsimo operations, we have found many dead ends and made some mistakes, but we have always learned from that experience as much as we could and this knowledge helped us optimize and evolve our products and production.

We are very proud that we are able to successfully operate from the hearth of Europe - Prague, Czech Republic. Did you know, that bright minds from our country stand behind such groundbreaking and revolutionary discoveries such as contact lenses, the word “robot” and much more?

Following are photos and videos from our production:   

 

We are always happy when you show us how you use our products and what are you capable of creating. Here are a few pictures of things our customers created. We hope to inspire you as much as you inspire us:

3Dsimo s.r.o. is a fully grown company with the spirit of Start-up.

We develop and manufacture innovative handheld and creative tool technology.

Our team consists of experts from many different fields, mainly 3D printing, industrial design, and HW/SW development.

We aim to develop multifunctional tool, that will replace an ordinary workshop and will fit into a compact suitcase. Our vast experience from many years of designing and manufacturing multifunctional tools has been utilized in the creation of 3Dsimo Multipro (7 in 1) and 3Dsimo Kit 2.

Help us show 3Dsimo to the world.

As a nod to 3D printing fans and makers all over the world, we have announced our Open Source product: 3Dsimo Kit 2. Good things last, great things get even better.We use this saying as our motto at 3Dsimo, and that is why we are happy to introduce you to new members of the 3Dsimo product lineup. They are multifunctional, smarter, more beautiful and more affordable than before. Our aim is to change the way you see and think about our tools.  3D drawing tool works using the same technology as FDM 3D printers, so you can create 3D objects without any knowledge of 3D modeling. Just start creating or repairing.

Create - phone covers, models of buildings, cosplay parts, jewelry, statues, action figures, household items, toys and much more.

Repair - 3D printed objects, toys, delaminated cables, electronic devices and much more.
You can start creating using any 3D printing filament currently on the market (ABS, PLA, HiPS, Flexi, Fluorescent, Wood, Metalic, Thermochrome, Conductive, e.t.c.) thanks to easy to set temperature and feeding speed.  Customize your sneakers or formal footwear and stand out on every occasion. Using the Burning tool, you can burn-in designs into wood, leather, plastic, and repair damaged plastic objects (chargers, phone covers, e.t.c.).

Leather burning - customize your leather wallet, belt, shoes or your pet's collar with the Burning tool

Wood burning - customize wood jewelry, cutting board or even desk of your table. And if you are a skilled artist, you can try even more exotic wood.

Repair and finishing touches - Whatever you create with the 3D Drawing tool, you can finalize with the Burning tool. Also, you can easily repair your 3D printed objects, cracked phone cover or any other plastic device. There is no easier way to repair damaged things than by heating up the broken pieces and connecting them back together.
  For the electrical engineer in you. There is no need of purchase of an expensive soldering station any more. Our products can substitute it fully. Our soldering tip can heat up to 490°C within 20 seconds, while your hand will stay the same. Now you can repair broken USB cable, damaged headphones or create your own electronic devices your self.  Resistance wire cutting tool is an awesome tool for model builders, architects, designers and makers. Now you can create building models, RC models (cars, boats, planes), artpieces and much more. Thanks to high temperature of the wire, you can cut polystyrene, plastic boards, plexiglass, balsa wood and cork with ease. Another great feature is the angle platform, which allows you to set desired angle of cutting for precise and clean cut.Use the Foam cutting attachment to create wooden glass frames, quadcopter frame or for example custom dress bow with ease.  Almost everyone knows a tool called jigsaw, which is used to cut wood, fiberglass and other materials. This tool in its standard form if big, heavy and expensive. Because of that, we though to ourselves, that it is time for a change and we created an attachment for 3Dsimo MultiPro with the same function. What are its advantages? It is small, light and powerful for a great price. Thanks to the fine teeth, it makes clean and precise cut.Saw can be used to cut into wood, fiberglass, carbon, plastic or even aluminium.Make yourself a wooden butterfly, glasses or quadcopter frame.  Electric drill is a valued tool in any household or toolbox of a handy maker.Thanks to microclamps of the Drill attachment, you can use drill bits (0,3 - 3,2mm diameter), engraving bits or grinding bits.

Engraving - engrave glass or metal, create custom designs into glass as a present, or a custom ring

Drilling - drill into wood, plastic, carbon fibre, fiberglass, aluminium, brass or copper

Grinding - choose correct grinding wheel to grind any material, the Drilling attachment can reach upto 20 000 RPM

Cutting - by using circular saw blade, you can cut thin wood or glass
  If we want to call 3Dsimo Multipro “The handheld workshop”, an electric screwdriver can not be missing. Our screwdriver is small and very capable. It’s peak torque is 4,5 Nm at 200 RPM.It is a great tool for precise work, for screwing in self-tapping screws into wood, plastic or soft metal.  3Dsimo Kit 2 is the world’s first fully Open Source multifunctional 4 in 1 tool in the world.All it’s plastic parts are 3D printed out of PLA, which is ecologically recyclable material made out of corn starch.All of the hardware and software is Open Source, available on our Github here: https://github.com/3dsimo/3dsimo_kitThe assembly of 3Dsimo Kit 2 is user friendly and anybody can do it by following our assembly manual full of pictures or by watching a short video.3Dsimo Kit 2 capabilities:

3D drawing - user friendly temperature and feeding speed settings

Soldering - soldering electronics and creation of 3Dsimo Kit 2 upgrades with ease

Burning - burn into wood and leather or finalize 3D printed parts

Foam cutting - great tool for cutting 3D printing supports, for cutting plastic or polystyrene
We are looking forward to your upgrades of this Open Source product, we will be happy to check them out on our Github.

3Dsimo accessories:
to make choosing the right accessory for 3Dsimo products easier, we have sorted them by the product they belong to!



















Sold unitsIn 2014, 3Dsimo s.r.o. was established, and since then, we have successfuly sold over 40 000 units of our products and a lot of accessories and secondary products.We were able to find distribution partners in 31 countries around the world. But there is more!We aim to create a product, that will be easy to update and upgrade in the future and will bring innovation year after year.Thanks to our experience and very capable team, we were able to create such products - 3Dsimo Multipro and 3Dsimo Kit 2. There will no longer be the need for purchase of new device every year, you will be able to easily update your device via smartphone and purchase new attachments as we release them for a few dollars.Learning from past mistakes is very important part of laying solid base for future success. Which is true for companies twice over.In last 6 years of 3Dsimo operations, we have found many dead ends and made some mistakes, but we have always learned from that experience as much as we could and this knowledge helped us optimize and evolve our products and production.We are very proud that we are able to successfully operate from the hearth of Europe - Prague, Czech Republic. Did you know, that bright minds from our country stand behind such groundbreaking and revolutionary discoveries such as contact lenses, the word “robot” and much more?Following are photos and videos from our production:    We are always happy when you show us how you use our products and what are you capable of creating. Here are a few pictures of things our customers created. We hope to inspire you as much as you inspire us:3Dsimo s.r.o. is a fully grown company with the spirit of Start-up.We develop and manufacture innovative handheld and creative tool technology.Our team consists of experts from many different fields, mainly 3D printing, industrial design, and HW/SW development.We aim to develop multifunctional tool, that will replace an ordinary workshop and will fit into a compact suitcase. Our vast experience from many years of designing and manufacturing multifunctional tools has been utilized in the creation of 3Dsimo Multipro (7 in 1) and 3Dsimo Kit 2.Help us show 3Dsimo to the world.

story:
Why Backpack Cover ?   When travelling on a holiday, our bags with valuable items always leave unattended which makes us worried.

 

 

 

 

Cut-Resistant


 

 

 

 

Portable with only 300g of weight
 

 Waterproof throughout the lifespan.Other materials coated with the waterproof chemical will gradually deteriorate over time and It may require to coat again after years of usage.

 

Bag capacity 30 L
Recommended backpack size (not over than)
40cm Wide 
50cm Long
20cm Depth

extra room(outside the backpack) 10-20 L

 

 

 

2 size now available 
We now offer 2 size, which are day pack size and carry on size.

Carry On (45L)Recommended backpack size
35cm Wide 
70cm Long
25cm Depth  

 

This is a sample when put on carry bag with rollers
38cm W x 54cm L x 24cm D

 

 


 

 

FAQ. 
-We don't provide a lock, recommend to buy the best one for your safety.

-The outer waterproof fabric is not cut-resistant. If you got cut or scatch on it, it will not torn because it is adjacent to a cut-resistant fabric by special methods. You can easily repair the cut by apply the black pen marker on it.

www.option-pack.com 
Facebook 
youtube 
Twitter

Risks and challenges

Delay may occur if 
1.the order is higher than we expected. 
2.airmail usually takes around 15-30days but sometimes is a bit later than that. 
3.supply is also our concern, our suppliers may delay due to the season.

For the solution, we will try our best to stick on our timeline if some of those mentioned occur. We will definitely inform you in updates.

Backers may subject to import taxes in some countries which they have to responsible for.

story:
WE MADE IT!!

Thank you to everyone for your support & interest in our project.  We're excited that we reached our goal.   All contributions over our $10,000 goal will go directly towards the development of the Android app.  Thank you again--we look forward to getting you there!


lo•ca•lei•kki [loh-kuh-lay-kee] verb. Play local.

Have you ever been traveling and just wanted to find a good place to run, walk or ride?  Or maybe you had a workout to do and would enjoy jumping into a local group’s training session if only you could find one? 

We have, and did the usual—Google searches, pieced together routes from other sources, jogged aimlessly around a neighborhood only to turn a corner near the end of the run and see a great trail that was RIGHT THERE—if only we (or the hotel concierge!) had known!

That’s why we created localeikki.  We want to help people be active no matter where they are.  localeikki is a national database of recreation locations that are publicly accessible and locally recommended.  Input an address and your activity choice and localeikki will find local running/cycling locations others have shared.  Not only will you know where to go, you'll see pictures of what it looks like and what features are present (e.g., bathrooms, drinking water, parking, surface, hills, baby jogger friendly).  Want to find a regularly scheduled ride or run?  We have that information too!  You'll be able to find us on the web and as an app for your mobile devices.

Our initial focus is on outdoor endurance activities: run, walk, hike, mountain bike, and road cycling.   The geographic goal is U.S. recreation locations--urban, suburban and rural (ok, we'll be honest, the ultimate goal is worldwide recreation!)--so you are never lacking for a locally recommended place to be active.  

Where does the name come from?

The name is a riff off of the concept locavore: loca for local and leikki means play in Finnish—play local. Our goal is that the business not only helps people be active, but also encourages information sharing of great places to be active.  Did someone tell you about a good place to be active?  Pay it forward by sharing the great public places to run, bike, and play in your hometown. 

Who are we?

Tracy McMillan and Taylor Thomas are the co-founders of localeikki. Darryl Brown is programmer extraordinaire.

  • Tracy is a former professor of urban planning and public health (a Longhorn and a Jayhawk in that previous life).  She was tired of just studying active communities and wanted to do more to create and promote them.  She's also worked in the running industry for many years with her husband Greg (McMillan Running Company) and knows the camraderie that exists in running at all levels.  We support one another when we're running, and we can support one another to keep running using a tool like localeikki.  localeikki embodies her passion for exploring new places to play, which she hopes to pass on to her 5 year old son.
  • Taylor is a veteran of the cycling industry, doing everything from sales to professional racing. He would love nothing more than to see every person being active.  He's been involved in bicycle advocacy for many years and believes every community is full of great places to play.  His involvement with localeikki gives him an outlet to show people that recreation opportunities exist all around them.  When he's not preaching the localeikki gospel, he uses localeikki to find, and share, great experiences with his wife and two dogs.
  • Darryl owns and operates 2b design and development, a web and mobile applications company in downtown Flagstaff.  Before focusing on web and mobile applications, his career spanned many domains including high frequency financial trading systems, mobile/wireless phone network applications, seismic data analysis and super computing. He loves all things outdoors, including rogue bocce ball games around his patio.

Why crowdfunding? 

Like many start-ups, we began this project empowered by the problem we believe existed and the pennies in our bank accounts.  While that has taken us to the beta phase, we need your help to make localeikki a useful tool nationwide.

Our fundraising goal is $10,000.  Funds will be used to support the build out of the recreation database across the country and to finalize development of the website and iPhone app.

  • Approximately 40% of the funds will go towards the programming required to get the app ready for the iTunes App store (estimated launch date = end of summer 2013) and get the website looking 21st century.
  • 60% of the funds will be used for our localeikki ambassador program, where active locals across the county will add content, promote the product, provide feedback and monitor local content as the database grows. While this is a volunteer assignment, ambassadors will be eligible for schwag, cash incentives and prizes for helping us quickly get the database to a stage where it is ready for market.  They also receive the app in beta.

If we don't meet our goal, this percentage breakdown will remain the same; however, we'll have to scale back the ambassador program and delay our public launch.

Our dream scenario, though, is to meet our stretch goal of $15,000, so we can expand our ambassador program and get the Android app completed by the end of the summer as well. 

The Impact

You've all seen the statistics.  We are a nation (heck, a world!) that by and large needs to be more active.  Not knowing where to go and what to expect when you get there is a significant barrier to folks being active outside of familiar surroundings.  The great thing is, communities across the country are investing more resources to create active places--bike/ped paths, trails, parks, etc.--so you're really never too far from someplace to run, bike, or walk.  Our goal is to get you there, and to grow a community of active folks that share great places and promotes physical activity for all.

Other Ways You Can Help

We're running a referral contest within our campaign!  Log into indiegogo and then share the information about our campaign using the site's share features.  The person whose referrals generate the most contributions wins $100! (indiegogo can track the contribution to your share referral ONLY if you are logged in).
 
Even if you can't contribute right now, please pass along this crowdfunding campaign information to your friends (extra incentive via the contest above!), follow us on Twitter and Facebook, and most importantly, be active! A community of folks that appreciate physical activity and great recreation locations is, in the end, the ultimate goal.

Great places to play exist in communities across the country--localeikki can get you there.

story:
Introduction

 

Paus is a time-locking wireless charging stand that helps you create a healthy relationship with your phone. Paus is controlled locally by the Paus app over Bluetooth. No data goes to the cloud. No internet required. 

The journey to Paus started two years ago after a long conversation around being both present and productive. We loved that phones gave us access to music, directions, and helped us connect with those far away. But the negatives of these devices cannot be overlooked. We procrastinate by turning to our phones and neglecting important activities. We miss out on moments of our lives because we are being distracted from the present. 

We began our journey by trying digital wellness apps. We found those worked for some time, but we always found a way around them and they eventually became ineffective. We wanted to make something that we could use to put our phone in timeout and lock it away. Something that would empower you to take back control of your phone usage.

 

Features

- Timer Mode -

 

Paus is easy to use. Simply open the app, set a duration, and Paus will open when the timer is complete. The app enables "Do Not Disturb" (keeping your phone quiet within the box). Integrated wireless charging will ensure your phone is fully charged and ready to go!

 

- Alarm Mode -

 

Paus helps you wake up to a phone-free morning, giving you space to get started on the day. When it’s time for bed, set your wake-up time and Paus will help you wind down for a great night's sleep. You can even configure the alarm to go off and then delay the box opening (e.g. 1 hr after the alarm). This will keep you from using your phone first thing in the morning.

 

- Emergency Open -

 

In certain situations, it's important that people can reach you. Paus respects your phone's "Do Not Disturb" settings, allowing calls or texts from specific numbers to reach you in the event of an emergency.

 

- Tap Base for Status -

 

Tap anywhere on the capacitive-touch base for a status update on the time remaining. This allows you to check the status of your device without being interrupted or distracted by a display.

 

- Integrated QI-Certified Wireless Charging -

 

Powered through modern USB-C technology, Paus is compatible with wireless and non-wireless charging phones. The QI-certified  induction charging pad is discreetly hidden behind maple accents.

 

- Universal Fit - Compatible with All Smartphones -

 

 

Paus fits nearly every modern smartphone, from the humble iPhone 4 to the massive iPhone 12 Max.

 

- Sustainably Minded -

Every part of Paus was designed to prioritize quality and minimize environmental impact. We started with aluminum, which is infinitely recyclable and achieves aero-space grade durability. Sustainably sourced maple provides warm accents and a sturdy stainless steel base is built for a lifetime of use. Plastic would’ve been cheaper, but we wanted to make sure that your first Paus would be the only one you’d ever need.

 

 

The Paus App

The Paus app will be available in the iOS App Store and Android Google Play store prior to shipping. The App is free and only requires a Bluetooth connection. The app stores all information locally. No accounts to create or user information stored on the cloud.

 

1. Timer Mode

Timer mode is easy to use. select the lock duration (Days, Min, Hrs, Sec) then hit the arrow in the bottom right to lock the box. Your phone enters "Do Not Disturb" mode and your screen locks. After the time is complete the box opens and your time spent away is added to your phone-free time tracker (this will show up on your stats page).

 

2. Alarm Mode

Alarm mode works much the same way. Set a time for the box to open, then hit the arrow in the bottom right to lock the box. Your phone enters "Do Not Disturb" mode and your screen locks. After the time is complete the box opens and your time spent away is added to your phone-free time tracker (this will show up on your stats page).

 

3. Stats Page

The stats page shows your weekly, monthly, and yearly stats in both pie charts and bar graph formats. Here you can track changes in phone-free time vs usage time.

 

The Paus Band

Wrapping your phone in a band can be a great way to remind yourself that now is not the time to be looking at your phone.

At a $6 contribution level, you will get a custom-made rubber band with the text "BE PRESENT" on one side (and a secret bonus mantra on the other). This stretchy band is compatible with any sized phone and is a minimalist way to disrupt your habit cycle.

 

 

Project Budget

Over 90% of your contribution goes towards making the best tech limiting tech imaginable. The last bit is to cover the unsexy parts of the project like fees and fees and more fees. 

Our Mission

Our mission is to empower people to improve the relationship they have with their phones.

 

Meet The Team

 

Jared (left) is a mechanical engineer that loves helping people through design innovations. He loves eating in his free time so please send him your best recipes. Chris (right) is a software engineer who excels at finding solutions for problems people haven't even noticed yet. He is interested in learning about mental health and longevity in his free time.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand many will not choose to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Share with friends and family
  • Share on social media
  • Send us feedback!

Over 90% of your contribution goes towards making the best tech limiting tech imaginable. The last bit is to cover the unsexy parts of the project like fees and fees and more fees. 


Our Mission
Our mission is to empower people to improve the relationship they have with their phones.
 

Meet The Team

 
Jared (left) is a mechanical engineer that loves helping people through design innovations. He loves eating in his free time so please send him your best recipes. Chris (right) is a software engineer who excels at finding solutions for problems people haven't even noticed yet. He is interested in learning about mental health and longevity in his free time.

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand many will not choose to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

Share with friends and family
Share on social media
Send us feedback!

story:
Introducing Akaunting

Akaunting is a free, open source and online accounting software for small businesses and freelancers. From invoicing to expense tracking to accounting, Akaunting has all the tools you need to manage your money online, for free.

Akaunting has been downloaded 8000 times. We've surpassed the 1500th domain using Akaunting for their company. Our cloud service, also free, has reached 2000 companies using Akaunting for their accounting needs. That's right, over 3500 companies from around the world have begun their new accounting adventure. They've found the future of accounting software. They have set themselves and their businesses free.

App Store

While we strongly believe that Akaunting is the best free accounting software out there, we're very well aware that it's not perfect, just like everything in the real world. Akaunting ships with core accounting tools needed to manage the money. For further features, instead of creating a bloated software by adding all of them to the core, we've created a modular structure so that it could get extended easily. Learn more about the App Store.

Double Entry Accounting

As said above, Akaunting ships with core/single-entry accounting tools needed to manage your money, same as FreshBooks. However, some businesses prefer the double-entry system as it increases accountability and allows you to more easily prepare financial statements.

After receiving tons of double-entry requests on our forums, we decided to make an app with double entry accounting features.

The App

The app will be available in our App Store within 1 month after the campaign ends up. Its price will be $9 USD per month. You'll get the app with a huge discount from 72% to 95% if you support/fund us in the development stage.

Features

  • Chart of Accounts
  • Preloaded Accounts
  • Assets
  • Liabilities
  • Journal Entry
  • General Ledger
  • Balance Sheet Report
  • Trial Balance Report
  • Tax Report

 

Thanks in advance.

story:
What is Previewscan

 

  • Previewscan simplify the way we get informed about products, because what has to be done is just to scan the product barcode. How we do it now is to go from one website to another in searching for best prices and reviews from people who have already used our desired product, but this is really time consuming, isn't it? So to make it easier, I developed an abstract algorithm that is able to identify product titles, images and find all its reviews.

 

  • Every barcode is unique registred all over the world and it can be used to identify any product. Using it we can create a profile page for every product in the world and put all the information together so that when someone wants to find out more about a product can get it instant. Just imagine having all the information from all websites into a single handy mobile application, how easier it would be to get informed about any product in the world.

 

  • Currently the way Previewscan is working, is to receive a barcode as an input and uses results data from one of the search engines (Google, Bing or any other search engine) to find all the information about products.
  1. This process takes a very long time giving the fact that for every barcode the algorithm has to send a query to a search engine. 
  2. A second problem is that all search engines block anyone who sends to many queries in a short period of time.

 

  • What has to be done is to create a crawler that browses the internet and visit all the websites, so that can store data about products into its own database in order to make the whole process much faster and more accurate. Also browsing the internet bring up more information that can be analyzed and compared so that users have access to data such as lowest prices and product specifications.

 

 

 

  • For you to be able to see how the algorithm works I created a webpage https://previewscan.com, there you'll find two available tabs that simulate steps followed by the algorithm.

 

Barcode search

 


- Here you can provide a barcode and you get the product name, image and its reviews if the product has some.

 

 

 

Currently the algorithm uses Google for retrieving data and sometimes this feature does not work properly, because after sending a couple of queries Google blocks the server IP for two hours.To avoid this issue I developed an Android application so that you are able to scan your own products. Available url for installing it can be found here https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c... or you can search for "Previewscan indiegogo" in Google play.

 

 

 

Review search

 

 

- Using this tab you have to provide a product url that has reviews and the algorithm print out them. So if you want to test it you can go on amazon or any other website, find a product that has reviews and paste the link here.

 

 

Clear

- The algorithm saves structure data about product webpages so that for future visits it knows where to look at. This button is used for removing all these data from the database.

 

 

Why I need your help

I have a lot of ideas for creating a great product but I can't build it alone, I need your help to make Previewscan become a reality. In order to build and make it simple for users, behind the curtain there are many lines of code and systems where all data are stored.

I am mainly focused to hire people who continuously build and improve algorithms for retrieving data from websites that sell consumer products. So I need to hire more experienced people in the following area fields:

The below salaries are taken from freelancer.com and are requested by people who are very highly rated by customers.

- Java/C programmer, an extremely passionate person who builds and maintain the application infrastructure. Average salary 4000$/month

- Data mining analyst, who knows how information has to be structured so that can be fast and easily accessible. Average salary 3000$/month

- UX programmer who create user friendly interfaces and make sure that every button you click on is in its place. Average salary 4000$/month

- Dedicated server for storage costs 320$/month and it is used to save all the information that webcrawler finds.

I expect in three months to have a Beta version of the application so this period represents a total amount of 

(4000 + 3000 + 4000 + 320) * 3 months = 33960$

 

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/dinculescu

 

 

All details we can discuss after the campaign is over.

story:
Update: $500 perk will get you 90% off instead of the 50% listed. To be fair, yes this perk change is retroactive and will cover everyone who has already purchased it! :)

Update #2: This campaign just got featured in a pretty cool blog post by dh42! Please check it out.

Welcome, Do you run a Prestashop store? Wouldn't a mobile app that seamlessly connects to your store be awesome? Imagine, all the mobile users who'll be able to find your store, search your store and buy from your store. In addition, your own app adds a visible presence on your customer's device that'll be a constant subtle reminder that you have cool things to sell. There are other services that offer this. However, spending over $6,000 the first year PLUS 1% of all sales seems a bit excessive. We're developing the same platform but all plans will be a single flat one-time fee with plans starting as low as $499.

Short Summary

We want to develop a full system that will allow anyone who runs a Prestashop store to have their own app for a reasonable one-time flat rate fee. We are already in programing mode. We need a little bit of help to accomplish the following tasks:

  • Make an Android version of the App
  • Create the back end website that will handle orders

What do you mean an app?

We mean that once we have our product finished and created anyone with a Prestashop store will be able to own their own iTunes / Android app that will be optimized for both phones and tablets. 

  • The App will not be a simple web browser version of your store but a full app with rich deep features.
  • We will provide this app for a one time flat fee with different choices available to fit every store's budget.
  • Your app will be yours, your logo, your store, and no modification needed to core files. 

The Impact

Your contributions will allow us to:

  • Speed up time launch.
  • Create an Android version of the iTunes App that is already under construction. 
  • We are committed to this project and with your help we can provide the best possible app that store owners need. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Visit our website >>>

Follow us on Facebook >>>

Please share this page using the social media buttons above.

Get our newsletter to be kept up to date and in the know:

Text MYAPP to 22828 (standard rates may apply)


Here is a sample of how the new app will be designed. Note: the login screen will be replaced with a simple Facebook connection button.
