story:
Visualisez la page en Français 

Hi Everyone!  Thanks for taking a look at our campaign. The idea for this project came to me one day I had to use my DSLR on a camera crane, with the depth of field that this type of cameras offers, we could not get a perfect focus!. I needed a HF follow focus but I could not find a system with a good value for money. I could not understand why I had to pay more for an accessory than for the DSLR itself. That is how the project started!

Create a HF follow focus cheaper than a DSLR, but with the technical features of a professional system.

 

 

At Visuel Mouvement, we struggle to find innovative solutions in order to improve the equipment for cinema shooting, it is why we imagined and then created the Juste Focus. This remote control follow focus HF is compatible with all types of interchangeable camera’s lenses, it is provided in the form of a kit consisting of a remote, a receiver and a motor. The Juste Focus does a favor to the technician (first camera assistant) affecting the camera lens or DSLR to perform its remote-control focus, the technician avoids manipulating directly the lens which prevents shocks that will disrupt the focus.

 

 

 

What more will the Juste Focus? 

  • A minimalist design which makes easier its handling because there are not useless options which waste time because no failures or errors
  • Its compatibility. It is compatible with all types of lenses
  • A high autonomy of the remote (more than 40 hours)
  • The remote-control of the motor (range: 300 meters outdoor; 40m indoor) avoids shocks on the lens
  • It is less expensive than a mechanical follow focus and enjoys the selling price the cheapest on the market
  • Power supply and frequencies HF are internationally compatible
  • It is lightweight and easy to use

 

The Juste Focus is available as a kit, the Plug and Play kit. The kit incorporates:

  • A remote
  • A receiver
  • A V1 motor
  • A clamp: 15mm or 19mm (choice)
  • A gear: module 0,8 – 0,6 – 0,5 – 0,4 (usually the 0,8 module is the most commonly used)
  • A transport strap (collar measurement)
  • A storage briefcase

 

 

The Remote

 

The remote pairs up to the receiver which remote control the motor with its Bluetooth connection.The synchronization between the remote and the receiver must be done automatically.The pairing should be done a single time or in case of pairing reset (specified the method).There will be an infinite number of transmitter torques on the same place.The system will work by learning process each time the system is reset by the user.To avoid any interference during the manipulation of the remote, the signal is scrambled.

 

 

Specs:

  • Power:                      4 batteries AA (R6)
  • Autonomy:                40h
  • Scan Channel:           Auto
  • Range:                     300m outdoor - 40m indoor
  • Number of channels:  1
  • Real-time monitoring of battery status
  • Storing settings even off

 

Its measurements are:

  • length :                       152mm
  • width :                         75mm
  • thickness :                   75mm
  • weight (with battery) :    380g
  • weight (empty) :           280g

 

 

 

The Receiver

In order to control the motor with the remote you have to pose the remote on the Pose Pairing to pair it. The receiver mediates between the motor and the camera lens and between the remote and the motor. It consists of two cables: one connecting the receiver to the battery of the device used (DSLR for example), the other connected to the motor.

 

 

 

Specs:

  • Power:         12V to 30V Multi Power 
  • Autonomy:   8h with Vlock 88W/h
  • Frequency:   2.4 GHz

 

Its measurements are:

  • Length :           70mm
  • Width :            84mm
  • Thickness :      27mm
  • Weight :          160g

 

 

The Motor

The main function of the motor is to put in motion the camera lens.

It is with this feature of the Juste Focus than the focus takes place with the use of the remote control. The motor consists of one interchangeable gear with several modules (0,8 – 0,6 – 0,5 – 0,4). Moreover it consists of an interchangeable sliding clamp which can position on three different places of the motor in order to varying the grip angles, this sliding clamp allows fixing a camera mount rods with 15mm or 19mm diameter to mounting the motor or the motor can also be mounted with grip (mini magic arm). The motor can perform x rounds to manage to do an entire camera lens round. It is a digital motor, so it has no rounds limits between the two stops.

 

 

 

Specs:

  • Speed:       68 rpm
  • Torque:      1 Nm
  • Module:      0,8 (standard) 
  • Clamp:       15mm or 19mm 

 

Its measurements are:

  • Length :      130mm
  • Thickness :  35mm
  • Weight :      300g

 

Start-up:

What you need to run the Juste Focus

 

Options:


Juste Focus App for Smartphones IOS and Android:

 

There will be an App to control the JF and we will go further because the App will calculate every depth of field, save the lens measures (between the two stops) until 20 per record and may make as much backups he wants.

 

 

 

 

Communication protocol Open Source

This App is Open Source, thus you are able to redistribute freely the access to the source code and derivative works. You can control your Juste Focus with your own applications in order to integrate it into your systems.

 

 

Juste Focus Design

 Imagining the Juste Focus we wanted differentiate ourselves from the other market players, it was necessary developing a special design: a design that will be both remarkably simple and efficient. To achieve this we have created a product which gets to the point putting aside items which could disturb its functioning.

We could design a similar product to others and thus at a higher price but at Visuel Mouvement we prefer to find innovative solutions at reduced price. We offer a follow focus of a rare simplicity at an affordable price but which still meets the technical needs of clients: the easy focus.

Before studying design and technology, we began by observing your tastes and preferences. It was verified that 90% of users use only the focus function so we have developed a product of which the ease of use is explained by a single channel to control the focus which will make the focus.

In order to comply our commitment to design a simple product which gets to the point, we put aside the multitude of bulky options on a camera like the Rec and Stop control, otherwise we could not offer you an easy to use product. If we really care that the Juste Focus goes to the basics and we have developed a simple design that is because it is a very good tool that can serve as a spare product on a large camera setup or that will be suitable for other people thanks to its ease of use. Its reliability and sturdiness make that the Juste Focus cannot break down.

For more clarity we have designed a remote that will be suitable for both left and right-handed persons (optimum grip), it is easy to use and cannot make mistakes because it is composed of a minimum of buttons that each has a specific function. If its selling price and its environmental standards respect are important, its design is important too. This is why the Juste Focus has an attractive design and an uncluttered line combining basic and robust components for a use in all simplicity which gets to the point.

Simple and logical ideas to reduce costs and simplify its use to make the product most reliable and make it an essential tool in your next achievements (works).

 The Juste Focus only does the focus but it does well !!! 

 Why Indiegogo? 

We've built and tested our prototypes to make sure they are up to our standards. But designing and building a prototype is one thing – Manufacturing and marketing it is another.

We’ve figured out our raw material sources, manufacturing processes, our supply chain and infrastructure. We need your help to go further. We need funds to put the Juste Focus into production.

With your help, we can get past any issues we may run into with advanced laboratory testing, and hiring the best people to help us grow and move forward because we are confident. This product will improve and facilitate the lenses focus and cinema shooting (camerawork).

We are ready to rise this challenge!

 

More Information:

http://vm-cinema.com

 

About Visuel Mouvement:

We are a cinema grips group

We enjoy a truly ground expertise in every grip departments. Our trade is related to camera installations and grips. Most especially, our trade is to set in motion the camera. Moreover we secure the films sets and help the electric team in order to set up the lighting.

A design and research and development (R&D) office

Located in down center of Laval, we are in the middle of the modern technologies of the Virtual Reality to improve the development of shooting. We blend field experience with engineering to develop innovative items which meet the needs of every one.

A producer and a retailer of innovative products intended for shooting

With its online shop, VM will share with you its last innovations and will allow you to start or complete your grip package. Our simple, accessible and strong products meet the needs of all the technical trades of image.

A sharing and training web site…

Thanks to our website Video Making and our Blog, we share our know-how and feedbacks. Except for a content focused on DIY, we offer a didactic content for free in Grip, lighting, location management and special effects. We have also a trainer activity in the training centers of cinema trades. 

 

 

Our partners:

 

               

 

 

 

 

Visuel Mouvement team:

 

Nicolas Rolland                                                Stéphane Jegou

- Chairman                                                         - Managing Director

- Key Grip                                                          - Mecatronics Engineer

- Marketing Manager                                             - R&D Director

- Service , Renting, Sales Manager

 

 

 

 

Salut à tous ! Nous vous remercions de jeter un coup d’œil à notre campagne. L’idée de ce projet m’est venue lorsqu’un jour j’ai dû utiliser mon DSLR (Digital Single Lens Reflex) sur une grue lors d’un tournage. Avec la profondeur de champ que ces types d’appareils proposent nous ne pouvions pas obtenir une mise au point parfaite ! J’avais donc besoin d’un HF follow focus mais il était impossible d’en trouver un à un prix abordable. Je ne comprenais pas pourquoi je devais payer plus pour un accessoire que pour un DSLR. C’est pour cette raison que le projet Juste Focus est né : créer un HF follow focus regroupant les caractéristiques techniques d’un appareil de haute qualité tout en étant moins cher qu’un DSLR.

 Voici comment notre projet a démarré!

 

 

Chez Visuel Mouvement, nous nous efforçons de trouver des solutions innovantes pour améliorer le matériel de prise de vue cinéma, c’est pourquoi nous avons imaginé puis créé le Juste Focus. Ce système de mise au point à distance est compatible avec tous types d’objectifs interchangeables, il est proposé sous forme d’un kit composé d’une télécommande,  d’un récepteur et d’un moteur. Le Juste Focus rend service au pointeur en agissant sur l’optique caméra ou DSLR pour effectuer sa mise au point à distance. Grâce à sa fonction de base qui est de contrôler à distance la mise au point de la caméra, l’opérateur évite de manipuler directement l’objectif ce qui entrainerait des secousses qui perturberaient la mise au point.

 

 

Qu’est-ce que le Juste Focus a de plus ?

  • Un design minimaliste qui facilite sa manipulation car pas d’options inutiles, ce qui permet un gain de temps car pas de pannes ni d’erreurs
  • Sa compatibilité. Il s’adapte à tous types d’objectifs
  • Une forte autonomie de la télécommande (plus de 40 heures)
  • Le contrôle du moteur à distance (300 mètres en extérieur et 40 mètres en intérieur) évite qu’il y ait des secousses au niveau de l’objectif
  • Il est moins cher qu’un follow focus mécanique,  bénéficie du prix de vente le moins cher du marché
  • Alimentation  et fréquences HF compatibles à l’international
  • Il est léger et simple à utiliser

 

 

Le Juste Focus est proposé sous forme de kit, le kit Plug and Play. Il comprend :

  • Une télécommande
  • Un récepteur
  • Un moteur V1
  • Une pince Ø15mm ou Ø19mm (au choix)
  • Une roue dentée au choix de modules 0,8 – 0,6 – 0,5 – 0,4 (de base le module 0,8 est le plus couramment utilisé)
  • Une lanière de transport (tour de cou)
  • Une mallette de rangement

 

 

La télécommande

Elle s’appaire au récepteur qui contrôle le moteur à distance (via bluetooth) 

La synchronisation entre la télécommande et le récepteur se fait automatiquement.

L’appairage se fait qu’une seule fois. Grâce à cela il peut y avoir une infinité de Juste Focus dans la même pièce.

Pour empêcher toute interférence pendant la manipulation de la télécommande, le signal est crypté.

 

 

Caractéristiques techniques:

  • Alimentation:      4 piles AA (R6)
  • Autonomie:        40 heures
  • Fréquence:         2,4 GHz
  • Scan Channel:    Auto
  • Portée:              300m en extérieur - 40m en intérieur
  • Nombre de voie: 1 
  • Contrôle en temps réel de l'état des batteries
  • Mise en mémoire des paramètres même hors tension

 

Dimensions :

  • Longueur :                        152mm
  • Largeur :                           75mm
  • Epaisseur :                        75mm
  • Poids (avec batteries) :       380g
  • Poids (nu) :                       280g

 

 

Le récepteur

Afin de contrôler le moteur avec la télécommande, vous devez la poser sur le Pose Pairing pour l'appairer. Il sert d’intermédiaire entre le moteur et la caméra et entre la télécommande et le moteur. Il est constitué de deux câbles, l’un connecte le récepteur à la batterie de l’appareil utilisé l’autre se branche au moteur.

 

 

Cractéristiques techniques:

  • Alimentation:  de 12V à 30V - Multi alimentation
  • Autonomie:    8h avec Vlock de 88 W/h
  • Fréquence:     Bluetooth - 2,4 GHz

 

Dimensions:

  • Longueur:    70mm
  • Largeur:       84mm
  • Epaisseur:    27mm
  • Poids:          160g

 

 

Le moteur

Le moteur a comme fonction principale de mettre l’objectif de l’appareil en mouvement, c’est via cet élément du Juste Focus que la mise au point s’opère avec l’utilisation à distance de la télécommande. Le moteur est composé à une de ses extrémités d’une roue dentée interchangeable grâce à plusieurs modules (0,8 - 0,6 - 0,5 - 0,4).       Il est de plus constitué d’une pince interchangeable coulissante (amovible) qui peut être fixée sur trois endroits différents du moteur pour varier les angles d’accroche, cette pince permet de le fixer sur l’appareil et peut s’ajuster en fonction de l’épaisseur du socle soit en 15mm, 16mm ou 19mm. Pour que le moteur puisse être télécommandé, il dispose d’un connecteur qui se branche au récepteur. Le moteur  peut effectuer x tours pour arriver à faire un tour d’optique de caméra, moteur digital, donc il n’a pas de limites de tours entre les deux butées. 

 

Caractéristiques techniques:

  • Vitesse:   68rpm
  • Couple:   1 Nm
  • Module:   0,8 (de base)
  • Clamp:   15mm ou 19mm

 

Dimensions!

  • Longueur:   130mm
  • Epaisseur:   35mm
  • Poids:        300g

 

 

Start-up

Ce dont vous avez besoin pour mettre en marche le Juste Focus:

 

 

 

Options

 

 

 

Application Juste Focus pour Smartphones IOS et Android

Il y aura une application pour contrôler le Juste Focus et on ira plus loin car l’App pourra calculer tout ce qui est profondeur de champ, sauvegarder les mesures d’objectif (entre les deux butées) au nombre de 20 par enregistrement et pourra effectuer autant de sauvegardes qu’il souhaite.

 

 

 

Protocol de communication Open Source

Le protocol de communication est Open Source, vous avez donc la possibilité de redistribuer librement l'accès au code source et aux travaux dérivés. Vous pouvez commander votre Juste Focus avec vos propres applications pour l'intégrer dans vos systèmes.

 

 

Juste Focus Design

En imaginant le Juste Focus nous avons voulu nous différencier des autres acteurs du marché, un design s’est donc imposé à nous : un design qui serait à la fois remarquablement simple et efficace. Pour y parvenir nous avons créé un produit qui va à l’essentiel en mettant de côté des éléments qui ne perturberont pas son utilisation.

Nous aurions pu concevoir un produit similaire aux autres et donc à un prix plus élevé mais chez Visuel Mouvement nous préférons trouver des solutions innovantes à prix réduits. Nous vous proposons un follow focus d’une rare simplicité à un prix plus qu’abordable mais qui répond néanmoins aux attentes techniques des clients : faire le point tout simplement.

Avant d’étudier le design et la technologie, nous avons commencé par étudier vos goûts et vos préférences. Ça a été vérifié, 90% des utilisateurs n’utilisent que la fonction focus donc nous avons développé un produit dont la simplicité d’utilisation s’explique par une seule voie pour contrôler le focus qui fera la mise au point.

Afin de respecter notre volonté de concevoir un produit simple qui va à l’essentiel, nous avons mis de côté la multitude d’options encombrantes présentes sur une caméra comme le contrôle du Rec and Stop par exemple, dans le cas contraire nous n’aurions pu vous proposer un produit simple d’utilisation. Si nous tenons tant à ce que le Juste Focus aille à l’essentiel et que nous avons élaboré un design simple c’est parce que c’est un très bon outil qui peut servir de « spare »  (produit de substitution) sur une grosse configuration caméra ou qui conviendra aux autres grâce à sa simplicité d’utilisation. Sa fiabilité et sa robustesse font que le Juste Focus ne peut pas tomber en panne. 

Pour plus de clarté nous avons conçu une télécommande qui conviendra aux droitiers comme aux gauchers (prise en main optimale), elle est simple à utiliser et ne peut pas commettre d’erreurs car elle est composée d’un minimum de boutons qui ont chacun une fonction bien spécifique. Si son prix et son respect des normes environnementales sont importants, son design l’est également. C’est pour cela que le Juste Focus bénéficie d’un design attrayant et d’une ligne épurée regroupant des composants de base et robustes pour une utilisation en toute simplicité qui va à l’essentiel.

Des idées simples et logiques pour réduire les coûts et simplifier son utilisation pour rendre le produit plus fiable et en faire un outil indispensable dans vos prochaines réalisations.

 

Le Juste Focus ne fait que la mise au point mais il la fait bien !!!

Pourquoi exposer ce projet sur Indiegogo ?

Nous avons créé et testé nos prototypes afin de s’assurer qu’ils répondaient bien à nos critères. Cependant, concevoir et créer un prototype est une chose, le produire puis le commercialiser en est une autre.

Nous nous sommes  débrouillés pour mettre en place nos sources de matières premières, la gestion de nos processus de fabrication, notre chaîne d’approvisionnement et notre infrastructure. Nous avons besoin de votre soutien pour aller plus loin. Il est nécessaire pour nous d’acquérir des fonds pour lancer la production du Juste Focus.

Avec votre soutien, nous pouvons aller au-delà des problèmes susceptibles de nous ralentir grâce à nos tests de pointe en laboratoire et au recrutement de personnel qualifié. Vous avez l’opportunité de nous aider à grandir et à aller de l’avant. Pourquoi ? Car nous en avons la certitude, ce produit améliorera et facilitera la mise au point des objectifs et la prise de vue cinéma.   

Nous sommes prêts à relever ce défi !

 

En savoir plus:

http://vm-cinema.com

 

 

A propos de Visuel Mouvement :

Visuel Mouvement est une Société par Actions Simplifiée (SAS) française située à Laval, Pays de la Loire, France qui existe depuis mars 2011.

Qui sommes-nous ?

  • Un collectif de Machinistes Cinéma 

Nous disposons d’une sérieuse expertise terrain dans tous les domaines de la machinerie. Un de nos métiers est relatif aux accroches et installations de caméras et plus particulièrement à la mise en mouvement de la caméra. De plus nous sécurisons les plateaux de tournage et assistons l’équipe  électrique pour installer l’éclairage.

  • Un bureau d’étude et de Recherche et Développement (R&D)

Situés en plein cœur de la ville de Laval, nous sommes au centre des nouvelles technologies de la Réalité Virtuelle pour améliorer le développement de la prise de vue. Nous mêlons expérience terrain et ingénierie pour développer des produits innovants qui répondent aux attentes de chacun(e).

  • Un fabricant et un revendeur de produits novateurs destinés à la prise de vue

Nous proposons, grâce à notre site marchand, une gamme de produits innovants destinés à compléter ou commencer votre bijoute. Ces produits simples, accessibles et résistants répondent aux besoins de tous les métiers techniques de l’image.

  • Un site web de formation et de partage

Avec notre site Video Making et notre Blog, nous partageons le savoir-faire et les retours d’expérience. A part un contenu axé sur le     DIY (Do It Yourself) nous offrons gratuitement des conseils en machinerie, éclairage, régie et effets spéciaux. Nous exerçons de plus une activité de formateur dans les principaux centres de formation aux métiers du cinéma.

 

 

Nos partenaires:

             

 

Equipe de ce projet:

 Nicolas Rolland                                                      Stéphane Jegou

- Président                                                        - Directeur Général

- Chef Machiniste                                                - Ingénieur Mécatronique

- Directeur de Communication                                - Directeur R&D
story_txt:
Visualisez la page en Français 
Hi Everyone!  Thanks for taking a look at our campaign. The idea for this project came to me one day I had to use my DSLR on a camera crane, with the depth of field that this type of cameras offers, we could not get a perfect focus!. I needed a HF follow focus but I could not find a system with a good value for money. I could not understand why I had to pay more for an accessory than for the DSLR itself. That is how the project started!
Create a HF follow focus cheaper than a DSLR, but with the technical features of a professional system.
 
 
At Visuel Mouvement, we struggle to find innovative solutions in order to improve the equipment for cinema shooting, it is why we imagined and then created the Juste Focus. This remote control follow focus HF is compatible with all types of interchangeable camera’s lenses, it is provided in the form of a kit consisting of a remote, a receiver and a motor. The Juste Focus does a favor to the technician (first camera assistant) affecting the camera lens or DSLR to perform its remote-control focus, the technician avoids manipulating directly the lens which prevents shocks that will disrupt the focus.
 
 
 
What more will the Juste Focus? 

A minimalist design which makes easier its handling because there are not useless options which waste time because no failures or errors
Its compatibility. It is compatible with all types of lenses
A high autonomy of the remote (more than 40 hours)
The remote-control of the motor (range: 300 meters outdoor; 40m indoor) avoids shocks on the lens
It is less expensive than a mechanical follow focus and enjoys the selling price the cheapest on the market
Power supply and frequencies HF are internationally compatible
It is lightweight and easy to use


 
The Juste Focus is available as a kit, the Plug and Play kit. The kit incorporates:

A remote
A receiver
A V1 motor
A clamp: 15mm or 19mm (choice)
A gear: module 0,8 – 0,6 – 0,5 – 0,4 (usually the 0,8 module is the most commonly used)
A transport strap (collar measurement)
A storage briefcase
 

 
The Remote
 
The remote pairs up to the receiver which remote control the motor with its Bluetooth connection.The synchronization between the remote and the receiver must be done automatically.The pairing should be done a single time or in case of pairing reset (specified the method).There will be an infinite number of transmitter torques on the same place.The system will work by learning process each time the system is reset by the user.To avoid any interference during the manipulation of the remote, the signal is scrambled.
 

 
Specs:

Power:                      4 batteries AA (R6)
Autonomy:                40h
Scan Channel:           Auto
Range:                     300m outdoor - 40m indoor
Number of channels:  1
Real-time monitoring of battery status
Storing settings even off
 
Its measurements are:

length :                       152mm
width :                         75mm
thickness :                   75mm
weight (with battery) :    380g
weight (empty) :           280g
 
 
 
The Receiver
In order to control the motor with the remote you have to pose the remote on the Pose Pairing to pair it. The receiver mediates between the motor and the camera lens and between the remote and the motor. It consists of two cables: one connecting the receiver to the battery of the device used (DSLR for example), the other connected to the motor.
 
 

 
Specs:

Power:         12V to 30V Multi Power 
Autonomy:   8h with Vlock 88W/h
Frequency:   2.4 GHz
 
Its measurements are:

Length :           70mm
Width :            84mm
Thickness :      27mm
Weight :          160g
 

 
The Motor
The main function of the motor is to put in motion the camera lens.
It is with this feature of the Juste Focus than the focus takes place with the use of the remote control. The motor consists of one interchangeable gear with several modules (0,8 – 0,6 – 0,5 – 0,4). Moreover it consists of an interchangeable sliding clamp which can position on three different places of the motor in order to varying the grip angles, this sliding clamp allows fixing a camera mount rods with 15mm or 19mm diameter to mounting the motor or the motor can also be mounted with grip (mini magic arm). The motor can perform x rounds to manage to do an entire camera lens round. It is a digital motor, so it has no rounds limits between the two stops.
 
 

 
Specs:

Speed:       68 rpm
Torque:      1 Nm
Module:      0,8 (standard) 
Clamp:       15mm or 19mm 
 
Its measurements are:

Length :      130mm
Thickness :  35mm
Weight :      300g
 

Start-up:
What you need to run the Juste Focus

 

Options:


Juste Focus App for Smartphones IOS and Android:
 
There will be an App to control the JF and we will go further because the App will calculate every depth of field, save the lens measures (between the two stops) until 20 per record and may make as much backups he wants.
 
 

 

 
Communication protocol Open Source
This App is Open Source, thus you are able to redistribute freely the access to the source code and derivative works. You can control your Juste Focus with your own applications in order to integrate it into your systems.
 

 
Juste Focus Design
 Imagining the Juste Focus we wanted differentiate ourselves from the other market players, it was necessary developing a special design: a design that will be both remarkably simple and efficient. To achieve this we have created a product which gets to the point putting aside items which could disturb its functioning.
We could design a similar product to others and thus at a higher price but at Visuel Mouvement we prefer to find innovative solutions at reduced price. We offer a follow focus of a rare simplicity at an affordable price but which still meets the technical needs of clients: the easy focus.
Before studying design and technology, we began by observing your tastes and preferences. It was verified that 90% of users use only the focus function so we have developed a product of which the ease of use is explained by a single channel to control the focus which will make the focus.
In order to comply our commitment to design a simple product which gets to the point, we put aside the multitude of bulky options on a camera like the Rec and Stop control, otherwise we could not offer you an easy to use product. If we really care that the Juste Focus goes to the basics and we have developed a simple design that is because it is a very good tool that can serve as a spare product on a large camera setup or that will be suitable for other people thanks to its ease of use. Its reliability and sturdiness make that the Juste Focus cannot break down.
For more clarity we have designed a remote that will be suitable for both left and right-handed persons (optimum grip), it is easy to use and cannot make mistakes because it is composed of a minimum of buttons that each has a specific function. If its selling price and its environmental standards respect are important, its design is important too. This is why the Juste Focus has an attractive design and an uncluttered line combining basic and robust components for a use in all simplicity which gets to the point.
Simple and logical ideas to reduce costs and simplify its use to make the product most reliable and make it an essential tool in your next achievements (works).
 The Juste Focus only does the focus but it does well !!! 


 Why Indiegogo? 

We've built and tested our prototypes to make sure they are up to our standards. But designing and building a prototype is one thing – Manufacturing and marketing it is another.
We’ve figured out our raw material sources, manufacturing processes, our supply chain and infrastructure. We need your help to go further. We need funds to put the Juste Focus into production.
With your help, we can get past any issues we may run into with advanced laboratory testing, and hiring the best people to help us grow and move forward because we are confident. This product will improve and facilitate the lenses focus and cinema shooting (camerawork).
We are ready to rise this challenge!
 
More Information:
http://vm-cinema.com
 


About Visuel Mouvement:
We are a cinema grips group 
We enjoy a truly ground expertise in every grip departments. Our trade is related to camera installations and grips. Most especially, our trade is to set in motion the camera. Moreover we secure the films sets and help the electric team in order to set up the lighting.
A design and research and development (R&D) office
Located in down center of Laval, we are in the middle of the modern technologies of the Virtual Reality to improve the development of shooting. We blend field experience with engineering to develop innovative items which meet the needs of every one.
A producer and a retailer of innovative products intended for shooting
With its online shop, VM will share with you its last innovations and will allow you to start or complete your grip package. Our simple, accessible and strong products meet the needs of all the technical trades of image.
A sharing and training web site…
Thanks to our website Video Making and our Blog, we share our know-how and feedbacks. Except for a content focused on DIY, we offer a didactic content for free in Grip, lighting, location management and special effects. We have also a trainer activity in the training centers of cinema trades. 
 

 
Our partners:
 




               
 
 
 
 
Visuel Mouvement team:
 

Nicolas Rolland                                                Stéphane Jegou
- Chairman                                                         - Managing Director
- Key Grip                                                          - Mecatronics Engineer
- Marketing Manager                                             - R&D Director
- Service , Renting, Sales Manager
 
 


 
 
Salut à tous ! Nous vous remercions de jeter un coup d’œil à notre campagne. L’idée de ce projet m’est venue lorsqu’un jour j’ai dû utiliser mon DSLR (Digital Single Lens Reflex) sur une grue lors d’un tournage. Avec la profondeur de champ que ces types d’appareils proposent nous ne pouvions pas obtenir une mise au point parfaite ! J’avais donc besoin d’un HF follow focus mais il était impossible d’en trouver un à un prix abordable. Je ne comprenais pas pourquoi je devais payer plus pour un accessoire que pour un DSLR. C’est pour cette raison que le projet Juste Focus est né : créer un HF follow focus regroupant les caractéristiques techniques d’un appareil de haute qualité tout en étant moins cher qu’un DSLR.
 Voici comment notre projet a démarré!
 

 
Chez Visuel Mouvement, nous nous efforçons de trouver des solutions innovantes pour améliorer le matériel de prise de vue cinéma, c’est pourquoi nous avons imaginé puis créé le Juste Focus. Ce système de mise au point à distance est compatible avec tous types d’objectifs interchangeables, il est proposé sous forme d’un kit composé d’une télécommande,  d’un récepteur et d’un moteur. Le Juste Focus rend service au pointeur en agissant sur l’optique caméra ou DSLR pour effectuer sa mise au point à distance. Grâce à sa fonction de base qui est de contrôler à distance la mise au point de la caméra, l’opérateur évite de manipuler directement l’objectif ce qui entrainerait des secousses qui perturberaient la mise au point.
 

 
Qu’est-ce que le Juste Focus a de plus ?

Un design minimaliste qui facilite sa manipulation car pas d’options inutiles, ce qui permet un gain de temps car pas de pannes ni d’erreurs
Sa compatibilité. Il s’adapte à tous types d’objectifs
Une forte autonomie de la télécommande (plus de 40 heures)
Le contrôle du moteur à distance (300 mètres en extérieur et 40 mètres en intérieur) évite qu’il y ait des secousses au niveau de l’objectif
Il est moins cher qu’un follow focus mécanique,  bénéficie du prix de vente le moins cher du marché
Alimentation  et fréquences HF compatibles à l’international
Il est léger et simple à utiliser
 

 
Le Juste Focus est proposé sous forme de kit, le kit Plug and Play. Il comprend :

Une télécommande
Un récepteur
Un moteur V1
Une pince Ø15mm ou Ø19mm (au choix)
Une roue dentée au choix de modules 0,8 – 0,6 – 0,5 – 0,4 (de base le module 0,8 est le plus couramment utilisé)
Une lanière de transport (tour de cou)
Une mallette de rangement
 

 
La télécommande
Elle s’appaire au récepteur qui contrôle le moteur à distance (via bluetooth) 
La synchronisation entre la télécommande et le récepteur se fait automatiquement.
L’appairage se fait qu’une seule fois. Grâce à cela il peut y avoir une infinité de Juste Focus dans la même pièce.
Pour empêcher toute interférence pendant la manipulation de la télécommande, le signal est crypté.
 

 
Caractéristiques techniques:

Alimentation:      4 piles AA (R6)
Autonomie:        40 heures
Fréquence:         2,4 GHz
Scan Channel:    Auto
Portée:              300m en extérieur - 40m en intérieur
Nombre de voie: 1 
Contrôle en temps réel de l'état des batteries
Mise en mémoire des paramètres même hors tension
 
Dimensions :

Longueur :                        152mm
Largeur :                           75mm
Epaisseur :                        75mm
Poids (avec batteries) :       380g
Poids (nu) :                       280g

Pour plus de clarté nous avons conçu une télécommande qui conviendra aux droitiers comme aux gauchers (prise en main optimale), elle est simple à utiliser et ne peut pas commettre d’erreurs car elle est composée d’un minimum de boutons qui ont chacun une fonction bien spécifique. Si son prix et son respect des normes environnementales sont importants, son design l’est également. C’est pour cela que le Juste Focus bénéficie d’un design attrayant et d’une ligne épurée regroupant des composants de base et robustes pour une utilisation en toute simplicité qui va à l’essentiel.
Des idées simples et logiques pour réduire les coûts et simplifier son utilisation pour rendre le produit plus fiable et en faire un outil indispensable dans vos prochaines réalisations.
 
Le Juste Focus ne fait que la mise au point mais il la fait bien !!!


Pourquoi exposer ce projet sur Indiegogo ?
Nous avons créé et testé nos prototypes afin de s’assurer qu’ils répondaient bien à nos critères. Cependant, concevoir et créer un prototype est une chose, le produire puis le commercialiser en est une autre.
Nous nous sommes  débrouillés pour mettre en place nos sources de matières premières, la gestion de nos processus de fabrication, notre chaîne d’approvisionnement et notre infrastructure. Nous avons besoin de votre soutien pour aller plus loin. Il est nécessaire pour nous d’acquérir des fonds pour lancer la production du Juste Focus.
Avec votre soutien, nous pouvons aller au-delà des problèmes susceptibles de nous ralentir grâce à nos tests de pointe en laboratoire et au recrutement de personnel qualifié. Vous avez l’opportunité de nous aider à grandir et à aller de l’avant. Pourquoi ? Car nous en avons la certitude, ce produit améliorera et facilitera la mise au point des objectifs et la prise de vue cinéma.   
Nous sommes prêts à relever ce défi !
 
En savoir plus:
http://vm-cinema.com
 

 

A propos de Visuel Mouvement :
Visuel Mouvement est une Société par Actions Simplifiée (SAS) française située à Laval, Pays de la Loire, France qui existe depuis mars 2011.
Qui sommes-nous ?

Un collectif de Machinistes Cinéma 
Nous disposons d’une sérieuse expertise terrain dans tous les domaines de la machinerie. Un de nos métiers est relatif aux accroches et installations de caméras et plus particulièrement à la mise en mouvement de la caméra. De plus nous sécurisons les plateaux de tournage et assistons l’équipe  électrique pour installer l’éclairage.

Un bureau d’étude et de Recherche et Développement (R&D)
Situés en plein cœur de la ville de Laval, nous sommes au centre des nouvelles technologies de la Réalité Virtuelle pour améliorer le développement de la prise de vue. Nous mêlons expérience terrain et ingénierie pour développer des produits innovants qui répondent aux attentes de chacun(e).

Un fabricant et un revendeur de produits novateurs destinés à la prise de vue
Nous proposons, grâce à notre site marchand, une gamme de produits innovants destinés à compléter ou commencer votre bijoute. Ces produits simples, accessibles et résistants répondent aux besoins de tous les métiers techniques de l’image.

Un site web de formation et de partage
Avec notre site Video Making et notre Blog, nous partageons le savoir-faire et les retours d’expérience. A part un contenu axé sur le     DIY (Do It Yourself) nous offrons gratuitement des conseils en machinerie, éclairage, régie et effets spéciaux. Nous exerçons de plus une activité de formateur dans les principaux centres de formation aux métiers du cinéma.
 

 
Nos partenaires:




             


 
Equipe de ce projet:

 Nicolas Rolland                                                      Stéphane Jegou
- Président                                                        - Directeur Général
- Chef Machiniste                                                - Ingénieur Mécatronique
- Directeur de Communication                                - Directeur R&D

story:
Quest Foundry helps you create, share, buy and sell quests for pen-and-paper RPG's using an in-browser editor. Give your quests away for free, keep them private or charge for your hard work and make some coin. Likewise, you can buy quests created by fellow geeks or score free ones to use in your own games.

Buying quests can be pricey. Finding free, quality ones isn’t as easy as it should be. And countless campaigns are siloed away in binders or computers, locked away for no other gaming groups -- save for those of their creator’s -- to enjoy. Quest Foundry aims to change that, and then some, whether you play in-person or online.

Check out the video above to watch the site in action and see what we have in store.

Selling quests, you say? Why yes! Here's the lowdown:

If you decide to sell quests on the site, 75 percent of your revenue will go to your pocket, and we'll keep 25 percent. Easy. That way, we'll be able to put food on our table and continue building Quest Foundry.

There may eventually be a subscription option of some sort in the future, but IndieGoGo backers will have access to a free tier for as long as we're around (which we hope is a long, long time).

Better graphic design! If we had a character sheet, our lowest skill stat would be art. An early Alpha version of Quest Foundry is already coded, and while the basic functionality is hammered out, there are still many features to add and refinements to make, chief among them is design. That’s why we’re here on IndieGoGo.

We’re programmers and writers, but not visual designers. The Semantic UI framework helped us build the app in its current state, but it really needs the eye of a designer for good UI and a slick look.

If we’re funded, we'll hire the very talented Halldór “Dóri” Bjarnason to create our UI and design. Once he’s finished up, we’ll take the visuals he creates and code them in HTML and CSS.

While we expect the design to be finished by the end of March, all backers will get access to the Alpha version of Quest Foundry shortly after we're funded (early January).

Our rewards / perks are broken down into tiers by RPG classes (see them on the right), but here's a list of what you could get your hands on:

  • Early access to Quest Foundry (for every backer!) soon after we're funded
  • A backer badge on the forums to let everyone know you're a supprter
  • Free quests created by us
  • Input into what quests we make and how they unfold
  • Keep more (or all) of your revenue! (Wizard level and above)
  • Die Cut Vinyl Sticker

The sticker might undergo some tweaks, but this is what we have in mind.

  • "Geeks Kill Dragons" T-Shirt

The shirt might change some, depending on your input, but this is what we've got in mind.

Stretch goals? Yeah, we have a few, but we're keeping quiet on what they are until we reach our first goal!

We started GeekImprovement.com to help folks find and keep track of things they geek out about by cataloging the books, movies and video games they've read / watched / played and add others to their to-do and wish lists. That was just the first step, and now we're working on other geeky projects we'd like to see exist on this fine planet called Earth. The first one is Quest Foundry.

Spread the word! Head over to Facebook, Twitter and other social networks and tell folks about Quest Foundry. If you've got a blog, we'd appreciate it if you wrote about us. Otherwise, tell your favorite bloggers about Quest Foundry!

story:
Your computer is running slower than dialup, the dishwasher stalls out, or the car starts to rattle. You google for hours and ultimately you just have to overpay a professional to fix it for you. Introducing ExpertU, the new video chat app that connects you with OnDemand Experts for instant one-on-one guidance. For a few dollars, get to the root of your problem in just a few minutes!

 

 

We have several categories of Experts to accommodate any issue you may need help with, and we’re adding categories all the time! Our Experts are vetted, accredited, and background checked so you know you’re getting reliable advice.  Not only do they know what they’re talking about, they’re fantastic at walking customers through each step! And unlike the auto mechanic who upsells stuff you don’t need, our Experts are located all over the country, so you know you’re getting unbiased support!

 

 

 

 

What is the Payment Model for the app?

The app is free to download and like ridesharing, you only pay when you us it. Once customers are connected with Experts, they start with 10-minutes for a pre-set cost, all between $10-$15 depending on the Expert category. If necessary, the customer can purchase additional time before the session ends.

How do I know ExpertU will solve my problem?

In our trial runs, our Experts have been able to truly solve most customers’ problems in just one 10-minute session. In the rare instances where it was determined the customer’s next step was indeed to hire a local professional to fix it for them, customers reported that they were still very happy with the experience. They noted that the Expert was able to provide them with a cost expectation, what specifically they’ll need, and that they had a much better general understanding of their task at hand.

How do I know I will get a good Expert?

Our Experts are thoroughly vetted to ensure they know their stuff. And when customers post their projects and Experts are notified, they get to preview the project so that if for some reason they cannot guaranty to get you the support you need, they cannot take the project on. Additionally, every Expert is rated by their customers after each session – this lets you rest assured that your Expert has successfully helped many others and lets us see an Experts that may be underperforming.

Is ExpertU safe?

Yes, it is! Unlike services where you must pay a freelancer or professional to come into your home or personal space (ridesharing for example), with ExpertU your Expert is most likely across the country. And in addition to our Experts being vetted and background checked, they are required to give us all of their personal information (name, address, SSN, and bank account info) so it would not behoove them to be inappropriate or vulgar while helping a customer.

What are the legal/liability concerns?

ExpertU will be using a legally-reviewed set of Terms and Conditions, as well as implement other warning notifications to let customers know that ExpertU and our Experts are not liable for injuries or accidents that occur while a session is being conducted. Even when picturing a worst-case scenario of someone sustaining injury while working on an electrical issue, ExpertU is no more liable than the instructional video that person was watching or the author of the book on electrical projects he was reading. And above all else, ExpertU is intended to help customers avoid these unsafe practices.

story:
Short Summary

Samantha and Ambar met in a business class where we became partners in class projects and papers. We then decided we wanted to fund an idea of our own.  We both agreed there is a sense of frustration associated with finding parking spaces on college campuses.  That's when the idea hit us! We are developing an app that will assist college students in finding a parking space quick and easy. Your contributions will help us make our idea a reality and help develop the details and programming needed to implement the app.  Please explore our indiegogo page more and contribute to our adventure.

What We Need & What You Get

Your contributions will go toward the development of the app itself, as well as the technology necessary for the app to be implemented. We will work with a professional app programer to develop the different aspects of the programming and purchase the motion-activated LED lights as well as the weight-detecting technology.

And ofcourse everyone loves a reward for their generosity so please enjoy these perks we have created especially for you!

 

Stretch Goals

 

The Impact

University App will help you save time, gas, and money. The app will change the way a college student or professor views the parking situation on their campus. University App gives you the ability to locate an empty parking spot on campus, find a security vehicle for safety, and the associated technology will brighten up the campus for you to walk safely to your vehicle. We hope you are inspired by our idea and will contribute to this adventure and watch this app develp into the future.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the funds to contribute, please share our idea and adventure with all of your friends and family! AND...you can find a developing website at:

PUSH HERE: For a model of what the app would look like!

Universityapp.weebly.com

 

About Us

My name is Samantha Burger, I am from Cincinnati, Ohio. I am currently a student at Bellarmine University in Louisville, Kentucky. I am a senior Business Administration major that loves running, animals and cooking. I am optimistic and excited about our indiegogo adventure and thank you for your contributions.

My name is Ambar Matias, I was born in Puerto Rico but currently live in Chicago, Illiniois. I am a junior and just like Samantha I am enrolled at Bellarmine University.  I am a Business Administration major with a minor in International Studies and Pre-Law.  When I graduate I plan on going to law school to study corporate law, business law, or international law.

story:
Warehouse Box is a multifunctional cable management box that not only neatly organizes and conceals the surge protector with long, messy cords from the sight and reach of the babies and pets, but also features a wireless charging pad in the middle rack to hold and charge your phone, plus a colorful nightlight that switches in response to a simple touch on the top rack.It is crafted out of premium electrical insulated ABS material, inventive ventilation structure and curved design that add up to a safe, desirable addition to your home and office.

 

 

 Warehouse Box is a perfect storage and cover designed to fit power strip and surge protector. It keeps them dust-free, your work/entertainment area tidy.

 

 

Note: Accommodate power strip with max. length of 10.6in(270mm). 

 

 

 Warehouse Box offers enough storage space for the cords, adapters small electronics etc., and three cable cut-outs on the back to keep tangled, messy cables at bay.   

 

 

 

Warehouse Box features a unique double deck design which exploits limited space by providing more storage places for your phones, tablets and other mobile devices during charging. 

 

 

 

What’s more amazing about Warehouse Box is that its middle rack is embedded with a wireless charging pad that can give your digital gadget a quick wireless power boost @10W. 

 

 

Two energy efficient LED beads are evenly arranged underneath the top rack to diffuse soft, therapeutic ambient light. The light can be switched on, off and between different modes by a gentle touch on the top of Warehouse Box. 

 

 

 

Warehouse Box’s Circular Turbo Ventilation design helps dissipate the heat and precludes overheating. 

 

 

 

Warehouse Box further enhances the safety by using high quality ABS plastic that is fire-retardant, anti-scratch and durable.  

 

 

 

The sleek, streamlined and minimal design of Warehouse Box makes it an aesthetic as well as practical storage solution on the nightstand, desktop, floor in both your home and office.

 

 

 

 Superior to others, the lid of Warehouse Box opens from back, not top, so it prevents kids and pets from opening the lid and directly touching the dangerous electrical equipment. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 The variety of desktop accessories and people’s aesthetic demands for them have been multiplying in the wake of the rapid development of the Internet community and the boost of intelligent hardware peripherals. We would like to create space-saving designs that make people’s lives more refined and elegant. Warehouse Box accomplished the artistic sublimation on this functional product by offering ultra-large volume through its double-deck structure and touch-sensitive LED ambient light in addition to its simplistic design, making it in line with the high standards of modern life.

story:
Join about 2000 registered users to develop Wickeddata.online further.

Our goal is to be a single online service where you can explore and analyse data(sets), create & share your findings and collaborate with your team. No more separate tools for crunching numbers and creating communication materials!

 

Few examples how Wickeddata.online can help you!

All at your fingertips online, no need for installation or setup, just register and and start using!

Check out Wickeddata product pages to see examples of charts & dashboard you can already create or login and test out yourself, we have made some open data available for you to test with in featured data section.

Your data can be anything*. Say you collected feedback from your customers, maybe you have file with all your sales transactions or test results of your R&D, it can even be data related to your hobbies. We don't really care what the content of the data is.

If you have your data saved in Wickeddata you can even browse it live, so instead of "Let me get back to that next time" you can just find your answer live with few clicks. 

CREATE INTERACTIVE INFOGRAPHICS - LETS BUILD THIS!

Infographics are great marketing and communications tool. Once we're done you can build the traditional infographics like this:

 

As well as truly interactive ones, which your audience can engage with!

 
 

Interactivity enables your audience to see your infographics from personal point of view, making them more relevant and engaging.

Did you know

that your brain registers visual information 60 000 times faster than text. Yes there is debate, if 60 000 is a valid number, but even so fact is that it’s much faster, so your visuals make the first impression.

We also remember text better when accompanied with visuals. “Based on research into the Picture Superiority Effect, when we read text alone, we are likely to remember only 10 percent of the information 3 days later. If that information is presented to us as text combined with a relevant image, we are likely to remember 65 percent of the information 3 days later.”** 

This is why you should use infographics.

 

But, We Believe

Infographics should be more than few charts and icons slabbed together. You should be able to create infographics that make an impact, when that happens people are drawn to them. Once they do, they should be able to interact with them. That's why we're aiming to create tool that will help you create truly interactive and engaging infographics with ease.

 

Perks!

All perks include access to Wickeddata.online service, even the 10 dollar one! What varies is type of subscription you get and for how long time. In this Indiegogo campaign we offer two different types of plans, personal and professional.

Personal plan is not available through our website yet, only here! We will be launching it later at price of 60€ / year, so take advantage of the offer now!

(Image library, infograph library & use of your own logo will launch once infographic functionality has been implemented as described in this campaign)

We are

Visualligent Oy - a Finnish Company, we have a team of three awesome individuals backed with solid advisors / board team with a passion for software, data and especially making data work for you.

 

Lets build

A tool that helps you to effectively transform your data to communication & information and making an impact!

 

Every penny counts!

Most of the money will go towards development, some for backend and other costs of running the service and taxman may take his share as well.

Here's what we estimate will get done and estimated expedited schedule, depending on the amount received:

Data Grid:

If you have numbers readily at hand, just type or copy-paste them into data grid to draw charts.

Fonts & Themes:

Bunch of new fonts & some new themes for you to choose from.

Infographics:

Combine (interactive) charts, counters, filters and graphic elements to create truly interactive infographics.

Filtering charts:

Click on your chart sections to filter all other charts in your creatives.

Maps:

We'll start with world map and expand from there, let us know which maps you'd like to have!

 

Risks & Challenges

We have already built something of use that's working at Wickeddata.online! So we have pretty good idea of what we're doing. However like with any software project and business, there's always an element of unknown and implementiation / schedule risks. We can't guarantee that all will get done as estimated in here, but we can guarantee we will do our best and that you already have something to play with!

 

Join us!

Join us building something great! Spread the word, share this campaign and let people know of Wickeddata.online, it will all help us get there.

 

* Currently we support excel and csv files which are structured so that on first row you have titles of columns and below that values for each (like you typically have if you export files from systems etc). 

** John Medina, Brain Rules, 2008.
story_txt:
Join about 2000 registered users to develop Wickeddata.online further.
Our goal is to be a single online service where you can explore and analyse data(sets), create & share your findings and collaborate with your team. No more separate tools for crunching numbers and creating communication materials!

 
Few examples how Wickeddata.online can help you!

All at your fingertips online, no need for installation or setup, just register and and start using!
Check out Wickeddata product pages to see examples of charts & dashboard you can already create or login and test out yourself, we have made some open data available for you to test with in featured data section.
Your data can be anything*. Say you collected feedback from your customers, maybe you have file with all your sales transactions or test results of your R&D, it can even be data related to your hobbies. We don't really care what the content of the data is.
If you have your data saved in Wickeddata you can even browse it live, so instead of "Let me get back to that next time" you can just find your answer live with few clicks. 
CREATE INTERACTIVE INFOGRAPHICS - LETS BUILD THIS!
Infographics are great marketing and communications tool. Once we're done you can build the traditional infographics like this:


 
As well as truly interactive ones, which your audience can engage with!



 


 

Interactivity enables your audience to see your infographics from personal point of view, making them more relevant and engaging.
Did you know
that your brain registers visual information 60 000 times faster than text. Yes there is debate, if 60 000 is a valid number, but even so fact is that it’s much faster, so your visuals make the first impression.
We also remember text better when accompanied with visuals. “Based on research into the Picture Superiority Effect, when we read text alone, we are likely to remember only 10 percent of the information 3 days later. If that information is presented to us as text combined with a relevant image, we are likely to remember 65 percent of the information 3 days later.”** 
This is why you should use infographics.
 
But, We Believe
Infographics should be more than few charts and icons slabbed together. You should be able to create infographics that make an impact, when that happens people are drawn to them. Once they do, they should be able to interact with them. That's why we're aiming to create tool that will help you create truly interactive and engaging infographics with ease.
 
Perks!
All perks include access to Wickeddata.online service, even the 10 dollar one! What varies is type of subscription you get and for how long time. In this Indiegogo campaign we offer two different types of plans, personal and professional.
Personal plan is not available through our website yet, only here! We will be launching it later at price of 60€ / year, so take advantage of the offer now!

(Image library, infograph library & use of your own logo will launch once infographic functionality has been implemented as described in this campaign)
We are
Visualligent Oy - a Finnish Company, we have a team of three awesome individuals backed with solid advisors / board team with a passion for software, data and especially making data work for you.
 

Lets build
A tool that helps you to effectively transform your data to communication & information and making an impact!
 
Every penny counts!
Most of the money will go towards development, some for backend and other costs of running the service and taxman may take his share as well.
Here's what we estimate will get done and estimated expedited schedule, depending on the amount received:

Data Grid:
If you have numbers readily at hand, just type or copy-paste them into data grid to draw charts.
Fonts & Themes:
Bunch of new fonts & some new themes for you to choose from.
Infographics:
Combine (interactive) charts, counters, filters and graphic elements to create truly interactive infographics.
Filtering charts:
Click on your chart sections to filter all other charts in your creatives.
Maps:
We'll start with world map and expand from there, let us know which maps you'd like to have!
 

Risks & Challenges
We have already built something of use that's working at Wickeddata.online! So we have pretty good idea of what we're doing. However like with any software project and business, there's always an element of unknown and implementiation / schedule risks. We can't guarantee that all will get done as estimated in here, but we can guarantee we will do our best and that you already have something to play with!
 

Join us!
Join us building something great! Spread the word, share this campaign and let people know of Wickeddata.online, it will all help us get there.
 
* Currently we support excel and csv files which are structured so that on first row you have titles of columns and below that values for each (like you typically have if you export files from systems etc). 
** John Medina, Brain Rules, 2008.

story:
GET A FREE ITEM of Your Chose FOR REFERRING FRIENDS!  Details Here

FAQ: How much for shipping and how long does it take from Hong Kong to US  ? 

> Shipping is included to all UK and US addresses, and it usually takes 2 week. We will also email you a tracking number. 

FAQ: Can I see the actual product ?

> Our product samples for The Calendar, The Tag and The Cushion are been made at the moment, we will upload the photos as soon as they arrive.

Formed with a group of animal lovers and individual designers who want to create an interactive project that everyone can be participate in the development, not only just funding us. 

By doing so, we can maximize the use of Crowd Funding. Best of both worlds~~~. For our first campaign, we will be launching 3 of our designs, for more information please read on!.

Like pixel, that's how we got our name PetXel :) 

When you pledge a Calendar, you will have the privilege to place your beloved pet's photo according to the date you wish on the 2014 Calendar. 

Just like this >>

  

 First Come First Serve  

Once claimed, please send an email to "contact@petxel.com" with the information below: 

 - Your indiegogo account name (The one you used for this contribution) 

 - Attachment of your pet's picture (the Higher the Resolution the Better) 

 - Your pet's name (Optional)

 - The date you want it to be shown (e.g. 16th July)  

 - Your Location (Optional)

* Details Here

*If we do not receive your email, we will just mail you the Calendar.  

After we received your email, we will verify your claim and reply you with a confirmation letter as soon as possible.

FAQ: I don't have a pet, can I just get the Calendar ?

> Sure !  If we do not receive your email, we will just mail you the Calendar.

FAQ: What if all the dates I wish already occupied ?

> If all the dates you wish already occupied, please email us "reserve@petxel.com" with the date you desired, we will put you on the wish list. If we receive enough pets to create the next edition, we will update here as well as notify you via email. Then we will set up another campaign for you which will be exactly the same as this one. To keep track, visit >>> WishList <<< 

*You do not have to contribute until the next edition.

FAQ: Can I check if the date is available before I contribute?

> To see if the date is still available, please visit : >> Update <<  Don't Worry ~ You can also double confirm the date with us just before you contribute, send an email to "date@petxel.com" with the date you desire, we will reply you as soon as possible.

FAQ: Do I have to claim 4 Calendars if I have 4 pets ? 

>NO NEED ! You Do Not have to claim 4 Calendars. We understand that the US and the UK household has an average of 4 pets, so 1 Calendar probably enough for them.If you want to place 4 photos on the calendar, you can choose to contribute " 4 engraved tags + 1 Calendar". Or, contribute 4 Calendars separately.

The Calendar Spec.

Size & Quality:

Like any pet owners, we treat our pets like the lovely Princess and Prince. So we decided to create the tag that suits them most. 

*Spoilers - We will unlock the special edition. Further updates are on their way

The Tag Spec.

Size & Quality:

Made of 316L Stainless Steel with our signature colors. 

~ Free laser engraving ~

FAQ: Can I choose The-Tag color?

> Of cause you can. Assuming you claimed the Calendar + Tag package, just add: 

 Color of the Tag + What to engrave (4 Line Max. or Leave Blank for a plain one) on the email to "contact@petxel.com". 

If you only want the tag, Just provide us the above information. Cheers !

* Details Here


46cm x 46cm Cushion designed for you and your favorite.

The Cushion Spec.

18" x 18"

Coral Fleece as the paw on top of the Linen caving, Velvet on the other side.

FAQ: Do you have other Colors?

> Sorry, we only have Orange at the moment. However, we will produce the other 5 signature colors when we reach certain goal. So, Stay tuned !

FAQ: Does it come with the fillings?

> Yes, the fillings will be vacuum packaging. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our ideas, help us spread the word around the world with Indiegogo share tools. Cheers ~ 

WHY WE NEED YOU

We are very excited to have such campaign that brought every animal lovers together around the world and literally making something happens. We hope you’ll love the idea as much as we do. 



Please Visit : www.petxel.com for more detail. 

Email : contact@petxel.com 

Twitter : https://twitter.com/Petxel

story:
Now Introducing the Simple Secure Router.

Safer than your average router, easy to manage and lighting fast, the Simple Secure Router is the next generation in router technology. 
      Easily set up your router on your phone or tablet.


Access your network information from the cloud.



View security reports and see your network's device history online.

            

Receive text or email alerts whenever your router finds a new device.



Block unwanted devices with the click of a button.


Why do we promote network security?

Click here for more information on these statistics. 

If an unknown device suddenly broke into your wireless network, would you know about it? 

When you consider how more and more devices in your home are connecting to your wireless network, and the damage hackers can cause by using your WiFi for illegal activities, shouldn't there be a way to have a sophisticated security system that's easy enough for anyone to use?

Now there is: the Simple Secure Router from Who's On My WiFi.


                    



We Have More than an Idea, We're Ready to Go  

We've been building this router and online system for over 18 months, and we need your help to let it see the light of day.  

We have all of the firmware, all of the online system and detection engines, and a deal in the works with a router manufacturer.  We're ready to go.  But, we're a boot strapped start-up out of Oklahoma City and Detroit.  We need to make sure that people want and will support this router before we can complete our order.

That's why we need your help.

Our company was founded 3 years ago to solve the problem of detecting wireless intruders, and we finally have the right solution and more with this router and our online system.  

We've poured everything into this, and I think you'll like the results.

Open Source Router Ready To Go

Our router is easy to set up and manage, lightning fast and won't slow down if you live in an area with a lot of other wireless networks.

The Simple Secure Router is secure out of the box and uses a secured version of OpenWRT, eliminating security issues seen in other routers.  

We are also Open Sourcing all of our interface, detection, and notification firmware modifications to the Open Source community under the GPLv3 license.

With a subscription to Who's On My WiFi Online, you'll always be aware of what is going on with your network and receive updates about possible intrusions.

Our router is made with Tech Consumers, Small Businesses, and Remote Enterprise Branches in mind.

Join The Testing Team

We have built and tested beta models of our router. And we're a company that has been helping people enhance their wireless security for over three years. Help us out by buying our beta edition early and giving us your feedback. 

Thank You

We started this journey three years ago when we launched our start-up, and this campaign is the final step of an 18 month project to build a router that could help people have a cloud enabled, secure wireless network without the hassle. We won't be able to make that goal a reality without your help, so however you help, even by just reading this we want to say thank you, as without you we will never be able to bring this dream to life. Thank you.

story:
INTRODUCING PEN ARRAY
Organize your pens in style.

Pen Array is a stylish & minimalistic pen organizer. It is precision machined out of solid Glacier White Corian, crispy white as pure as freshly fallen snow.

DESIGN & MANUFACTURING


Concept

An array is a systematic arrangement of similar objects, usually in rows and columns. Compared to traditional pen organizers, Pen Array offers a flexible layout. The pens can be organized in two directions, 45 and 135 degrees, reminding of the handwriting pen position for both right and left handed individuals. 

Stylish & minimalistic on your desk, it also makes a great gift.

It offers an improved pen grip, the fingers fit between the pyramids.


Dimensions

  • LENGTH 265mm.
  • WIDTH 176mm.
  • THICKNESS 12mm.


Technology

Highly specialized CNC machines and tooling will be used, we have selected experienced and reliable suppliers.


Material

DuPontTM Corian® solid surface is an advanced composite product used as an architectural and design material in a variety of residential and commercial applications. Corian® solid surface offers design versatility, functionality and durability.

DuPontTM Corian® solid surface is a solid, nonporous, homogeneous surfacing material, composed of ≈1/3 acrylic resin (also known as polymethyl methacrylate or PMMA), and ≈2/3 natural minerals. ese minerals are composed of aluminum trihydrate (ATH) derived from bauxite, an ore from which aluminum is extracted. For more information on the composition of the material, please consult the Corian® solid surface Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS) available via the msds.dupont.com website. Full Corian specs here.


Flexible pen layout.

Flexible pen layout.


Top & side views.


FULFILMENT

Highly specialized CNC machines and tooling will be used, we have selected experienced and reliable suppliers.

  • Indiegogo campaign: end of May, 2016 - mid July, 2016
  • pre-production preparation: 2 weeks
  • production: 4 weeks
  • shipping: end of August, 2016

The whole manufacturing process will take place in Europe/ Romania/ Bucharest and the products will be shipped worldwide by EMS. 

Please note: The fee does NOT include your local applicable taxes. Please check with your local customs regarding the fees.

If we have any significant changes to our manufacturing process we'll let you know.


Acknowledgments


Thank you friends for all of your feedback and support, for prototype work, photo shooting, music and more.


Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing a product is a challenging endeavour. We have handpicked our suppliers for each operation. We are constantly looking for talented suppliers to do things even better. Since it's all about supplier coordination, some potential challenges might occur, due to unforeseen situations or delays. But we will strive to avoid this, based on previous complex design & project management expertise. The whole process will be crystal clear, you will be immediately informed, if necessary.


About Schneider Sarto

Schneider Sarto is an engineering & aesthetics studio, focusing on everyday objects. 

Based in Bucharest, Romania, the studio is run by Ionut Croitoru who studied Architecture in Stockholm, Bucharest and London. He has been running a leading commercial architecture office for 10 years in Bucharest, before starting the design studio in 2014. Read more here.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like Pen Array, please spread the news. Thank you!


Credits

Photography: Cosmin Gogu, Serban Vasilescu, George Dobre
Music: emelET
Advisor: Mihai Croitoru

Instagram
